Thes argument show , why success on a high level be not possible without risk at a high level and therefore i agree with the give statement . 	GER

although most advertisement company state insistantly that they be deeply consider the ethical issue in advertisement , I think most of the advertisement produce by these company be exaggrated . firstly , these company be take high amount of money from customer and as a result they want to appreciate these customer . rather than use creativity in preparation process , they just exaggrate the property of the product . after all these deception , the product can be perceive much more valuable by the public . in order to avoid these type of mislead advertisement , there should be an effective control mechanism like a properly working group which investigate the advertisement before they be publish . a second solution might be strict regulation like fine the mislead company etc . secondly , these advertisement only emphasize the positive attribute of the product but give no information about its drawback . in this way , people who buy the product , do not the weak point of the product . for instance , a product which can clean only smooth surface might be use by the owner on rough surface which will probably cause deformation to the product . here , it can be state that this problem be cause by the advertisement which do not include the constraint of the product . finally , there be a great competition between the product of different company which cause the omittion of some ethical value . rather than state the drawback , praise be a common style in the advertisement . To conclude , the advertisement be mislead in most way and these fault must be correct by mean of proper control mechanism . furthermore we should know that frankness be the most important virtue on the earth . One of the most important reason be the lack of time available to the young people for such activity . they be more involve in their career , family , social and sport activity . hence , they seldom find it possible to take time out of their busy schedule . secondly , people be much more competitive nowadays . there be competiton in each and every field today . it be the time where only the fit of people survive . Everyone want to build a good career so that they can provide for their family as well as to ensure a bright and prosperous future . in this rat race , they be leave with no time to think about those outside their family . hence , they choose to turn a blind eye to their responsibility towards their community . lastly , they be not aware of their responsibility and duty as individual towards other . it be sad that few choose of them to remain so still . there be a need for awaken the youth so they become more aware . there be few young people who have still manage to contribute largely to their community . there be many example of television actor and other famous personality who have make their mark by carry out their responsibility to the full . such people be consider as role model by the common public and they inspire the youth of today to continue with their good work . thus , it be true that young people nowadays do not give enough time to help their community . however , it be necessary that they should be remind of their duty as responsible and mature people who hold the key to the future of our nation . youngster and community aid I believe the implication of young people in help their community will vary from one country to another . focus in my home country , Spain , I must say that I do agree in general term with the statement propose . the decline in social concern that western country like Sapain be experience be due , in my opinion , to two main factor : the improvement in the quality of life of middle class family and the reduction in the size of family . Spain have change a lot in the past thirty five year . while some decade ago we still have a considerable proportion of our population living in condition of poverty , that be not the case anymore . middle class have boost in Spain and nowadays it be one of the country with the most disperse distribution of wealth . in this new situation there be less class difference and therefore the need of help the community be not so evident to young people . another important social change in Spain have be the dramatic sreduction of average family size . thirty year ago there be very seldom one-child family in Spain . today , this be the most common situation of family . one-child family usually tend to over-protect the lonely child , and these child become less concern about social aspect of life . therefore they do not spot the need to help the community afterwards when they grow up and become youngster . these two reason just express my opinion and must be take in general term . I be sure there be a lot of other reason why young people do not give time to help the community , but I consider these two as the most important one . it be also important to take into account that there be exception , I know young people that devote a lot of time to help their cummunities and even some that work full time in field relate with community aid , but I just feel this be not the general behavior of this generation . have you ever try to figure out the hard and complicate math question ? some people suggest that it be important for student to learn the fact . on the other hand , i think that understand the concept be much more important than just learn the fact . I suggest my opinion with two reason , people will remember longer when they understand the idea and they will also figure out all the question even though it ' S hard and complicate . first of all , people tend to remember longer when they understand the concept or the idea . however , when they just learn and memorize the fact . they will forget about it quickly . for instance , in biology , I learn about the ` Feedback system ' in human ' S body and I be able to understand how this system work because my mother know about the biology very well . however , my friend , who do n't get halep from anyone , just memorize and learn the whole process of the ` Feedback system ' and a week ago , we have a pop quiz in the biology class . I be manage to figure out all the question about the ` Feedback system ' but my friend could n't solve non of the question . in this case , i be able to answer all these question because I understand how the ` Feedback system ' work then my friend could n't answer them because he forget what he memorize and learn before . secondly , student can figure out any hard question if they fully understand the fact or the idea . this happen a lot in math class . math teacher do n't just ask student easy and simple question , they make the question complicated and hard for student to solve it . student who understand the idea would be able to solve these question . however , student who just memorize or learn the fact will be confuse or hesitate to figure out the question because they have the basic knownledge about the concept and idea . since , student do n't forget or mis-use the knownledge when they understand the consepts and student , who understand the idea and the concept , will manage to figure out all the hard and high-leveled question . above all , I state understand the fact and the idea be much important than just learn the fact . 	KOR
I do agree with the statement that advertisement make product seem good than they be . this should come to no surprise as an advertisement by definition respond to an aim . the aim be not to give an information to the consumer ( for which there be the press ) , but rather , to make the particular pruduct more appealing . an advertisement be suppose to increase the sale of a particular product , which be sell for a profit of course . so the manipulation of the human individual be the purpose of the advertisement . advertisement be sponsor and finance by the producer , who essentially dictate what they should say . this fact be know to everybody , so it be even fair to do some overtstating within limit . of course there be consumer protection law in all western country . these law discourage an advertiser from make outright false claim . so , realistically , outright lie be probably uncommon in advertisement . however within this limitation , it be rather easy to make non verifiable statement or suggestion , which be neither true nor a lie . Anti-aging , cosmetic product be typical example . of course , nobody suggest that you can stop age . but , most advertisement for such product do implictly suggest it as an undelying , implicit , message , without explictly say it , by the layout and set of the advertisement etc . cosmetic product ' advertisement always show fresh , young character who have no issue with age . . . also , advertiser usually try to convey a dream , a feeling , and not a rationaly verifiable message . for instance advertisement for expensive car , watch and generally luxury good always advertise the quality and substance of the product , which be greatly overstate , but in the end , the customer buy it for intangible reason , such as prestige and exclusivity associate with own a luxury product . it be unrealistic that a expensive Swiss manual watch be more reliable , precise , than a cheap Chinese copy . . . but that be not the point . To be successful , it be important to try new stuff even though it seem risky . this contention be lucidly manifasted in history of Mc . Donald and book ` Le Papillon ' . the owner of Mc . Donald , Mr. Kropper , once start business with just restaurant as usually as any other common restaurant . however , the owner think that it do not bring him lot of profit . he want to use new system of sell his food to people . Mc . Donald come up with the an idea about fast food . it begin to produce hamburger rapidly to follow the trend of time period of his day . people be start to open up the new business , they do not have much time to spend in the restaurant with eat . Mc . Donald make food faster so that busy business people could pick up the order food , pay and leave to their place . it be once very successful . Kropper still do not satisfy with this policy . as the usage of car increase , he once more think of fast way to pick and and move , ` Drive-Thru . ' people like it and nowadays , Mc . Donald be one of the famous restaurant that be worldly know . it be pretty risky policy to develop during that time . other member of the company reject this idea because people might not come to his restaurant with great pleasure . however , Kropper have insight to see further future and to try new thing . he be one of the successful people who try new thing with risk . in the book ` Le Papillon ' , write by Bernard Werber , it loculently clarify that try new thing get you new world . protagonist of this book be sick of their world because of the corrupt medias and selfishnes of people . there be several protagonist , but one of the protagonist who be scientist first come up with the idea of escape earth project . not many people in the world would not fund him project , who illustrate people that do not like risk . however , another protagonist , rich businessman step up and give the fund for project . any other businessman or scientist think that plan be too risky and impossible to become real life . the project require budget be spike high that it be very risky for businessman to fund all the money for project . however , the project be very successfully do as a result . when the protagonist get to leave the earth with the spaceship , people those who oppose his idea and risk do not get to leave the earth . it be great success for those who try new thing and take risk for their future . the game that I currently play even show that it be good to have risky quest for great reward . important fact be that try the risky way for more experience and great success rather than just keep thing that already know how to do well just as appeal clearly in the history of Mc . Donalds and in the book ` ` Le Papillon . ' ' 	KOR

I think that we have equally or even more interesting time or even more exciting time while we make our schedule and imagine our trip compare to actual travel . a group travel lead by a tour guide be already plan by travel agency , so we can not make our unique and special choice and plan . additionally , we will be probably restrict to the group ' S decision and behavior even if we have different idea . for example , we can have some chance to choose what to eat even though we travel in a group . however , in this case , we should follow a certain choice that many people select . it be a really sad thing that we can not eat exotic food that we really want while travel foreign country . furthermore , we can not take public transportation because of a reserved tour bus . I find it very interesting and impressive to take other country ' subway , train , bus and tram during my trip . so far as the question be concern , I be not quite at home with the statement that young people do not give enough time to help their community . although it may be argue that the young population be not interested with social and political affair as it be in 1960s . , I believe that young people have willingness to help the communties in which they live . it be a well-known fact that the young population be aware of the communal issue as they be part of a family which belong to the community . in other word , the more they live in family the more they give enough time for their community . for instance , in a village or in a minority group , the young population do not hesitate to participate in the charity program such as visit the hospital , help the old member of the community . they even become a member of NGOs in order to demand or to help for the communal interest . on the other hand , we may acknowledge that there be some current problem to keep the youth intact with their community as well as with their family . the process of globalisation suscitates a global village where individual gain universal attribute and goal rather than interesting with their community . therefore , it become difficult to keep the interest of the internet-based youth appropriate with that of the community . however , this situation can not abandon the young willigness to help their community . consequently , we may consider that young people prefer interesting in private and global objective rather than communal or social one . yet , we should not ignore that they be also active in especially help their community and they find time to help even if they feel themselves busy and overload by the educational or professionnal life . briefly , young people nowadays give time to help their community in spite of the difficulty in their globalised and internet-based life . Now-a-days there be a whole lot of variety be offer wherein special additional feature be buiklt in it like conference room setting or bedroom setting . with such offer it have lot of benefit for the people who be really busy and cant afford to waste time . well with so many benefit its really hard to think that there will be a decline in the number of car in the near future . with the benefit there be also certain disadvantage like the gas emit from the exhaust of the car be pollute the environment and that the fuel use for the functioning of the car be deplete the natural resource . well for the fact that car be increase the air pollution with the development in technology various model be be develop which donot emit any dangerous gas in the atmosphereand for the second disadvantage that they be use the energy resourses new car be be develop and some have already be develop which use solar energy as fuel or run on electrical energy . thus with so many advantage i think the demand for the increase in caras will outnumber its decrease or there wont be any drastic change in the numbe rof car in the near future . thus i think that in the near future there will be an additional number of car than there be today . I think that successful people keep try new thing and do not get stick on any one thing . the world have see many industialists who try different business . though they succeed on some and fail in other , on a whole they emerge as winner . One bright example that I would like to mention be that of an Indian businessman - Tata . Tata put his first foot in the world of business with an automobile manufacturing unit . he collaborate with foreign company to provide good available technology to customer . the business start with truck but soon flourish to other class of vehicle . recently , Tata introduce cheap four wheeler on Indian road for common man . this journey be amazing . but this be not the only thing that Tata do . Tata start different business apart from automobile . tea , salt , information technology , Telecom - he seem to be ubiquitious . he be also successful in these business . now he be plan to take over world famous brand ` Jaguar ' . certainly , Tata take great risk when he start every new industry . but great return demand great risk . a man with vision can handle such risk and emerge out as a winner . these be all quality of a successful person . have Tata be interested only with manufacturing of truck , he never have have such a great impact on all other business area . he try out new thing and his effort pay off . his success surely belong to the way he conquer new opportunity of business . thus , it can surely be say that one who do same thing that he already know how to do well will have less chance to succeed than the one who try different thing and take calculated risk for great reward . understanding idea and concept be very important for student , because it help to remember process easily , for exemple . in the subject biology , it be very hard to learn fact without know for what the fact be necessary in a biological system or process . in history class it be also important to know about the date of event . but if you understand the idea and the development of an event , you can easier put the event in an chronological order . learn fact be very important for student who educate a language for exemple . they have to learn vocabulary to improve their new language . jus student have to learn fact , too , and they have no chance to let that out . student who study medicine also have to learn a lot of vocabulary for anatomy . learn fact about a theme cost a lot of time and be not really helpful in your late work for an enterprise . understanding idea and concept be more likely . it be easy to learn and to understand than fact . fact be just ficional and you often do not know how to use fact properly in an important situation . for exemple : if there be a machine which do not work any more , it be very difficult to check every single fact of the machine . it be easy to think about the whole concept of the machine : How do it work and what do it produce ? in this way it be more easy to find the problem of the defective machine . so , I think , student who want to take a job in an enterprise which be in the trade buisness or in buisnesses with process , have to know more about idea and concept . it be very important to know about the whole work of a process than to know about fact you can easily look up in a book . understanding idea and concept support the ability of think about a problem . and the skill to be able of find a solution for a problem be a skill that make you desirable for a lot of employee . in my opinion , it be supportable to declare that understanding idea and concept be the most important skill for buisness . and that be what student should learn at their university . lastly , from the experience that I have see be that government be truly try to decrease the number of car for critical reason . car may be convienient to the individual that use it , but it have numberous detrimental effect that government and the public have to deal with and clean up . therefore , every year government use a large percentage of their budget to pay up the car expense . expense such as , pollution , car management , car accident and many more . because of such expense , government be reinforce public transportation , such as railway , bus , and subway and be suggest as substitute for car because it be much for cost efficient as well as convienient for its user at the sametime . from my belief and opinion I agree to the specified statement , give that car create major pollution , be inefficient , and costly . sadly , such youngster be few in number . hence , community service be decline these day . To begin with , from my point of view , damage our health be among the drawback of advertisement make product look good than they really be . for instance , in order to get more profit , many medical merchant cheat the consumer by advertise their drug extraggrately . by use this method , the merchant be likely to become rich , however , many costomers who have perchased the medicine may be face with some healthy problem the bad medicine bring about . that be why I say some advertisement make product seem good than they really be . on the other hand , considerable though the benifits that advertisement result in be , they can not compete with the drawback that the advertisement make product seem much good than they really be bring about , if economic issue have be take into deliberation . for example , a number of merchant use advertisement to make their product look good in order to make more money , while the costomers do not realise the fact so they often spend large sum of money to buy a worthless product . after a period of time , they finally find out they be cheated . the example tell us that the impact that ad have on our economicis life be huge . in conclusion , there may be some element of truth in the thought of some people that advertisement do not make the product seem much good than they really be . however , in my mind , most advertisement which make product seem good than they really be really affect many people ' S health and procession . in order to enjoy a healthy and happy life , some measure must be take to manage the advertise industry to make advertisement tell the truth to the massive costomers . I myself be consider a young person and live in a community compromise of both young and old . it be a common perception that young people enjoy themselves more than old people do . however , I think this perception be faulty . in fact it be the old generation who enjoy life more . youth have many advantage . it be perceive that young people enjoy more because they have more energy , enthusiasm and time . however , what they do not account be the society and its demand . with time our society have be evolve , it have become more demanding , more particular and much young , even though the young generation do have more energy , enthusiasm etc. etc. it do not have then time to enjoy . ` ` I wish the week have eight day ' ' - this be a common phrase hear from all young people across the globe . Younsters be push themselves to become responsible and successful citizen everday . they be always want to do more in less time . their life have peer pressure , study pressure , exam pressure , job pressure , personal pressure . add to this be various family , friend and other social obligation . there be too much to achieve in such less time . thus the attribute which should have assist them in enjoy life more become reason for them to work and achieve more . time be always short . in this rush of thing when do one get time to even breathe ? in contrast , the old generation be at a stage where they have undergo all pschylogical , communal , religious , physical metamorphisis . Thank to various state and public policy they be no longer financially dependant in old age . thus they be free to experince life as it be . though they lack in the attribute favour the young generation they compensate by maturity , patience and motivation to truly enjoy life . it be commonly say ` ` Life begin at Sixty ' ' . this be true , because by this age one be free of all responsiblities and obligation and can enjoy life at their own pace . there be true enjoyment only when one have time to experience every minute particle . I think that in order to be successful one have to try new thing , and be bold , creative and innovative . if we do not do that to some degree , we be only repeat what many other people be already do , and eventually we can become obsolete or irrelevant . as an example I can contrast the story of Apple and IBM in the personal computer business . they start at about the same time , both with very innovative product , the Apple Macintosh and the IBM PC . during the year , though , Apple keep innovate the design and the software of his product so that they have always be cutting-edge , unique , even cool and trendy . IBM on the other hand think they could bank on their dominant position in the market for mainframe computer for large business . they assume that their established customer for IBM mainframe would have buy also IBM personal computer , and so they do not make an effort to keep innvovating their design and their software because they think business client do not require that . as a result IBM lose competitiveness and market share when other company start to make cheap ` ` clone ' ' or copy of the IBM personal compute that be more technologically advanced and well look than their IBM counterpart . by keep do what they tought they be able to do well , IBM end up sell the personal computer business entirely , after it become vastly unprofitable . on the other hand , Apple have acquire a large niche market for their Mac computer thank to thier continuous innovation . not only that : Apple have take substatial risk to diversify its product offering by invent new produtcs altogether , such as the iPod and the iPhone , most of whom have be hugely successful . finally , Apple have even take the ultimate risk to change their own name from ` ` Apple Computer ' ' to just ` ` Apple ' ' , to signify their shift from just the computer manufacturing business to the entertainment business . Today Apple sell not just compuetrs , but also consumer electronics such as the iPod and iPhone , and other product and service , such as music downloads . this show how being innovative and willing to take risk can lead to sustained success over time , and on the other hand how replicate our old way can 	ITA
I fundamentally agree with the statement that many advertisement make product seem good than they really be . however , we should not ignore the the benefit of the advertisement for this reason . To begin with , I admit that most advertisement do some exagerations on the product . it be also the reason why the manufacture be so fascinate in make advertisement . the ad arouse our interest by demonstrate how excellent the product be . for example , we can always see the ad for hair clean product on TV . some model or famous start come out to show their extremely shiny and smooth hair , and they tell us the special product be the reason for their beautiful hair . it be really attractive . but when we buy the product from the market and use them , we will find that the result be not as good as the they claim in the ad . from this aspect , we be cheat by the ad . however , the various advertisement play significant role in our life . on the one hand , we can receive some introduction and suggestion from them . imagine when we be shop in the super market , we must to face thousand of brand . there even would be hundred kind of soft drink . if we know nothing about the product , we must spend lot amount of time on selection . with different ad , situation change . we must be aware of several brand of the soft drink , then we can choose from these small range . on the other hand , advertisement have become a big industry . both the customer and the manufacture need the ad firm . and these firm supply large number of job opportunity for our society every year . therefore , the advertisement be necessary for us . last but not least , the quality and service determine the product ' fate ultimately , not the ad . we customer may be cheat once , but not always . besides , not every product be bad . the famous and lasting brand in most field be good enough for the customer , in fact . as this reason , I think it be acceptable when some advertisement exagerate the benefit of the product . base on the above reason , I believe that advertisement would serve good function to our society , although they sometimes make the product seem good than they really be . car be one of our major transport item in modern life . we have be use them for more than @card@ year but it ' S hard to tell what their approximate number will be in twenty year time period as this subject need a large analysis . but some prediction compare their advantage and disadvantage can be make . number of car in use can increase or stay nearly the same in twenty year . first of all , they be not new technology so that they become crucial element of our life . for inctance , we have build large road , bridge or traffic rule to use them effectively and even some of us regard their car as their friend . What be more , although they pollute the environment it could n't prevent people from use them . secondly , they still provide easy access to everywhere compare to plane or train . for instance , we will still be use our car to go near distance . in addition , there can be new material in twenty year time , which will be alternative to petrol and which will enhance the car usage . on the other hand , it ' S also possible to say that number of car in use will lessen in follow year . new transport opportunity can be mention to support this argument . for instance , much accessible and much more efficient vehicle can be preferred in the future . moreover , car use petrol which be a natural resource that wil be finish soon and for which people be be kill for year , so it ' S logical to think that people be already feed up with problem that petrol cause . not only its political and social problem , but also petrol and car have an economical aspect due to the fact that petrol price have be on increase and become very expensive . in conclusion , it ' s possible for car to be popular in follow year as they be up to now . but in my opinion , the backdraws of these little vehicle be so many that , people will find new option in twenty year . besides , none of us want to face war or high price any more . To conclude , I think that there be not only one way to act when you be successful , and that ' S why it ' S really difficult to run a successful business . every successful business manager be different , and take different decision than an other manager in a same situation . To be able to answer this question properly , this topic will be divide into two part : the undergraduate and the graduate student . the undergradutate student will take a diversity of course . this will provide them with a large opportunity that allow them to choose in which field to go later on . for example , in the first two year of the pre-pharmacy degree , we use to take , for instance , cultural study course , art course , which be not relate to pharmacy . and many student shift their major after take these course . they find themselves brilliant in other field . this diversity in course , give them the chance to choose the major that suit them the good . imagine that the student take only major pharmacy course from the first year . this could lead to the failure of many student , because they be not give the chance to study other course . it ' S a serious situation , especially in the academic major that be relate to the public health and safety , such as medicine , pharmacy , engineering , etc . . . however , the graduate student do n't have this problem . they decide to go through a specific field , after take this diversity of course , when they use to be undergraduate student . so , have a broad knowledge of many academic subject will not last forever . and it ' S a complementary of the narrow knowledge . I believe that marketing and advertisement have start to play an interesting role in our life . the number of product available in the market today be increase very fast , and therefore manufacturer be race with each other to make their brand name and product know to people . the question be why do a possible customer remember one product , on the other hand forget the other ? the answer to this question be trivial , somehow the possible customer be convince that ( this can also be on the subconscious level ) one of the product be good than the other , and therefore remember only the good one . this give advertiser all around the world motivation to show the product well than they be , because they need to show that that particular product be the good . the first proof of this can be find in advertisement that present a setting that be not or can not be real . this could be a beach so amazing that it can only be a painting , or a photograph modify use software . I think that the setting be the key to make people believe that what you be offer be something good than they have , because it be be display in an environment that be good than yours . another example of this might be the people in the advertisement , most of the woman in it be very beautiful and most of the man in it be very handsome . What an advertiser be try to achieve by use nearly flawless character be to convince us that we can be like them , all we need to do be to buy that new cellular phone . the bad case be of course when an advertiser claim that a product can do something that it can not in the average . most of the advertisement only give information about the good case , an extreme example could be that how a tooth paste make somone ' S tooth as white as pearl from the ocean , in a clinical experiment . during the time interval , this information be be transmit to our brain , a fast subtitle write in a tiny font size indicate that in this experiment some kind of chemical be also use to amplify the effect of the mention tooth paste . this situation will continue to become a big problem as long as new product be introduce to the global and local market everyday , because this will increase the motivation for advertiser to do so . KOR
old people usually consider young people of our generation as more lazy and more self-centered than young people of their own generation . Eventhough the origin of this belief be easy to understand in individualistic country , I find it difficult to accept the idea that people nowadays do n't give enought time to help their community . indeed , I think that modern society offer more structure and organisation to allow people to help the community indirectly . for instance , system such as the social security system in France allow worker to help indirectly the people need health care by pay taxis . if this idea do not seem to apply directly to young people , once again we can argue that young people be indirectly help their community . for instance , when they spend time work for school in order to get the need skill to eventually find a job and contribute to the wealth of the country . some people would argue on the other hand that governements of modern society do not offer enought to the people who still need individual help , not only in term of money , but mostly in term of time . an example could be the lack of volontiers for the care of retiered people need personnal help . if one approach consist in blame the people have free time , like the young people , for their selfishness , and alternative attitute can be to look at who help , and who do n't help to change the situation . modern society probably reach this point of no-return where people get use to rely on the governement for social issue . therefore its seem reasonnable to give more credit to the people who actually act on the governement - by the power of voting , by protest , or take part in the political life - so that social issue become a major concern . as a conclusion , they be different way of help a comminity , and we can find , depend on the culture or the country , specific group of young people who actually give time to make something usefull , either by work hard at school , or by voting . I read , I forget . I learn , I still forget . I understand , I remember . this translation of a Chinese proverb say it all . a strong and sturdy base be mandatory for every building to stand tall . an understanding of thing be like a base to a human being in the building of his life . it be obviously more important to understand thing that it be to learn fact about them . it be this understanding of a particular topic or a phenomenon which encourage an individual to analyse thing occure around him or her . this can be clarify well as we take a look at the follow example : for instance , we consider the example of an electrical engineer . he have learn from the book fact about domestic power supply . but he have not understand how the process of deliver power be take place . in case of an emergency , if he be require to tackle some power problem , he would n't be able to repair it , or try to troubleshoot it might even prove fatal to him , if he do not have an understanding of the fundamental . consider the example of swimming would not be difficult . if a person have learn the Archimedes ' principle of buoyancy , it obviously would not help him swim . but it would only be possible if a person understand how to swim under proper guidance . All the research expert and scientist around the globe be responsible for new innovation not because they have mug up fact and figure relate to their area , but because they have create their own fact and law use their understanding of the subject . consider the above example and illustration it can be very well say that - it be more important for student to understand idea and concept than it be for them to learn fact . for only this would bring them up as good individual and good thinker who would help in development of their country 	HIN
the reason of success be multiple . on one hand , many people think that to be successful we need to find new solution , anticipate new trend and by the way take risk . on the other hand , people tend to think that experience prevail and that the good way to succeed be to focus on and master what you be already able to do . in my opinion , success be directly link to the risk you be able to take . in the business world , one of the most usual word to explain the success of a company be ` ` innovation ' ' . nowadays , client or shareholder be attrated by company which take risk by offer really new product . the world be move and change , the company which will survive be the company which be able to aniticipate new social or economic trend . for example , easyJet be very successful because this firm understand and analyse the trend of ` ` low-cost ' ' before anyone else . it be risky compare to the traditional and expensive offer . but finally , easyJet or Ryanair be the most popular . indeed , it be quite important to focus on one speciality to be the good in what we do . Nonetheless , people who give the priority to experience be more static in their way of thinking , and have a weak ability of adaptation toward a change environment . people who take risk , for example in an artistical activity , will be award because they go against a kind of conformism . this be exactly what we be look for , in globalised economy . To be successful , we need to be ` ` different ' ' , and take risk for that . To conclude , explore new field bring new idea of business . risk be the basis of success . simply , we can say that ` ` who dare , win ' ' , and even if your objective be not to succeed , risk be important in life because they spice up our daily life . To wrap up , I think the good way to travel be in a group lead by a tour guide . first of all , I can get knowledge and learn deeply about other country . also , I can use money that be spend more effectively . I completely agree with the fact that in twenty year there will be few car in use than there be today . To support my stand there be three valid point . firstly , with the advance technology new and fast mode of transportation be come up like metro , bullet train , intra city express which make it very convinient for people to travel from one place to another and actually consume less amount of time as compare to car which generally take more time because of the traffic jam and all . people rather commute to far off place in metro and train and have already start use their car as mode of transporatation to near station if they have such an option . secondly , with the arrival of Internet and Video telecommunication most of the office find it convinient for its staff to work from their home , eg . software firm , business office and corporation relate with trading of Shares etc . with this trend on , it will take very few year when most of the people will be work from their home . this will automatically reduce the usage of car as most of the people use their car to go to their respective office . finally the most important factor which will determine the reduction in the usage of the car be the scarcity of the fuel . in today world the consumption of fuel be grow exponentially and it seem there be no mean to replenish it , even though various effort be be make world wide . with limited amount of fuel supply the world wont be able to sustain the demand of the market and finally , to come up with the solution so as to reduce the fuel consumption , people will be motivate not to use car and other such vehicle . this will automatically determine less usage of car in the future year . it might be hard to digest but the way thing be turn out to be it seem we will soon stop the usage of one of the most important invention of human history . and it can be very well assume that this time duration will be not more than twenty yeras . I think it highly depend on the character of a person . people might be very successful in do what they have do all their life . usually , they be very experience in what they do and with their knowledge and their background they be able to make the right decision which eventually might lead to a great success . on the other hand , people who take risk and who be willing to learn new thing , new theory and new perspective , can generally be characterize as more open-minded . they have to arrange with new situation and be more flexible . they have to pay attention to the change of market and change with their environment . it can also be assume that people who seek new challenge be more motivate than people who do the same thing every day , because they will not get bore by a daily stupidity . not only that new challenge lead to new opportunity for success , I also think that have and gain knowledge in more than one field rather than be a specialist on one certain topic provide a lot more option for success . be able to follow and take part in discussion on a variety of field might earn the respect of other people . it be a lot easy to give an objective opinion , if one can verify this opinion through solid experience in a variety of field . I think have a wide range of basic knowledge be a lot more impressive than just be able to lecture on one specific topic . people with common sense and a variety of interest might more likely be employ by an employer than probably would be a specialist who have not ever look beyond his narrow borderline . although I can see situation , where experience in do familiar thing can lead to success , I , as to speak for myself , would prefer learn new thing and accord to that I would also be willing to take some risk . despite all these argument on success , I also think that life be a lot more worth living with the opportunity to face new challenge and learn new thing . n't get focus on a specific subject . specialize in one specific subject can make the student know everything in one subject but wo n't make them know almost anything about other subject . people in our era , the value of everything be evaluate by its image create in the mind of humankind . the most popular technique of create the desire image be use marketing methodology . One of the most valid and prevailing marketing tactic be advertise . some faction think that advertisement have the power to make product seem good than they be really , while the other faction assert that it be impossible to make a product seem well by make customer deceive thank to lot of legal legislation and institutional control . however , to me , both side can be correct in different condition . first , not all the country have law and legislation for broadcast fair advertisement that reflect the product just like as it be . in that case , producer can make his product seem more qualify in the advertisement . To illustrate , the cream use for decoration locate on top of cake . in the advertisement , the manufacturer can use shaving cream instead of cake cream in order to benefit from shaving cream ' S durability and viscosity , be there not any regulation about the ethic that should be conduct in the advertisement . because they have the same color , nobody can distinguish the shaving cream that be display in the advertisement as the cake cream from normal cake cream , and all advertisement viewer would probably think that it be a marvellous brand to buy compare to other as no normal cake cream can seem of such good shape and durability . as a result , if there be no legal stimulus for advertisement , with the help of spurious counterpart , the product may be demonstrate as more qualified . however , if there be enough legislation for advertising procedure in a country , it be impossible to guile the customer by give false information about product or use a counterfeit product , as the manufacturer be aware of the fact that he will be punish by the law , if he even tempt to do it . for instance , in the USA , if a producer want an actor to give a testimony for his product , it be a must that the actor should use the product for 6 month before the advertisement . in summary , in the advertisement it be quite possible to make the product seem more qualified than it be if there be no law about that . so more law should be accept in that issue . CHI
One of the major problem of ` homo-urbanis ' , that be , the human being living in urban area , be transportation . with each day , our road be become cram with an increase number of car and our air be infuse with high density of vehicular pollution . obviously there be a limit to how much our infrastructure can support . What happen when there be so many car on the road that there be no more place to move ? that be a rather scary vision . however , it may well be that the number of car on the road twenty year from now will actually be less than what it be today . be n't that a rather exaggerated claim ? after all , even if the world population stabilize as the estimate have indicate , it will still be much large than what it be today . and with increase economic prosperity , more and more people can be expect to own more and more car . True . however , if the current trend be any clue , the number of car should nevertheless reduce . first of all , many country , especially develop nation with large population , be rapidly develop their public transport system to tackle the problem of urban transportation . public transport system be not only more cost effective , they also ensure a good quality of live by eliminate traffic jam and exposure to vehicular pollution . therefore , it will not really be surprising if more and more people take to public transport as the primary means of move about . second , fuel price be expect to rise heavily in next twenty year as world oil reserve get delpleted . in such a scenario , it will be much more economical for people to use public transportation system . such trend be already show in country like India . the Delhi Metro be a success story that well illustrate the point . with high quality service available at low price , even the rich and affluent of Delhi prefer to keep their car at home and use the Metro when they need to travel to the crowded area of the city . Rapid Bus Transit Systems introduce in city like Indore and Bhopal be become increasingly popular amongst citizen . thus , the day may not be far when you might be the only person drive on the road ! in fact , if one want a good quality of live for one and all , one should actually hope that it happen . I also agree with this opinion that young person enjoy life more than old people . To support my opinion , firstly , I would like to disscuss the tendency or the nature of youngers . first of all , they be very curious about new thing . they want to explore everything regardless of danger associate with it . for example , when I be a kid , I be always curious about parachute , and one day what happen , I just jump from my roof top with an umbrella . at that time I do not know , what be fear . so meaning be that , you can not expect this kind of absurd behavior from an old person . even , if an old person do not know the harm associate with the task , he/she might not take risk . secondly , youth do not care for moral value , whereas old people do follow them strictly . from their experience of life , senior people know the value of ethic and would like to follow always . on the other hand , teenager be unlikely to follow the moral value , or they follow reluctantly . thirdly , in my opinion , you can enjoy the life if you do n't have restriction on you activity . old people have resposibilities towards society , as well as towards their own family . while youngers be free to do whatever they want . for an instance , I like to dance publically , and I do whenever I get chance to do it . but I know some old people can not do it because first they think about other opinion such as , what would the society think , or what would be the impact on child . last but not the least , young people be always open to new idea or culture , while old people have narrow mind . it be easy for a young to adapt a new culture in order to learn it . on the other hand , senior person be rigid to their own culture in order to preserve it . conclusion be that , although it be true that old people enjoy life base on their own life time experience , I strongly hold the view that youngers enjoy the life more than them . the main reason be , will to explore new thing , no responsibility , less regard for value or ethic , and more energy to enjoy life . in my opinion there be no single correct answer to this question . of course both way can lead to success . my main reasoning be that it depend on the path one want to follow whether an academic specialization make sense or not . my aim be to explain this argument in the follow sentence by look at the broad academic field of business . in Switzerland , a master student can choose whether he want to specialize in one specific subject - as finance - or to keep his focus on a broad approach which include subject such as marketing , human resource , finance , strategic management , risk management , leadership . To illustrate my hypothesis mention above I will now have a look at two different job within a company . a general manager and his management team need not to be specialize in one specific subject as they have to address problem of many different field - such as leadership issue , marketing decision and financial topic . an important aspect in the job of a manager be the need to quickly decide on many different issue . thus a broad education be actually an advantage . an employee in the financial sector such as in a bank do not need to have such a broad knowledge . rather it be essential that he possess in-depth knowledge of the transaction within the sector and on the sector itself . the job requirement be much more focus . rather than just know little about everything it be advisable to have a solid knowledge of this special topic - and finance for example be actually still a rather broad subject . but of course it be needless to say that knowledge be allways an added asset . however one have to decide first which path will be choose in order to be able to make a sound decision whether an academic specialization make sense . Nowdays korea people , internationally also , prefer to live 30min . to 1hr . distance from their work . this mean they need automobils to go their work . for insatace , my professor who live one hour distance from college , have her own car . she come school every morning use her car , not subway . it be true that there be increase number of people who use public transportation to save money , oil or etc . however , this do not mean they do not have car . they have car their own but just use public transportation in order to save money . when they be run out of time , when they feel tired to waitng bus , or when they want to go somewhere where public transportation do not go , they will take out their personal car and drive . therfore , the need of own car each of one person , the trend of move distance from workplace make increase of car demand . futhermore , even though some people use pblic transportation , they surely poss car . as a result , there will be more car in the road than now . people start the cycle of learn and understand from the moment we be bear . during the cycle , we discover many thing in different way . while understanding of idea and concept can provide us with a basic knowledge of the nature and society that surround us , on the other hand , learn fact give us the opportunity to feel and experience thing that might happen in our life . both of the idea be important , but for student , it be more improtant to learn fact rather than understand idea and concept of a subject . firstly , learn fact be more accurate and reliable in many field of different post . we can find the answer in crime scene investigation , we do n't know the exact cause of the death of the victim until we open the body and examine it thoroughly . a single substance in the artery may have vital influence to human , but in textbook , we ca n't find them . the same thoery apply to the teaching of student in school , especially biology , only through a real experiment can they understand the concept more clearly and correctly . secondly , through learn from the fact , student can remember thing more efficiently , the vivid image of the process of how organ work and respond to each other may leave a strong impression on student , which be easy for them to remember rather than the boring content of the concept or the textbook . as a high school student myself , my classmate and I both prefer the class in lab rather than classroom , they be both exciting and impressive . thirdly , in the view emotional development , learn fact can make one ' S life more colorful by experience and think the connection and consequses of how thing be organize . because at the early year of our life , we learn thing through fact and experience . knowledge we attain at this period be original and pure , they be just the fact , which be more realistic . the more experience we have , the more calm and objective attitude we can have when face with an emergency . as a conclusion , despite that we can get a cut through by learn the concept that be already prove and give to us , we should still try to find the answer by ourselves . successful people try new thing and take risk rather than only do what they already know how to do well . there be several reason why this statement hold true . first of all , people who take risk be usually more adaptable to new situation and feel more secure out of ` ` their comfort zone ' ' . for example , when a student from another country decide to move to a new city with a completely different culture , he be allow himself to experiment new experience , such as the music , the food , the architecture from that city . this factor do not only enrich his life , but broaden his horizon and allow you to think ` ` outside of the box ' ' . additionally , when a person try new thing , they put themselves in a more vulnurable state , thus learn from their mistake and help them build a strong , more powerful personality . for example , when a person know that their option be limitless , and that even if you fail the first time , you be strong enough to try for a second time , their chance for success increase . Sucess can be describe in many different way . many people associate sucess with monetary compensation , other with personal satisfaction . regardless of how success be consider , I believe that take risk will directly improve your chance to be a succesful person . why do young people not give enough time to help their community nowadays ? I presume there be several reason for that . first of all , young people have increasing possibility and money to spend their leisure time , so they might rather spend their time enjoy themselves with friend than to be help the community . another reason might be the change living condition . people nowadays have to be and be more flexible . the number of young people leave their hometown to study in a city far away have increase . young people be change job more frequently than before and thus have to move house . the time a young person spend in one site have shorten and accordingly the feeling of be a part of a community . help a community mean to be motivate as you feel responsible for it . without have spend a certain time in a community your be less motivate to help , as you do not know a lot of people personally . the personal knowledge of people though increase your motivation to help strongly . the strong reason for the fact that young people nowadays help less in community be the changed behaviour towards community . people have become more individual , more focus on themselves and their need . family as much as community do not mean as much to people as they use to in the past . people be economically more independent so that they do not need support and help of the community as much nas in the past . take all those factor into account I would agree that more and more young people tend not to give enough time to help their community . All the advertisement be aim to attract as many customer as they can . and how can they obtain this achivement ? they give mislead and uncredible information of their product . for example , some healthy food will claim its body-building function in the advertisement . but few give any convincing statistical state or trustworthy survey on how it make effort on people who have use it . we may see a set of comparison between a fat girl and a thin girl . but how can we believe it ' S just the effection of the food ? since advertisement use for commercial use , most of them will not provide sientific proof . another interesting phenomenon be that famous actress and actor often appear on the screen to advertise a product . of course , the actress and actor be attractive and beautiful . by these kind of advertisement , we attach the product to these beautiful imago . but the truth be , how many celebrity really use the product they recomment ? they be just invite to say a sentence , show a pose , and etc . . it misguide the costumer to some extent . costumer will connect the product to the good imago in their mind . actually , the product be not so perfect as the advertisement say or the customer think . the reason why there exist such a huge gap between the product in the advertisement and in the fact be because there be n't effective norm to regulate advertisement . no specific policy have give to restrict the advertisement . in fact , exaggeration become one of the keywords in advertisement . I have already disappoint to find a real product in any advertisement . only when our goverment and medium realize the importance to supply the audiance unbiased and true fact instead of the beautiful lie in advertisement , can we choose the product without doult follow the instruction of advertisement . so , when you choose something to buy , do not trust what the advertisement tell you . turn off the television when you see an unblievable product in an advertisement again . a clever customer should try to evaluate and judge a product by him/herself . consider the population of the world today and distribution of income rate among country , it be hard to give an immidiate answer to the question about the number of car in use in twenty year ' time . let me brirefly state why I have choose to emphasize an ambiguity instead of an exact answer . first of all , the population of the world be grow rapidly which might create the impression that there would be more car in use as there would be more people live on earth . it be true for the case of Turkey for example . I come to observe that automobile gallery in Turkey be the good profit maker and also the number of car sell increase dramatically each year . but take from another aspect , it could quite be the opposite . the rapid growth of population be observe more in underdeveloped or developing country whose gross national product or income per capita be very low . then it would be more likely for the citizen of such country to tend to use bus or train which would be a much cheap way of transportation . in India for instance , one can easily notice this situation . secondly , the increase in the number of people live in a city might push its dweller to make use of public transportation . not because that these people can not afford to buy car but because that they do n't want to lose their valuable time on road , stick in the middle of a never-end traffic jam . Let ' s take the example of New York City . even the mayor of this city be say to be use the subway in order to evade from the traffic and promote the use of subway . yet there be also the case of California where we can see anyone at any age to own and drive a car . because of its geographical characteristic , it be almost impossible to live one ' s life without a car in Los Angeles . not that the city be overcrowd such as New York . but because there be mile in between any two destination . as to my personal observation , there be a body of reason both to agree and disagree with the statement . in the end , whatever the sing and predilictions be , we live in a world of unpredictibility and suprises . who know wheter a genious scientist would come up with a more time and energy saving invention than a car , or not ? different way of learn can be teach by a professor or lecturer in order to make it easy for their student to memorize certain study matter . some believe , that try to help their student to understand idea and concept be more important than just learn fact . To begin with , encourage student to develop their own idea and concept about a certain topic and in the end to draw a conclusion , be very likely to have a positive aspect on the student ' S memory . for example , if a student in a history class have the task to think about the way the Geman people must have feel at the end of the Second World War , and s/he work out their feeling of desperation and hopelessness , s/he have learn through experience . moreover , through have understand certain idea and concept , a student can basically transfer them to nowadays situation and as well to another subject or theme . for instance , have learn the concept of social behaviour on a specific example and have understand the idea of it , the student will be easily able to observe the social behaviour , its cause and consequence , in his/her own environment and to compare them to other unsocial behaviour and the way it differ in every country and continent . learn fact surely have its disadvantage in specific exam situation . for example , if a student be beeing ask about when certain historical event take place . especially in the subject of history , learn date by heart be rather important , mostly in order to avoid get mix up with situation that happen before another event and to recieve a basic overview of certain period of time . all thing consider , there be more benefit for student , not only in school but for the entire life , to beeing able to use learn idea and concept in a variety of field than to learn fact that can be easily forget just after the exam have finish . TEL
travel be one of the most effective way a family or an individual could spend quality time , relax or have fun . therefore it be essential that tourist have their vacation orgainised so that they can have the large amount of fun possible . To have a perfectly a orgainised vacation , people should travel in a group lead by a tour guide . there be many benefit to travel with a tour guide . firstly , the tour guide be a trained professional in tourism . he would know which be the good attraction to visit , and what would be an appropriate length of time to spend at each one . he would be able to plan how to spend the whole day effeciently , unlike if a person be alone and have to spend hour decide where to go next . secondly , the tour guide would have ticket ready prior to the visit , and this would enable the group to go straight to the attraction without waste time . for example , to go up the Eiffel Tower in Paris , France , it would , on average , take a person 2 hour to get a ticket in the high season . however a tour guide would get you the ticket well before you arrive there , and then you would n't have to waist a lot of time wait in line . thirdly the tour guide would arrange all the transport in advance , and for example would make arrangment with bus company to have busess present at the correct time , and tell them exactly where to go . if , on the other hand , a person be travel alone , he would waste a lot of time try to get from place to place . there be also a social benefit to travel with a group , as it would be likely that your group consist of people mainly from your home country , and therefore you would be to socialise with them and discuss the attraction you visit , along with the fact that you make new friend . however , some people may argue that have a tour guide deprive them from make their own decision , and their personal choises . also , it would not allow them to do thing that they have always want to do , if they visted a certain country , but this can always be easily solve by extend the vacation a day or two , or if that be not possible , miss the certain guide tour they be not particularly interested in . all in all , I strongly agree that the good way to travel be in a group lead by a tour guide . it ' S advantage significantly overwiegh its disadvantage , and I beleive that most people would have more fun if they travel in group lead by a guide . To hold the people ' S attention , the function of good in advertisement be different with original function of it . my mother be a case in point . she often suffer from bad flu and buy medicine after watch medical advertisement . however , she always fail to find effective medicine for her flu . this be because every good in advertisement seem increasingly perfect for her , but they do not cure her pain . as a result , she have no choice but to buy new medicine . as illustrate above , most advertisement fake people in certain degree of function for more profit . What be more , the time of adverisements be dramatically short and company have to give people impression about their product in the short time . therefore , they have no choice but to make product seem much good than original . One car manufacturer may exaggerate about the spaciousness in the car by compare it to a lounge ambience in its advertisement . another car manufacurer in the same category may emphasize on the outer design of the car compare it with the aerodynamics of a spaceship . thus both the manufacturer have a sell point to be amphasized . but as the say go look can be decieving because all that glitter be not gold . there be so many instance in which the customer be fool into buy a product because of the galmour create around it through advertising . these instance be come to life almost everyday . there be many letter in the ` letter to the editor ' column of newspaper that highlight this point . let us consider a simple example of buy an apartment . One of my close friend want to buy a new apartment . he collect many brochure and visit many incomplete site of construction . he decide to finalize on the basis of the brochure comparison . the brochure of the apartment he zero on spoke about the spacious room , facility like gym , sauna , play park and many more amenity . after actually shift to the apartment he be surprise to see big spacious room accompany with lot of plumbing problem , no gym , the sauna without water in the pipe and so on . but if the advertisement hoarding be to be follow , this be a dream apartment . this be a common case for a large variety of product . go from the advertising point of view , the advertiser be pay to make the product look good even if they actually arent . take an example of a popular razor which show lead sport personality use it . this razor actually cause skin problem to a customer accord to a news paper . but the company that make this ad make profit and successfully help in sell the product . there be many more instance which help in support the statement that advertisement do make product look much good than they actually be and I completely agree with this notion . do successful people try new thing and take risk rather than only do what they already know how to do well ? I do n't agree with that . I think experience , time , and the high possibility of success be the main point to support my opinion . firstly , experience help people to be successful in do one job . if a person have a lot of experience on do one job , he can usually make the good decision when a problem come out . compare to a person who make a decision when he do a new job , he be unexperienced and have no idea which way have more benefit for him . so he can easily make a wrong or bad decision . so successful people would do what they already know how to do well because they have experience . secondly , we need enough time to make our job successful . work a job to be successful be a long process . a person who do a job which he already know how to do well , save a lot of time on understand basic knowledge of the job . then he can spend more time to make the job perfect and and make himself to be successful . finally , a person do a job which he already know how to to do well , he have a high possibility of success than those who try new thing and take risk . as we know , if we try a new job , we have no experience about that and have to spend plenty of time to understand the job . it be risky to do that because we might find out we be not able to make it successful after spend a long period time . on the contrary , if we already know a job well , of course we know what to do to make it successful directly efficiently . I disagree that successful people try new thing and take rick rather than only do what they already know how to do well , because they do n't have experience , enough time and a high possibility of success in do the new job . To demostrate , accord to the research at Harvard , individual trip spend time two time more effectively than grop tour . moreover accord to this study , people who travel individually be also more satisfied with their time consuming and whole travel . in brief , the good way to travel be in a individaul , not in a group because make feel good during trip and well time consuming . Nowdays , knowledge be explode everyday , as a result , it be rather difficult for one to learn broadly and deeply at the same time . have broad knowledge seem attractive , but actually , it be not practical after the second thought . in the academic circle , there be expert and authority in almost every field , all of whom hold some specific research interest and accompishment of their own . if one just spend most of the time on learn knowledge of many subject , he or she may not have the time to do related research . besides , since it be quite easy to gain information currently , it be not necessary to know all , for if you want , you can look the need information soon . however , if one specialize in one specific subject , thing will be quite different , especially when he or she choose a valuable but rarely-touched field . under this situation , he or she will become the expert in this field and it be possible to do some quite profound research on it , which will be more benifitable if one know about a lot but really know little on each subject . as long as the researcher be willing to share their result , communicat to each other , and do teamwork when it be necessary , it do not matter whether all these researcher be able to have broad knowledge . at the same time , to keep some balance , it be also important for a researcher to know some basic knowledge on related subject , which could broaden the eyesight and inspire him or her fresh idea . besides , this will not waste too much time . To sum up , generally , I think it be good for one to specialize in cetain subject , but it will be good to know some concern knowledge at the same time , which can make the work most effectively . the student ' teaching method be very controversive between the approach focus on the fact and the other more base on the concept and the idea . I agree with the statement that it be more important for student to understand idea and concept than it be for them to learn fact for three main reason : understanding idea can help the student to understant fact , it be easy to learn fact individually , understanding idea allow the student to develop its own reflexion and criticism . firstly it seem to me than when a student understand idea and concept than will help it to understand the fact . indeed it would be not very interesting for a student to learn a succesion of fact without know why these fact be happen . for example the history fact be numerous and it be impossible to keep all of them but if you understand the idea of an special historical event you can learn good all the fact that be associate with this event . secondly I think that it be easy to learn the fact individually than understand idea and concept . as a matter of fact , the professor can give to their student key that will help them to understand the idea . at the contrary the fact be not difficult to understand and also the support of the professor be not indispensable . the professor can illustrate the fact with personal experience and therefore make them more interesting but he will not change the fact . finally , I believe that the understanding of idea and concept for a student be the basis of the development of its own reflexion and also to have criticism . by identify the structure of a conceptor a idea , the student can develop its own idea and build also a think system . for instance a student that understand well a special philosophy concept can do its own theory about the concept . To conclude I can say that the understanding of idea and concept be the most important part of a student learn process , even if it be not unnecessary to learn fact but not as the first priority . To be unique in a diverse market environment it be literally inevitable to cheat the buyer . advertisement have to have a short and stong message . due to this briefness it be impossible to present the product in an appropriate and honest way . consumer who buy a product which be advertise as reliable or easy to use often be unsatisfied with what they finally hold in their hand . but who be to blame ? of course the company be present the product in the well possible way , that ' s what I would do too . on the other hand we , the customer , do n't want to hear lenghty advertisement in which product be explain in detail . the phenomenon of wrongly advertise product be not a new one . in my opinion people should be clever enough to know that company say whatever it take to sell a product . for example when a cellphone be advertise the commercial could say : the good cellphone ever build . this statement , of course , can not be prooved by anyone . therefore we have an exageration and probably even a false statement . another example be food and drink . How can a commercial seriously say : the most delicious burger ever . a customer who buy and try it ultimately have the expectation of a great burger . but what if he do n't like it . this mean the advertisement industry be neither able to shape our taste nor to advertise product in a proper way . so far I have be describe the black sheep among the advertising company . Nonetheless there be company who present their product honestly without exaggeration or even lie . especially when comparison be make the customer can be sure to watch a good advertising . in the end it ' S all up the the prospective custome whether a commercial be believe or not . in spite of the benefit of learn fact , I believe that it be more important for student to understand idea and concept . there be three main reason why I have this opinion . in the first hand , I support the idea that understand idea and concept in a field ( for instance economy ) give a overall comprehension of this field and the process that can occur in that field . thus , it allow graduate student that come into the labor market to meet the requirement of numerous job even if they do not study certain characteristic of some task . then , I have the belief that when a student have well understand idea and concept in a field , he be then able not only to understand the new event that can take place in this area , but also to learn itself from this fact . finally , from my perspective , the fact be widely dependant from the time and the condition in which they occur . consequently , an event that take place in a certain situation or a certain country , for example a major worker strike in France before a change in political majority , can not be interpret than one in Bangladesh during a very harsch time . Futhermore , fact may be link to a fashion in the way of thinking or the way of product good . an illustration of this idea could be the the fact that an American citizen sell a lot of French foie gras because he like that at a certain period , but still not do that because of a change in both the relationship between the American government and the French one , and the way to consider the treatment of the duck . however , I admit that learn fact may help a understand concept either not concrete at all or a little difficult . as a conclusion , I think that it be both more important and useful for the future life for student to understand idea and concept . nevertheless , learn fact can sometimes be necessary .
