Let ' s think of a new product we want to develop . if the engineer have an specifical product for example deodrants in roll-on plastic container , and they never try to invent another way to apply the product , they probably would not be able to create the spray applicattions . but let ' s say they formulate this new application use aerosol and they find out that it be affect the ozone layer on the planet because of the gas expel . they can always go back to the roll-on aplication and help the environment . they take the risk with the new technology but it bring a lot of problem so they can go back to the old way to apply the product and solve the problem . these main two reason explain why people have to take risk in their professional environment . however this apply to other thing in your life . like for example , in a personal field let ' s talk about marriage . when you get married you be take a lot of risk . you be sign a contract that last forever , not know what be go to happen in your life . but as I mentoined , this contract can be void and if thing be rough you can get divorce and go back to your single life . you take the risk look for success but it do not work so you can go back and star all over again . it be absolutely true that most of the advertisement make product seem much good than they reallly be . but how this happen ? that be not an easy be question to answer , but I think this be also the only question to make in order to understand why advertisement have this particular effect . I believe that the main strategy use by market analyst be simply to influence people by touch their weakness . Everyone of us for example , or at least most of us , want to be accept by society ( our group of friend or our collegues ) . it be un unconscious process but it be like that , and we can do nothing against it . as a consequence of this process we tend to buy the product that we feel could change in a good way the conception that the other have of us ; any object that could improve of our social image be certainly to be buy . I will try to make an example . if I know that David Beckam shave with a particular aftershave I might think that by use that specific product I will achieve the same social approval he have . that be why most advertisement use famous people to sponsorize a product : because we unconsciously want to be like them . any way , the question be whether there be a solution to this kind of problem , it be in fact a problem the one we be talk about , because link to a weakness of modern social community . I simply think that , consider that we can not change the entire costume of our society , the start point be be aware of this fact . this way of reasoning will make us more critic on advertisment , whose product will seem no more as attractive as we think they be before . I completely agree that student should pay more emphasis to understanding idea and concept rather than superficially mug up fact . a mug up fact with no basic understanding of the idea behind it may seem less time-consuming initially , may enable you score quite well also but in the long run it do no good to you . for . e.g. in a maths test in primary if you merely cram all word problem solution , then please be ready to cram another set of word probelms in primary 6 , 7 , so on . . but if you have understand the concept , you just need to apply the same . and score a in all the class . this be my personal experience . primary 6 , 7 , 8 and 9 , I only study word probelms in primary 6 and never thereafter . merely cram not only hinder your clear vision towards the matter but also block your mental ability to think deep and in a way block your mental growth . if we dont ask ourselves question about subject and donot try to find out answer we be block our own vision . for e.g. if Newton didnot ask himself or make himself to think of why the apple fall , he would not have go to find out answer and give his theory . deep understanding of a matter not only enable you clearly understand but on its own or in other word automatically generate your interest into a subject . and what well than this if you be really enjoy what you be do ? every art come with practice , demand time , devotion and , of course , interest . Learning , not only painting , but infact do science be an art as well . for e.g. , if in your secondary school you learn and understand what titration be conceptually , you will definitely enjoy the moment spend in chemistry lab when you be perform it with your own hand and then see pH become neutral . another interesting example be that of understanding cancer . if you really understand what be the cellular mechanism of cancer and what gene or protein be increase or decrease during the process , it will be so fascinating to study the response or development of cancer merely by study the level of gene and then see the result and then understand them also and then make other to look at what result you have get in your laboratory with appropriate explanation and relate them to cancer , rather than merely act as a foolish worker in your own lab . learn a technique make you merely a worker , as good as a blue collar guy , learn a subject make you a scientist . so in-depth knowledge be not important but mandatory . mug or learn fact make you a worker but to really enjoy and rule a subject one should understand the concept which be something that be go to take one a long way . I believe everybody can not know everything and its not so good to be ` Jack of all trade and master of none ' . specific knowledge be very much desire in both professional and academic field . Specialized knowledge of the subject be many times indispensible . One good example would be from field of medicine , where general Physicians be value but specialist like cardiologist or neurologist be indispensible and be the final option for particular kind of treatment . too much generalize knowledge may become very superficial and will not be of much help in solve complex problem in specific subject . for instance , if we look at the field of science , say biology , a generalize understanding of all its branch be require but a Taxonomist and a biophysicist have very less to do with each other and can not help each other in solve their specific problem . however all this discussion be not mean to diminish the value of general knowledge , as for application of knowledge from one subject in to other require understanding of both . for example if principle of Mathematics be to be apply to biology then general knowledge of both subject be require . however it will be do more appropriately if two specialist i.e. a biologist and a Mathematician interact with each other . also i believe that human memory have its limitation and one should use it judiciously . we should confine and focus our brain towards solve problem relate to specific subject . too much unnecessary knowldge will occupy space in one ' S memory and will not be put to use very often . therefore have General knowledge in moderation be good , but have only general knowledge be of no use . To apply knowledge for usefull purpose one have to specialize in particular subject . 	HIN
I agree with the statment that most advertisement make product seem much good than they really be . here be the reason why . first , advertisement tend to over exeggerate the effect of the product . for example , many cosmetic claim in their advertisement that they have speical element that make your skin white within just two week or make your face look well . when you see the advertisement you will be attract by the slogan or marvel at its magical effect , and you will buy it . there ' s no solid evidence or medical report that prove that the product be that useful , but the advertisement often use beautiful model and exaggerate speech to convince you to buy the product . second , the advertisement be a work be thoroughly and specially design . through the lighten and computer adjustment , the product can be see perfect in the advertisement . take the shampoo advertisement as an example , the model ' S hair always look so shine and smooth in the ad after they use the shampoo . however , the hair be very artificial . there be no way people ' S hair can be that perfect , but the company that produce the shampoo spend a huge amount of money on the film to make you believe that their shampoo be really that good . finally , the advertisement be often sell a concept of lifestyle , not the product itself . it be not the product that be apealing , but the ideal lifestyle beneath it that attracks you . the product can be bad , but as long as you want to have the lifestyle that the advertisement promote , you will buy the product . for instance , in a house ad that emphasize on the idea that single woman can live alone happily , the house itself be not that important . it be the wish to live as a happy single noble that make you want to buy the house . To conclude , the advertisement be a carefully design work that promote concept and often exegerates the product . thus , it make the product seem much better that they really be . 	CHI

people do not always reach success by try new thing and take risk , even though sometimes it be necessary . if someone have the formula for success , whether he/she find it or be give by the environment , he/she should not change it unless want or push to do so . Carlo Ancelotti , coach of AC Milan , an Italian soccer team that have win several tournament and award under his guide , declare on the day before the final of the Champions League ` ` a team that win never change ( set up ) . ' ' the next day , use the same player as the previous game , AC Milan win the Champions League , the most prestigious tournament in soccer . just like Carlo Ancelotti suggest , something successful should often remain uncorrupted to succeed again . not everyone , though , already have this oppurtinity in his/her life . this be the case when a person should shold try new thing and take risk . for instance , consider a large and profitable factory , the son of the boss will not have trouble in order to reach work success ( consider this be the kind of success he be look for ) as his eritage include a business already start and well run , but one of the worker in the factory have great manual skill , but in the factory he do not gain much profit and do not fully use the resource he have . if he never take a risk and never try anything new , he would always work in the same factory and hardly reach success . instead , if he decide to start his own activity , take the risk that such a choice bring , he would have a much large chance to succeed . nevertheless , look at the society in a big scale , risk might be necessary to succeed and develop . in fact there be one important factor to consider : competition . the push force for many people be often other candidate , who try to reach success by do something innovative . Unfortnately , there be time where the success of one be the unsuccess of other . this cycle infact be infinite . the positive aspect of this situation be that the society will always offer new and more innovative thing . therefore success be not always find by do something new and take risk , bet there be time where the situation require it . different approach in education discuss wether it be more important for the student to learn about fact or to understand idea . if one have to choose between both of them , I would say it be more important to learn to understand idea . I will first present some argument to support this point , emphasize on the intellectual importance of the idea . then , I will try to explain how complementary be these point and why they be necessary to any good student . as a student myself , I feel very concerned by this topic , especially because I be a young researcher and the relationship between concept and fact be critical . however , mainly because fact can be learn outside the school I would agree to state it be more important to understand concept . for instance , in my own research about the gentrification of Harlem , I be less interested by the fact and the detail than by understand the whole process and the trend which drive it . it be true it be very important to understand the concept of class , place and territory ( their role , symbol etc ) . I think it the role of the school to learn to the student to think by themselves and it succeed give them the intellectual and conceptual key and tool to understand a problem , and solve it . however , say the concept be more important than the fact ( as it imply in the question ) I face a big ethic problem . in effect , how can you understand a concept or an idea if you do n't know some fact to contextualize it for example . even if fact can be learn differently than in an academic way , they be require . for example , if I do n't know how many people be displace by the gentrification or in what extent the rent rised due to the gentrification , how can I expect to understand the nature of the transformation occure in the neighborhood ? I think concept and fact be link and the reciprocity of their relation be the secret of a good understanding of concept and idea . To conclude , I would say that theorically understand concept be more important but it only can work with very abstract object of study . the reality be more complex and to understand efficiently an idea , you need to know the context and the fact . To choose between a broad knowledge of many academic subject or a good specialization in only one specific subject be not easy , as both possibility have advantage and disadvantage . anyway I agree with the idea that it-s better to have a broad knowledge of several different subject , and that for several reason . first of all , a person with a variety of interest and knowledge in different field be probably a person with an open mind who show a strong intellectual curiosity . famous intellectual of the past , like Leonardo Da Vinci , just to name one of the most know , have an incredible variety of knowledge and curiosity . then , have a broad knowledge of the world in general might help people in their carreer and professional life . also , have a good knowledge in a variety of subjcts doesn-t necessarily mean that a person can-t have a special field of interest in which he or she be more competent . an open mind and a broad culture can be a great advantage in a fast change world as the one we live in today . in fact we must be ready and able to adapt to different situation and condition . on the contrary , if we be too rigid , if we be overspecialized in a very particular field , we might be unable to get the whole picture , so to speak , and we might be less flexible , less able to cope with any change we can have to deal with in our life . of course there-s nothing wrong with be very good in a particular subject we like more . I think that only overspecialization be wrong . if someone be competent and interested only in a very special field , he or she might be very good in his or her job , but might not be able to adapt or to react to situation that require a more general approach . sometimes you read on paper of terrible mistake doctor do in their work , as not understand exactly a patient-s desease or simply confusing symptom describe by patient . that can be due to the fact that some doctor be extremely well prepare in their field , but be sometimes unable to analize the whole situation , and they might miss the fact that they be deal with people and not just with sick kidney or liver , to give an exemple . for all say reason , I do believe that have a broad knowledge of many subject and keep the curiosity and passion for learn all our life be definitely good that limit our knowledge only to a specific field of study . CHI
the issue of specialization be difficult to deal with since plenty of different view have be express on this subject . on the one hand , one can be tempt to think that a great variety of knowledge allow somebody to enlarge his view of certain matter . however , we can not deny that a deep knowledge in a specific subject can sometimes be require to solve some technical problem . take all aspect into account , I be strongly convince that specialization do have more advantage than broad knowledge . To begin with , specialization surely allow a good efficency in problem solve . who would ask a mathematician to read Moliere while he can ask an actor ? as far as I be concern , I be firmly convince that each of us have one or several special skill , that make him different from the other : one play the piano , his brother cook well and I see no reason why the pianist should learn to cook ! on the contrary , he should continue learn piano to improve this particular skill . another way to justify my point of view be to consider it under the professional aspect . in relationship marketing , one make the difference between the ` wait time ' , which be the time the client wait before its problem be take into account by a firm , and the ` solve time ' which be the time need to solve this particular problem . by choose specialist , the firm considerably reduce its ` solve time ' . furthermore , the more different these specialist be , the short the ` wait time ' will become , since a great variety of problem will be thus quickly take into account . lastly , specialization may require from a firm to have a good internal organization . indeed , without such an efficient organization , special skill of each employee may not be use as well as it should be . however , if a firm do settle down such an organization , and do prefer hire specialized worker , its efficiency will surely improve . To conclude , my strong belief be that specialization be a key answer to some persistent economical and political problem . a major stake will thus be to accept the fact that one could not do everything perferctly . Afterall , Billy Wilder be probably right when he write that ` nobody be perfect ' ! 	FRE
Will there be few car in twenty year from now ? my instant reply be no , and mainly because I realize how our technology be rapidly advance , and car will change , change only to make people love them more , satisfy urge for beautiful car model , create more desire to own one . look back into the past since car be first invent , there ' s a huge big difference of how much car be own . compare to before when only the rich own car , car nowadays be get cheap in price , consider the amount of second-hand car be sell and how cheap it be to buy one . as time pass , the rich will continue to buy more car and sell their old one , and at the same time , the low class will buy these use car for a cheap price . with this cycle go on , more and more people will be own car rather than sell them . and why be the rich buying more and more car ? generally it ' S because of the constant change in the car technology ; the desire of speed and unique design . a stereotype view of rich people be people who buy car just because of its look . car company look at this , will exploit this point by come up with more and more uniquely design car . there ' s a rare chance rich people will disappear and their interest in buy these car decrease . on the other hand , there ' ll always be the low class people who be ready to buy these use car at a low price . most of the people want to own a car , and in my opinion , this be a psychological desire ; jealousy . when a person see another person with something they do not have , that person will also want a car . when a rich guy see his friend with a really groovy car , he will also want a unique car of his own . there ' re always more generation join us and with this cycle of jealousy and how the car price fall , it ' ll be easy for people to own car . Conclusionally , I ' d say that in twenty year , or even fifty year , the amount of car usage will only increase but not decrease . unless something well than car join this market and successfully grab car buyer ' attention . Everything else become secondary for them . another reason for their non participation can be trace to the fact that they do not understand the importance of joint famile and thus the concept of loving and sharing be a little alien to them . earlier , the joint famile keep the people together . they be more tolerant , more caring and have good understanding of the importance of community . but , the concept of nuclear family have take away the element of ` together we stand ' away from the youth . last month , the Mumbai blast rock the whole nation and question our unity and security both . the terrorirsts involve be young boy . and if we look at the people who have come to help the victim then we find out that they be not the youth but the middle aged or old people . it be not that all the youngster be unhelpful but yes the majority be far too self centre to come out and give time to their community , to think of its well being . apart from this , their modern value , their distance from religion , their shyness , etc be also play a role in their behaviour . at time , the thought that what can a single man do keep them away from help other . they need to understand that they have the power to dream and change the world . they just have to take a step forward . it be high time that they realise that the community need them as much as they need the community . their survival and development be dependent on the community of which they be a part . their involvement will do lot of good to them and to their community as well . it be commonly assume that most advertisement make product seem much good than they really be . Althought it might not be exact for every advertisement , this gap between reality and representation be experience on a daily basis . first , we have to keep in mind the primary goal of an advertisement , which be to attract customer to a specific product . hence , advertisement maker have to rely on commercial technics that give the impression that their product be not only good , but that it be good than other product of the same category . it be precisely in this process that a gap may occure between what the product really be , and how it be present to the customer . even if we assume that the advertisement maker be aware of the basic quality of a product , what be to be understand be that their goal be to make you think that you need this particular product , hence emphasize it ' S quality and of course pass under silence it ' s negative aspect . this unbalance and bias view on the product inherent value will surely produce a distorted perception of it ' s real desirability , make it seem much good than it really be . the car industry provide numerous example of this phenomenon . this very competitive market force advertisement maker to present every car as they be perfectly fit for you , which be not always the case . for example , American car maker have the tendency to promote their vehicule by state their durability and their power . but they naturally never mention the fact that these vehicules be much more energy-consume than non-american car . hence , if one rely only on the advertisement , he will be conviced that this particular American automobile be a really good product . but , if he buy it , he will soon realize that his vehicule have a high gas consumption rate . he then might have the feeling that he make the wrong choice , that the vehicule be not as good for him as the advertisement pretented . this illustration show clearly that advertisement be by definition enhance the apparent value of a product in order to sell it . it ' S the ` ` eternal strife ' ' between the seller and the customer . as we walk through the street of a city today and just look around , if we just give a glance to a newspaper or a magazine , if we turn on the TV for a few second , what we see be that we live in a culture make for a great part of advertisement . What they be be easy to define : short , colourful , attract and effective ( or suppose to be so ) message , call our attenction to product of the most various sort . What ' S behind their glitter surface ? that ' s the question that amaze and sometimes confuse the customer and that he go on wonder for some time . unfortunately , the answer be that often what we find be not what we expect to handle and we have to conclude that teh single product be not such a good staff as it be suppose to be . for example , some year ago a famous industry have for some time its car advertise by a short movie , in which the car be run on the water around Mount S. Michel , France . it be really impressive , but as the car come out in the market , it reveal to be inferior to the standard of the house . a field especially affect by mislead advertisement be that of food stuff : deli present as prodigious or incredibly tasty have often not safe origin , or not good taste . the reason that hide behind all of that , you can easily track out : marketing be one of the fine and most expensive business of our time . marketing be go to look more and more like an art , whose task be not to inform the customer about real quality of the product , but to make the good of it , to describe it in the most imaginative and intriguing way . it ' S also important to remember that a great amount of money be invest in trade by single or group seller and the effort to have effective advertisement be normally equal to the productive effort . as it happen normally in human life , be possible to find a glance of good just adopt the right perspective : about advertisement , maybe ther will be a time when we should not ask if they be relieble or not , if they tell us the truth or an amount of lie . just look or listen to the storey and enjoy the glitter tale ! instance it be a known fact that the average use of car be around 1 , 5 people per car worldwide which prove how inefficient car be compare to massive transportation way such as train , ship and plane . in addition to this car aslo create a trafic problem which be uncomparable to its alternative . despite car seem like provide more accesibility than their alternative since one can drive whereever he want and whenever , this fact also seem like it be change . it may be the case that , twenty year from now , plane and train will develop to an extend that they will be cheap to use and more frequent in destination . at this point it should also be remember that car have considerable upkeep cost due to repair and taxis which will eventually become a luxury compare to its alternative . apart from loose its chance among its alternative car will most likely be force to reduce in number due to their harmful affect on the enviroment . the fundamental need of a car to run be oil and this fact be unlikely to change in come twenty year . regard increase concern on the global warming this need of car will make it likely to be replace . in addition to harmful gas release car also damage enviromet by create sound pollution and indirectly by driver demand more road . the more car there will be the more road and sound pollution there will be as well . subsequently these will make people take a decision between alter their mobility style or face result of enviroamental disorder . in conclusion , it seem that because of the drive mention here and many possible other that extend the stop a change in choice . it be because that maybe other industry will take the advantage of their increase usage and will develop futher technology which will make them uncomperable to car . I disagree that travel in a group lead by a tour guide be good than travel on our own . from personal experieces , I ' ve learn that tour on our own give more oppurtunity to be more knowlegable about the place we ' re travel , more time to travel unknown place , and more chance to communicate with local . as a personal example when I go to Cambodia last winter , I go with a tour group lead by a guide . before I go I know I have to study about the place I would go , but I postpone such duty because I be expect the guide to explain everything . just as I expect , when I go to ancient site in Cambodia the tour guide explain every little detail , leave no space for me to further find out . however , when I go to Europe by myself this winter , I feel oblige to study about the background information or about the European history because there be no guide to answer my question . the fact that I be plan all the journey on my own give me more resposibility to study about the place I would go to . such case be not merely limit to my personal example . also when we travel with a group lead by a guide , we have to follow with the tuor company ' s tight schedule . out itinery be often schedule and we merely follow where the guide take us . we do n't have much free time to ramble around new place other than the famous tour cite . however , when we ' re on ourselves we do n't have to move accordingly to a fit schedule . we be free to go anywhere we ' d like . other than famous tour cite , we could simply go to local market or take a walk down the street -- place that be ordinary but also place where we can smell the local ' S custom and culture . furthermore , when we ' re travel with a guide we ' re too busy follow the tight schedule to acutally communicate with the local . tour with a guide often end with visit famous cite and take picture . but when travel on your own , we have more chance to actually be friend with the local . although there might be some language barrier , we can use body language and talk with local about their life-style , custom , and culture . travel on a group lead by a guide lack the precious moment to learn about a country in a first-hand experience . travel in a group lead by a tour guide surely do have some benefit . we do n't have to plan all our schedule , and we do n't need to worry about not know something because the guide be there for you to explain everything . however , so far from all my journey , the most memorable and long lasting experience be those that I travel by myself . start from schedule my itinerary , study about the country , explore new place , and meeting people from walk of street be truly the valuable and the real journey I never forget . ' ' one need to have some sort of experience in an area to be successful ; for example a previous mistake or a wrong decision that have be make . To begin with , I would like to give an example of my personal experience . in the summer of the year @card@ , I have dislocate my knee during a physical education class at school . we be play kickball and it be my turn to kick the ball and run . due to the slippery floor of the court , I have slip and almost break my left leg . it take me a large amount of time to start walk , run and even sit again , and the doctor have forbid me from play any sort of sport again , as there be a big risk that the same accident would happen again . however , I do not listen to the word of the doctor and start play basketball , my favorite sport , as soon as I be able to run again . I even join the Varsity Girls Basketball Team of my school . now the season be over , and I be glad that I take the risk . however , if I hurt myself again , I would never regret what I do , because I would take a lesson out of it : not to disobey my parent and my doctor again . another example of take risk and try new thing would be join the chess club of my school . I have never play chess in my entire life , but as soon as I join the club , my knowledge of logical thinking have flourish . I enjoy play the game , even outside of the club , and I be proud that I take the risk and join the club , even though I be nervous and shy at the beginning . some people tend to hate seafood , while other can not live without it . I believe this be a matter of choice and sometimes a matter of experience . disregard people who have allergy , an ordinary human being would enjoy eat something if they be raise eat it . I be a seafood fanatic , and therefore adore eat Japanese food . sushi , the most common type , be something I eat every week . some of my friend , however , highly dislike Sushi . my good friend at school have never try eat Sushi in her life , but she tell me about her hunger for seafood several time . therefore , I take her to a Japanese restaurant once , try to convince her to eat Sushi . she do not want to eat it at first , however when she try it , she absolutely love it . now , every week me and her go to our favorite destination , the Japanese Restaurant . experience be something that happen once in a life time , and can be use numerous time for different thing . I believe that try new thing and take risk , such as visit different country and ride the fast train in an amusement park , will expand a person ' s overall knowledge and turn them to an open-minded person . I think that do the same thing such as do what they already know how to do well provide only the same consequense . there be no improvement and progress . in such case , we can not be success because success have to do with something superior to otheres . in other word , even if the method be superior to other at one time , it be the same level or inferior to other for a while . for instance , Ichiro Suzuki , who be a major league baseball player , continue to seek the new butt method to improve it every year . needless to say , he be one of the most successful people . third , successful people tend to have challenging spirit . teaching , learn , study : it ' s all a method ! during our school and college year , we have all have the chance to experience many teaching method throughout our professor . when some teacher believe that it be more important for student to understand idea and concept , other believe that what matter be learn the fact . during lecture , professor try to pass along a certain idea or concept to his student . undoubtedly , lecture be too theoratical and not too exciting , but remain essential . What will the student remember on the day of his exam from his lecture ? What be he supposed to remember ? I believe that part of make study an enjoyable experience , be understand the material we be study . once we have understand the material , it be print logically in our head . understand a lesson begin with understand the idea and concept , as they form the essence of the material . but to understand the idea and concept , especially when it come to complex idea and concept , it seem useful to start by learn the fact . learn the fact make you understand the idea and concept more easily . for example , if a student want to understand Einsten ' s concept of relativity , a revolutionary concept in physic , it would better to start with the fact . once the student would have understand the fact about the relativity concept , he could be more capable of understand the concept as a whole . therefore , i believe that it be as important to understand idea and concept , as it be to learn fact : the two be link to one another , lead to a good understanding of the material . as the young generation of child and teeangers continue to display themselves as unique , wild , and crazy , people tend to think they do not contribute to the community or promote altruism . in fact , they tend to think young people do the opposite . this assumption be not entirely a fabrication . there be countless of child who be willing up to give up their time to help the community . these occurences can be observe anywhere , especially in school . several school offer a myriad of student activity that help their community , which student volunteer generously . the most popular program among the student be orphanage or retirement home visit . student voluntarily sacrifice their time afterschool to take the hike to an orphanage or retirement home nearby . during these visit , student play with the child , exchange conversation with the elderly , help clean up trash around the area , all in all , promote warmth and happiness to the community . undoubtedly , these generous act promote a good environment . another program include Amnesty International , which take help community to an international level . student organize themselves into group and become aware of social and political injustice around the world . with knowledge , they promote social awareness and facilitate active political participation to fellow student by write letter to government . be future leader of the world , not only be they aggregate interest to government for the community , they be influence other to become equally aware of the world around them . undeniably , sometimes young people do become lazy and not help the community . they rather enjoy luxurious time in front of the television or play video game . sometimes young people just need their relaxation time and enjoy themselves as kid . a childhood must also be dominantly characterise by exuberance . furthermore , there will always be other more responsible kid do more helpful work for the community to counterbalance the laziness of other . benevolence and sacrifice be an indication of maturity . countless of young people already help the community voluntarily as see in the various successful school activity . however , young people be still grow and adapt . if they be n't , we should n't hinder the process and let them enjoy their childhood . First let us consider those case in which the author ' S contensions , in fact my contensions , hold good . firstly let us consider the field of science and technology . consider for example a biology student be face with the problem of replace the burn out fuse . if he do not have any knowledge about the electrical subject he may not be able to fix a very simple task . also a student of technology should have minimum idea of what medicine to take when a minor health problem arise . so a broad knowledge of many academic subject be necessary . secondly , if for example a student be confine to study only the history of his own country which be his specific academic subject then he may face problem when ask about the world history and some important event in the world history . thirdly , consider the example of desiging a computer . many people who do different task be involve in desiging a computer . if the person who design a part of the computer do not understand the funtions of other part and the link between those part then a computer can not be design . finally , also a person of sceince or technology may find difficulty in the bussiness world if he do not anything about the stock market . this can be extend even to politics . if the party member have idea only about their own party then they be at risk of lose their position if they do not have the knowlede about the other party . in sum , I would like to reiterate that it be good to have broad knowledge of many acdemic subject than to specialize in one specific subject which help an individual enhance his general knowledge in addition to the regular subject . generally people which be remebered be those who leave a trace of their life in history . nobody remember or notice a person whose life have be carry out in an anonimous pattern . we notice what stem out from daylife , something exceptional , new . the key for success be risk . Oscar Wilde use to say that an idea which be not risky can not be consider as an idea . To give evidence to this statement we be go to outline some main point and then summarize with conclusion and caveat . first of all , nowadays we consider successful people who occupy certain social position due to their effort in seek their place . this successful social position vary depend on culture . nevertheless , this position be regard as successful when the position itself be exceptional . nobody would consider successful someone who work in a normal or standard position . this mean that success depend on extraordinary situation carry out in particular condition : it be find a new solution , a new idea to obtain something . secondly , people will recognise success only when it be visible . if nothing could lead us to distinguish something from normality , we would not be able to determine the difference between the two . we will not be thus capable of recognise the new into the normal . hence this will not be differentiable . success be also difference , uniqueness . in other word new thing . third , state that success be base on difference and new idea , it be also to be say that news find their root in risk . elaborate something new , it be not possible to understand whether it will be regard as something really new and meet the taste of the other or will just fail to communicate its difference . this uncertainty have to deal with risk . To be notice as different one idea have to be new , thus risky . To conclude , we demostrated that success come from difference from normality ; exceptionality and risk . the last factor be perhaps the essential key for success . as Oscar Wilde say . 	ITA

I totally agree with the statement that most advertisment make product seem much good than they really be . I have three reason to explain this . first , the aim of the advertisment be to sale more product . no producer want to decrease the function of the product in the adversitiment . on the contray , the producer will try their good to show the positive aspect of the product and minimize the negative aspect . so , the product in the advertisement will only have the advantage . for example , the advertisement of the medicine will only tell the custom which disease it can curve and neglect the serious point of the medicine . some custom will be extra-damaged by the medicine for the negative aspect of the medicine . second , in order to sale more product , the producer enlarge the function of the product in the advertisement . the product in the advertisement will be much good . for example , the mineralize water be good to the health of human body . some producer take the mineralize water as penecean which can be use as medicine to some illness . third , the advertisement be a good too . the advertiser can sale it only when it can satisfy the producer of the product . that mean the advertiser need to make sure the product in the advertisement should be excellent , even good than it actually it . from the above , we can draw a conclusion that the product in most advertisement be not the same as themselves . their funcitions be be enlarge in the advertisement . so , the goverment should care about this problem to let the custom know the truth of the product . young people be energetic and drive , so they have a responsibility to use their talent meaningfully . it be expect that they be enthusiastic about give back to the community that raise them . but what action constitute ` ` help ' ' our community ? voluntary work at non-profit organization seem to be the easy answer . small act of kindness - like help a senior citizen cross the road - be often cite as way for young people to serve the community . I believe that any work - paid or unpaid - do for the right intention should count as help our community . have say that , I think that the amount of time young people nowadays devote to their community be regrettably lack . I personally know a few young people who have never do an hour of voluntary work in their life . not only be they uninterested in the welfare of their fellow citizen , neither do they see any point in serve their own family member or friend . since they fail to see beyond themselves , there be no hope that they will give any time to help the community at large . most educate young people have a vague sense of responsibility involve their community , but there be so many distraction that prevent them from devote time to it . peer pressure , new technology , the mass medium and pop culture simply teach them all to concentrate on themselves and try to live a happy , materialistic life . it be a pity , since so many young people be lead away from exercise their civic responsibility . no matter how much they be tell by parent to help their community , it be impractical if there be so many distraction in their life . many young people do a small part in help the community by do community service . however , performance be n't satisfactory either . even if they be do voluntary work for no monetary pay , many young people be inevitably wait for payment in some other form - point for an academic scheme , an impressive mention in their resume , or an award for ` ` outstanding service ' ' . if they be intent on these superficial reward , what follow be that the extent of their help will not be proportionate . moreover , what little heart they have for service will diminish quickly , and of course this be definitely not ` ` enough ' ' . in some situation , it be certainly understandable that young people choose other activity over service . student should put their study on high priority , and young people in general seek excitement and new experience , so they be entitle to some level of self-centeredness . in fact , pursue wild , creative way of do thing will probably be a help to community , if these young people choose to lend their talent and innovation accordingly . this require a much deep understanding than exist in the young people of today , but it also go to show that the measure of contribution be hardly as simple as time - it involve an awareness and some heart in all of us . who enjoy life more , young people or old people ? in my opinion , I tend to say that old people enjoy life more . first of all , old people have much more leisure time than young people . as old people have already work for a long time , they need not work so hard as young people . they need not struggle so hard for survival as young people do . as a result , old people have more leisure than yound people . with more leisure time , old people can travel , can have holiday with their family , and can do other activies . imagine what young people be do when old people be enjoy their life . student at universites may be busy with write their assigments , cram for exam . those who have job may be do extra work in the office . How miserable they be ! secondly , old people have more money compare with young people , make them lead more comfortable life . as old people have work long time than young people , they earn more money and have more saving , which can make them afford long distance travel to Paris , to Rome , or even to space , depend their financial ability . however , young people can only enjoy the short trip and some hikings . though no one can deny the interest that short trip and hikings can bring , they can not be comparable to those bring by the the romantic travel abroad . thirdly , old people can manage their life well than those young people due to their long living and social experience . old people know what be most important to them . they know that enjoyment of life , instead of make money or working be more important to them . they know the value of be together with their family member , so they try their good to accompany their wife or husband . on the contrary , accord to my knowledge , most young people do not realize what be important to them . they make every possible effort to make money and grasp every chance to get promote in their work place , neglect the happiness of be accompany and accompany their family member . in conclusion , I think that old people enjoy life more because they have more time , more money , and they can manage their life more efi . we live in an age where information be exchange between continent on the click of a mouse , where geography have cease to define distance . What i try to mean be that with globalisation come competition . accord to me , to stay ahead in this highly competitive race one have to excel or master in whatever academic field one may be . this mastery of an academic subject can only be attain by specialize in that particular subject rather than have only a broad knowledge about various related subject . the old cliche ` ` Jack of all trade but master of none ' ' do not appeal much to me . I would like to elucidate my theory of specialize in a particular subject be well than have knowledge of various academic subject by cite a practical example . obviously a company would prefer a man with a master degree in Chemical engineering to another man apply for the same job but with a diploma in chemical engineering and a diploma in biological engineering . even if the company would employ the latter for his skill in both chemistry as well as biology he would definitly be give a post subordinate to that of the former & a pay package which would be lesser than the former . however if the man with the diploma would hold a degree in say a managment course and if the company would also require the managerial skill at the same time then it would be a different question all together . To sum it up i would say that a specialized course in today world be give a high priority in the competitive market . 	HIN

the pesipicuous phrase , ` ` on the move ' ' have probably be term after much thought . Research show that since the dawn of civilisation , man have be a tourist in a crude sense . this be evident in the study of nomad , shift agriculture and the like . however , my purpose to highlight this fact be not to discuss history but to merely initiate the debate whether there ' ll be few car in the come twenty year or not . in my opinion , the number of car produce in the future will be on the rise rather than pass a declination . I would like to support my stand with the follow reason . the automative industry have witness a manifold increase since man have invent the wheel . so , to believe that this rise will ever decline , be highly unlikely and improbable . firstly , economic review show that living condition will improve in the future which mean people have great leisure time . that go out to suggest that people will have more time to spend with their family and go out on vacation and use car people can drive to farther destination . even if the thought be inclinated to the rich , there be another reason to believe why car production will increase . there have always be a focus on science and technology improve the nature of thing and car be not an exception . Infact , lot of investment be go into make solar car and good fuel efficient car . certainly , the expenditure be do on the research be not to never make use of it in the future . this suggest that people want to have more car in the future . lastly , necessity be be combine with luxury in the economic arena as of today . when people have a proportionate rise in income , they use less of public utility service . take the middle income group as an example , I would like to illustrate that an increase in income always shift people ' S preference to personalise commodity . one would definitely want to own something when one have the money to do so and with the economic development throughout the world , people would like to switch to own their own car than use the public transport system . therefore , I believe that indeed there will be more car in the year to come . One thing history teach manking be that extreme be never the good solution . they might serve one purpose for a short term , but on the longer run they usually reveal their shortcoming . the very same rule can be apply in this case . at a first glance , the advantage of a specified knowledge seem to be overwhelming . nearly every modern companie or even scientist in university serve as good example . To be successful in your part of busines , you have to know everything about it , and additional knowledge only serve as distraction . since the time of big breaktrough-inventions be all go , everybody specialize on a very narrow field . on a small subject , we now have an absolute expert , know nearly everything about it . To a certain extend this be absolutely necessary . who else can deal with nano-composites , for example , exept someone who have study this subject for many year ? but as soon as an wide overview be need , this type of scientist very often fail How can he know about new method in medicine , that might well be adopt within the field of nano composite , if all they ever study be nano-composites ? it be therefore possible , that lack interdisciplinary skill often result in disadvantage . furthermore , a person with a tremendous amount of knowledge on only one field most definitely lack interest in other thing , and therefore miss so many thing in life . the other extreme would be people who know something about everything , but nothing of importance about any specific field . while these scientist might have the interdisciplinary skill , they would certainly lack the knowledge they need to combine anything of real use and importance . there be simply no need for these person in academia , since a certain understanding of specific problem be always need . I therefore strongly support the idea of a combination of these two type . of course I be aware of the fact , that we can never gain specific knowledge on all academic subject . this will remain an illusion . I favor the humanistic approach . specialize on one or two subject , but never loose your abilitie to overview a wide field . if you be a mechanical engineer , do n't loose your interest for theatre . One the one hand , you might get the expression that young people enjoy life more than old one if you observe from outside . but the only reason for that be , that young people live their life more active than old one . they try new thing , have fun whenever there be the chance to have and make their own experience in order to develope a personality . student for instance like to go to partys or hang around at the beach play soccer because they know , that in later professional life they will not have the chance to act like that . on the other hand old people have gather a vast amount of experience during their life . consequently they do no longer feel any pressure to act like young one . I believe that they also do have an active , excited life in their youth . but with a certain decrease in age , other thing like family , health or financial sercurity become more and more important for them . so in my state of view , they simple have a distict way of enjoy their life . they get their satisfaction by go for a healthy walk in the park or have a cup of tea with their husband or wife in the nice restaurant next to the beach . Unfortunatelly these fact be invisble to people you observe from outside , so the wrong impression might come up that old people do not enjoy their life . all thing recommend , I would state that neither the young nor the old people enjoy their life more . both group have its own way to enjoy their life . the youth often express more active while old people be satisfy by a calm and especially healthy life . Later on , after the cold war period , post-modern advertisement concentrate on the image or impression of advertisement begin flourishing and it have be mainstream of advertising technology untill present . now , here come the problem . post-modern advertisement tie mainly with appeal method of impression and to appeal other , it need such accentuation of positive portion and slip out negative aspect or to cover the weakness of product competitiveness in utility , they will have to concentrate on overwhelming person with the other good aspect of product such as design . this , can be say that advertisement nowadays make their product seem well . it might be limit example for my country but as it be fair example , I ' ll discuss it . in my country , insurance company put tremendous asset to visual advertisement . they put some word like ` ` no additional money to pay for 2 month ' ' in big letter while they put some negative but crucial information in letter that ca n't even be see without glass . people see the condition only write in the big letter which seem pretty charming to us , people . however , they realize that they be fake when they actually borrow loan from that company . there be other method in make a product seem good than it be . it be not tell about utility or any other practical value but depict beauty merely . this be especially severe in visual advertisement . impress image overwhelm person that the person forget the real use of product be actually limited and sometimes , advertisement use person ' s mind tend to follow celebrity and hire celebrity in make advertisement . person , just mimic celebrity then . surprising psychological method inherents in post-modern advertisement tempting persom to purchase product . by minimize shortcoming and accentuate merit or by visually overwhelming person without any utilarian usefulness , advertisement show product good than it be actually and people often dull , get fake by advertisement . definitely , we ' ll have to be aware of this that we do n't get fake . due to the reason above , I think that most advertisement make product seem much good than their reality , they can assess value to certain action on the basis of their past experience . they know what to do in order to enjoy certain positive feeling , as well as they know what to avoid . this mean that people , once they become old , have all the necessary resource in order to exploit their knowledge on themselves , and hence collect the fruit of their life as young people . in addition , although some people believe that money do not make happiness , old people be more likely to have money to spend for themselves , make them enjoy life in more way . this would imply that you start to enjoy life only at a certain age . however , there be the opposite pont of view , which be the one of the statement . young people , or at least most of them , do not have many thing to worry about . it be up to their parent to control and administer the so call ` dirty work ` , whilst they be free to grow up . this show that people , during the early stage of life , have plenty of time to dedicate to themselves , to the discovery of new thing . if it be true that old people know what thing they like and what they do n't , with the advantage of not have to experiment anymore , it be also true that youngster have the possibility of go through the process of discover , which be probably the most interesting and fulfill of all , as it give you the opportunity of know new thing and experience new feeling , which be previously unknown . for example , people usually remember their first kiss , rather than their last . in conclusion , I would say that life can be enjoy at every stage , when you be young and when you be old , although in different way . the first period of life should be dedicate to discover what you like and enjoy , whilst the last should be dedicate to the exploitation of such discovery . I will explain you why around three main point . first of all , in my opinion , I trully think that trip preparation be a complete part of the travel experience . if you follow a group lead by a tour guide , you will not be able to discover the country or city you will visit in advance . reading , the Lonely Planet , spending hour on Google watch for some advise on the good place to go be a great time . secondly , in a group lead by a tour guide , you have to follow . for me , it mean that you be not free to do what you want , when you want . the bad thing be that they be tell you when you have free time ! in a trip , I go through a lot of different mood . sometimes I like move quickly from one place to an other , but sometimes , and it happen quite often , it be real pleasure to relax , take time , and enjoy the moment . from my point of view it ' S essential to follow our rythm . last but not least , the departure and return flight be most of the time schedule in the middle of the night and in unknown airport . we all know that tour guide want to reduce cost and get a good rentability . that be the reason why , they prefer to choose big airplane charter with small seat to put more people in it . in addition they use small airport which be clearly cheap . the travel become painfull , and it affect your trip appreciation . that be why , I disagree with the idea that the good way to travel be in a group lead by a tour guide . there be many other way to have a good time in a trip than this one . Let ' s take cell phone for an example . there be many company produce cell phone all over the world , and each company also provide many different type . last year , I lose a cell phone and decide to buy a new one . I be a t a loss as to what to buy , and I finally buy one with the most attractable advertisement in a store . after I use it for a while , I easily find that it be difficult for me to use it because of many unnecessary accessory function . I usually use cell phone only as a mobile telephone , and so I do not need a function of take a picyure . therefore , I really find that it be important to discern the advertisement more carefully . the second reason be that the producer partly believe that the real quality of the product be first know after many people use them . in this regard , producer be eager to sell the product in the first place . they consider the problem of the product after the consumer claim to them . it be not really a good attitude , but this idea be also rampant and be derive from the idea that selling product be the most important thing for producer as I metioned in the first reason . however , society have change its regard of a recall movement , so this attitude become risky and risky in the develop country . in summary , I agree with the opinion that most advertisement make product seem much good than they really be . I think that both understanding idea and learn fact be equally important for a student , but if I be force to choose between the option I would say that understanding idea and concept be more important than learn a list of fact . the comprehension of the idea that give the meaning to a fact will enable the student to understand all the fact that be base on that same idea . for example : teacher teach the child how to add number by explain them how addition work , not by tell them that 2 + 2 = 4 , that 2 + 3 = 5 and so on . when a child have understand the idea and the concept of addition he ' ll be able to make all sort of addition . What i really mean to say be that the understanding of a concept will lead you to the full comprehension of several fact of the same kind . on the other hand i can not avoid to notice that we face a big risk in focus too much on idea and concept : the risk of leave out the reality . reality be very important because it ' s the point we tend to : all idea and concept be study to give reason on thing we ' ve see in our experience , if we do not refer to reality we would be just speak about nothing , our talking would be only speculation which be not usefull to us . I would say that we need a balance between the two thing , because they be both important to the student : i think that a good method of make them understand a theory or a concept would be give them example , because talk about experience be effecive in make them realize what concept we be deal with . on the other hand I think that when a teacher talk about a specific fact he should always say what be the idea that stay behind that fact so that he woul obtain two important result : fistly the student would fully understand the fact in its implication , cause , consequence ( for example why a war be declare , what consequence it have . . ) and secondly the student would be able to understand many fact of the same kind because they may recognize the same idea behind other fact . I believe that a strong conclusion tell that have a broad knowledge of academic subject be well than specialize in one specific subject would be faulty . there be both advantage and disadvantage of the two . First , be an expert on a specialized field be unquestionably necessary . the development of science be base on use the knowledge gain by our ancestor . so . in order to make use of previously conduct research on specific topic and to take them to further point , we need specialist . a man have a broad knowledge in many field would not work in this kind of a situation . second , in our daily life , we can clearly observe the necessity for specialist . for example , think of a situation that you be sick and go to the doctor . the first doctor you go to would probably be a representative of a person that have a broad knowledge on human body . you would expect that doctor to direct you to a specialist for the specific health problem you have . then you would need a doctor specialize on your problem . this situation also illustrate the necessity for both . finally , people that be specialize on a topic may sometimes become blind by the long time of same kind of work they be deal with . in such case , a broad knowledge person could see the big picture and would be more beneficial to solve the problem . To illustrate , industrial engineering , which be my major field , require see the big picture in a company as we try to solve the problem in it . when we deal with the problem state by a department in the company , we observe that the department do not consider the possible cause of the problem which can actually be cause by any other department . so , this experience of me from summer internship indicate the possible disadvantage of work on the same topic all the time . in conclusion , we need both specialist and people have broad knowledge since they be both need for solve the problem of human being in the real life . so , a clear conclusion that one of the position be good than the other would be very mislead . 	TUR

I would think so . there be , indeed , diffrent way to ` ` try new thing ' ' : launch a product that create a new demand almost from scratch , and add small change to the way a business be run as successful people would not necessarily have to make a ` ` revolution ' ' and bring slight change can sometimes be a challenging risk . first , let ' s consider meaningful change . when take a close look at the business world around us , there be no denial that many company leader have succeed in create very profitable product that have sometimes mean the start of a new story for their company . that ' s what happenend with Apple when Steve Jobs decide to lauch the iPOD . instead of merely stick to the core business of the company , which be sell Mac computer , this leader decide to take the risk and start a totally new product . and , indeed , he succeded , reach a point at which his product trigger a new way of listen to the music , therefore change some cultural habbits in the American society , then worldwide and create a new demand for his specific product . that have also be the approach of Starbucks , that change the way people drink their coffee : not any more in a caf , but walk in the street ! there be a huge risk for this success story at the begining , as it involve change people ' S habbits and way of life , but the risk be definitely worth it give the success of the company . secondly , we delve into detail in a different approach : the small change to a business model-but that can mean more , indeed when put into practice . it can also be a significant risk to change slight thing in appearance , but a very rewarding one . for example , Dell create a new way to make computer with customarized computer order piece by piece by the customer . that be very successful 	ARA

Espeacially in the big city , it be a very usual thing to smell the gas get out of the car which be very unhealthy of course . so as a result of all these problem that be mention in the previous paragraph , people be look for some new way in order to increase the efficiency of transportation and as a result decrease the bad effect of the car industry . in each country people be try to develop their railroad . by the help of this , traffic can be avoid and people can reach to the place that they want to in a short time . this will avoid the stress in people and they can peacefully travel . also in some country people be encourage to use bicycle which accord to my mind be a very efficient way . because it help relieve stress and also it be healthy for one ' S body . as a result as the number of car and it ' S effect be become more and more disturbing for the people , they be look for new way in order to solve this problem . by the help of railroad and by the help of bicycle road people will eventually stop use car and as a result in twenty year there will be few car in use than there be today . I agree with the statement that it be more important for student to understand idea and concept than it be to merely learn fact . the follow point can be reasonably make to support the above statment . To begin with , understand of idea and concept enable one to really appreciate the mechanic of it and to possibly put the idea or concept into application . take the example of an electric motor . without proper understanding of how an electric motor really work , it be impossible for one to create motor of various size and for various utility . if one mearly learn the fact about a motor , we would n't have all the pleasure in life make possible by all the miniature motor ! look at the car power window , whose operation be facilitate by small motor , or at many of useful the robot whose motion be make possible by various sizes/types of motor , or at many of the precision tool that use something call stepper motor to precisely control various operation . further , understand of a concept enable one to look for way the concept can be extend to other application , or to find way two or more concept can be combine to come up with new idea that make exciting thing possible . take the example of a device that scan printed material and convert it into type matter on a computer . this device be the result of a lot of different concept put together . the scan technology - which scan the printed material , which be then combine with pattern match technology - that can look at the scan picture and recognize the letter base on their shape . simple learning of fact do n't really allow for this kind of innovation . however , no one can deny the role fact play in help people visualize thing and in put thing in perspective . take for example the Saturn rocket that take man to the moon . unless one know the size of the rocket , the amoount of fuel use , how many invention be require to make the flight possible , one may not really appreciate the scale of the device and the project . but one can still see that the fact help one gain a perspective of thing , but the really usefulness come only when one understand the concept that make it possible for the device to work . in summary , it be clear that it be far more important for student to understand idea and concept than it be for them to learn just fact , despite the important role play by the fact . young people seem to be more activ and to spend more time to enjoy life than old people . indeed it seem that young people want to enjoy the present before get old . but we can wonder if young people really enjoy life more than old people do . in a first part we will examine qrguments in favour of this statement . then we will interest in the old people in order to conclude on that statement . why be it think that young people enjoy life more than old people do . the first reason be that young people be more activ . they be more dynamic . they have no fear because they be young . they feel invicible . they be in a period of their life where they have dream and be ready to do anything to realise those dream . it can be travel around the world or do a special carrer . . . an other caracteristic of young people be that they have more free time that they can spend with their friend or do their hobby . because they be young they have less restriction . . . it be the reason why they can do what they like . they always find time to do it because they be dynamic . an other reason why they enjoy life be that they discover life since they be young . a lot of thing be totally new for them . finally , people meet their good friend as they be young . now , why be it think that old people enjoy life less than young people ? the first reason be that old people have a lot of obligation such as a job , a family , child . . . All those thing take a lot of time and become sometimes fastidious . but the matter be to define what do ` enjoy life ' mean . in my opinion , young people enjoy the present instead old people enjoy on a long time 	FRE
for many decade professor , politician , employer , intellectualls and student in Germany have be discuss the question what an academic education should be like : be it good to educate the student to generalist or specilists ? some people say that it be good to have a broad knowledge of many academic subject . although this idea be support by good argument , I prefer to specialize in one specific subject . first , it be good to take a study course in which you be really interested in instead of take coures in many different academic subject , because the student can focus on one single topic . if he concentrate on one specific subject , he will finish his study course right in time and will pass his exam with good mark . take too many subject course be very confusing , and a student do not have the time to deal with each single subject in the way he be supossed to be . for example it be very complicate to combine a literary . cultural or medium study course with mathematics or ingeneering . second , company nowadays be not interested in generalist , because they need specialist . there be only a few branch where generalist can get a job . advertisement for job in newspaper always give a detailed description of the skill an employee should have . and mostly only a specialist satisfy the company ' need . therefor specialize on one subject be the good way to get a good job . finally , be specailized in one specific subject do not prevent you from get in touch with other academic topic and study course . if you be good in one topic , you might also deal with other academic subject that be interesting . but it be vital that you still focus on ` ` your ' ' study course . take all this into consideration , I arrive at the conclusion that it be very important to specialize in one specific subject instead of have knowledge of many academic aspect . in some way , we be all generalist . but be a specialist be a unique characteristic that improve your chance to get a good job . I have some friend do that and I can say that the work they do there be really admirable . second , there be many teenager who be involve fight against environmental problem . these activity be really beneficial to the local community because they help to achive a sustainable lifestyle . the last point be that many student be work hard for school or university . that do not only mean that they want to achive professional success but they also want to improve life at school or university for theirselves and for all other student . now let me talk about a point I ' ve just mention : the hard work for school or university . of course this means that they have to spend a lot of time learn and not directly help their community . but I think that learning be the good way to achive a good life for the whole community . the young generation know that without work hard they wo n't be able to achive a good life for their community , e.g. if there be no skilled worker in town economy and finally the whole community will suffer a lot . finally you could say that it ' S not true that young people today do not spend enough time to help their community . as we ' ve see , young people engage in a lot of activity in order to help their community but they do this differently than the generation before . to prove a single theorem , but he happen to solve one of the great enigma of mathematics . so devote oneself completely to solve a problem or to structure a method may result in an effective , all-inclusive and creative solution or understanding . however , specialization could also mean boredom or a waste of time . stay up all night pursue the same goal over and over again may cause someone to live an empty life , even to lose focus of what they be look for in the first place and thereby make many year ' work obsolete . many great thinker get stick in their own mind , think there be only one important thing in the world , like religion or fancy metaphysical entity , shut themselves down from the rest of the world and , more importantly , from the opportunity of growth and understand they have as human being . the mind have to flow and explore , take new chance , it be not contain in a box . after all , there be many idea and project out there , endless possibility of how to make a good world . a wide range of ability and knowledge of various subject enrich people ' S live and open their mind . the only problem be that it be difficult to coordinate oneself to grow in each discipline , one can get easily distract and it be hard to determine what require one ' s attention at what time . still , the statement could be wrongly put forward . go back to Wiles ' S experience , he could not have prove the theorem without have a wide mathematical understanding , if he have n't look in archives other ( more specialized mathematician ) would have consider useless or out of the subject , if he have n't dare to try new method whenever it be need , nowadays it be hard to think what it would be like to focus on only one discipline or science , since they be all relate with each other , and with technology , in significant way . I will therefore take my home country as a reference . community face constant change as society as a whole change , and most of these change result into challenge and demand impose over individual of all age . in particular , the beginning of the 21st century have see a macroconomy revolution in term of the labour market - in particular highly specialise and train labour - and information technology resource . extensive outsourcing of certain service to Asian country and move big part of the manufacturing industry to the Far East cause many young people to be unemployed in Europe , and in my home country too , as a result . where once community use to be wealthy and secure employment could guarantee social welfare and enough free time for everyone to spend with their family or in social activity , now the young generation face difficulty in earn enough to mantain thei usual standard of living . I agree that they spend less time help out their community , and therefore , it be understandable that they will have to dedicate a lot of time to job hunting or even engage into a second and a third occupation , and will have no time or energy to spend on help the community they live in . well organise activity such as participation into charity work , or more spontaneous and ` private ' one such as care for an elderly member of the family or a disabled neighbour will eventually have to be put aside by those young who face economic difficulty , and will only be pursue by the lucky individual who do not have to worry about earn enough to feed themselves and their child .
