traffic issue be certainly a huge problem in our current world . a distance of ten kilometer would usually take about ten minute to cross twenty year ago ; however , nowadays that same distance would take about fourty minute to cross . people be begin to wonder if a person walk a certain distance , or drive in a car , do the walk individual reach the designate point faster ? such issue be become a serious concern to our world . yet every problem must have a solution , and earth have a trait that when a human create a problem , eventually he will find a solution . yet that solution , would cause another problem . I personally agree with the statement since already certain protocol be be do in order to deal with such a problem . Mass transit have be extremely subsidize and an incentive to carpool be be stress upon . subway rail , train , and monorail be be create inorder to draw away all the individual find on the road . in twenty year their will be definatly few car than what be present today , since individual would no longer depend on a biast form of transport . certain city in our world today can prove how mass transit be an effective way of reduce the number of car . London , England be a perfect example to be use as a city who use all its transportation method and incentive to the max . a person who live in London do not necesarilly need to be stick in rush hour when he be tired from work and just want to go home . such an individual can just enter the tube station and ride the subway to the near station to his residence . this type of transportation when people begin to adapt to it greatly affect the road of London , as year by year the street begin to clear up . country would probably follow the footstep of London in the near future . Tokyo , Japan be another example of a country that enforce mass transit ; however poorly exectued . underground station be present within the city , yet the transit system do not support such a mass amount of individual . such a situation might solve the problem of few car on the road , but it cause the problem of more people crowd at underground station . the example present support the theory behind this argument , which be yes their will be few car in twenty year than their be today ; however , that do not solve the main problem . car on their own do not cause a crowd effect , people drive the car cause the crowd effect . when mass transit be use efficiently , than that certain amount of individual will be evenly distribute among different route of transport . yet if mass transit be provoke , than that mass of individual would just yield to another route , transfer the same problem from point A to point B. Fewer car will be present in twenty year , but its up to each individual country to distribute the main problem . 	ARA

CHI
Travel be an activity that could be trace as far as the beginning of humanity . Thank to travel remote land be populate , empire be build and civilization be conquer . over the century , travel have have a social connotation : an activity that it be usually do in group . however , that do not mean that it be a uniquely social activity . many individual often travel by themselves and enjoy individual travel . Travel be either a leassure or a business activity . for the purpose of this essay , and due to the nature of the question , leassure travel will be address . Tourism be a multibillion dollar business that respond to a wide range of market demand . over the year , it have become more and more refined . a person , or a family can find from vacation package to the Caribbean to tour to the space . travel in group lead by a tour guide be often well organize trip : the number of people be set , the destination be well assesed , the timing for each activity be carefully structure and the tour guide be usually a tourist professional . people bond together when travel in a group . in addition , and because of economy of scale , another potential benefit of group travel be the low and more affordable cost for the tourist . group travel be often cheap than individual travel . however , group travel lead by a tour guide may also have disadvatages . people in tour group be tie to the destination , schedule and timing of the tour . if someone want to visit a different place or stay longer in a stop , it be likely that such option be not available . also , they be often tie to the meal and hotel offer by the tour . so , if a person do not like any of these , it would be very hard - or more costly - to change it . in summary , people who travel in group lead by a tour guide be more restricted than when travel by themselves . there be no right or wrong answer for advocate or reject group travel lead by a tour guide . it depend on the individual or family ' S preference , as well as on the available budget , and ultimately the degree of privacy and restriction that a person be comfortable with when travel . I agree with the fact that it be important for student to understand the idea and concept than to learn fact . idea and concept be two essential factor for learn . idea be the way by which one would learn about something by his past knowledge , by his past experience or by your imagination . concept be the one that provide you the with the fundamental of learn thing . take an example of car and an aircraft . both be different object for tranportation . the idea behind develop them be to develop different mean of tranportation fulfill the different need of human . the basic concept involve in develop them be the different law of motion , pure science . the fact be that a car be use for transport on land whereas an aircraft be use as mean of tranport in air . it be important for a student to understand the idea and concept rather than learn the fact first . the fact can be learn once you be proficient with the idea and concept . if they only know the fact and not the concept , their learning would be limit . if they continue to learn thing this way ( by know fact ) , they would not be able to apply knowledge of their learning . Emphasing further , it would be important for the student to learn the idea and concept first which when combined would give rise to fact . thus a student if learn the basic idea and concept of law of motion could automatically understand the fact involve with that . idea and concept , fact be different way of learn thing . but idea and concept be the foundation pillar of your knowledge . your building ( knowledge ) strength lie in your foundation and not on our asthetic view ( in this case the fact learning ) which just give a shallow knowledge about the strength of your building founadtion . SPA
take risk and try new thing have in common one thing : they be scary or , at least , they be not as comfortable as do always the same thing . yet , I be conviced that they be necessary in order to be successful . risk can be frightening - I will not deny it . however , if you do not risk , you miss important opportunity to improve your condition . every decision in life , from everyday to once-in-a-lifetime one , imply some risk . if you be not able to take risk , this mean that you be not able to take challenging decision , with the obvious result . furthermore , in certain situation , take a risk can make the difference between someone who just accept what he or she have ( but might regret what he or she have not ) and someone who be really satisfy . just think of a recently graduate student who receive a very interesting offer which require move to another country : should he stay home and try to find an average job or accept it ? I be convinced he should accept it and leave straight away , otherwise he might simply regret it for the rest of his life . on a less personal level , there be contest where try new thing be almost mandatory . this be the case for example of researcher : question the status quo , try out different possible solution be necessary in order to find out new thing - and where would the world be wihtout new invention ? I can not imagine a researcher who do not want to try new thing . for all these reason , I be conviced that successful people be those who be not afraid of risk . people who just keep do what they be good at just miss out opportunity - because that be what a change really be . travel be always an enjoyable , sometimes tedious , leisure acitivity . nowadays , with travel being such a normal thing to do , one be confront with the choice of choose between travel with a group and , or by yourself . so , can the one choice be good than the other ? first of all , most of the time , travel with a group tend to be relatively cheap and with the tour guide usually be a local , allow the tourist to receive additional information during the trip . also , since the tour guide be do this for his living , preferably as a professional career , it be ensure that the quality and quantity of the information give during the trip will be good than a tour organise by one ' S self . secondly , a point that be often miss be the socialise factor . while travel with a group , it be impossible for one not to get to know anyone . it be not a give though , that one ' s fellow cohort be as gregarious as one ' S self . lastly , efficiency be the key , mean so much as : see a lot with little time . this allow the traveller to see as much as possible in a limited time . on the other hand , efficiency , such as many other thing , be a double-sided sword . be as efficient as possible prevent the tourist from savour his moment during his travel , such as Mt . RUSHmore for example . on the other hand , travel without a group release the tourist from the shackle of time . one can enjoy every moment of the tour , go back to an exhilirating sight , or just relax for a day - freedom be the key element here . inform one ' S self be of the essence when travel without a tour guide though , since nothing can be bad than a tourist without an idea what he be do . this do n't mean that one may not opt for a private tour guide though . of course , all of this come with a price . with this one can conclude if one want a truly informative and economically feasible trip one should opt to travel with group . yet if one want to truly appreciate the true enjoyment of travel , savour every moment of one ' S trip , then one should opt for the other . Everyone have different opinion , it depend on different background . the one who agree that travel should let by a tour guide may think it will save more time , much cheap , and effeicent . the other think travel by themselves maybe a good choice , they think they can travel by their own plan , do whatever they want . by compare the pro and con , i think the former one be good and more instriument to lead by a tour guide . I will explian it and give some concrete example . firstly , lead by a tour guide will save much more time . let us image , we walk in a fablous city , we appreciate the amazing view , the lake be so beautiful , the weather be so nice , and we just walk and walk without stop , finally we can not even move a foot , after whole day walking , we just see the nature view of the city . the city be big , and we be small , it be impossible for us to reach every corner of the city , we do not know which place be famous , which way be a shortcut , which bus we should take . however if we have a tour guide , everything will become easy . the tour guide will lead us to the interesting place , some famous , but more importantly some other we will never have the chance to know or find them if we do not have a tour guide , the guide will aslo tell us how to get there , which bus should we take . be not great feeling that you do not need think anything , but just have fun . secondly , it will save more money . the tour guide always have some discount from the majority hotel and suite , they can easily book a room with a low price . they can give us many coupon when we buy something . thirdly , it consider more efficient . we can visit much more place than we do not have a guide . when we arrive at the airport , there be a bus just outside wait for us ; when we go to a resturant , the meal be ready for us ; when we need to leave , someone be tell us . last but not least , we can share our experience with other group member , we can easily find some to take a picture for you . in conclusion , to travel in a group lead by a tour guide can save more time , save more money and help you arrange thing more efficently . the speaker hit truth when he say that most advertisement make product seem much good than they really be . commercial be originally a mode of inform consumer about the availability of a product . but over the year , the sheer innocence of an old banner proclaim the opening of a new KFC restaurant in the neighbourhood have be lose in the relentless wrath of commercialisation . today , a commercial inform the viewer of what the product actually be would not even be notice , much less lure prospective buyer to a hopeful brand . in the deadlock of efficient brand we find ourselves in today , advertisement need to be one step ahead of each other , a phenomenon previously see only amongst the firm employ them . and this very much involve enhance the feature of the product they endorse . the world of advertising revolve around competition offer by other , and that have bring it to such a stage where enhance a product be a common practice . probably the most appropriate example would be that of a recent advertisement my eye fall on a few day back . it promise of a ` ` mansion drape in greenery ' ' , but the actual house be ironically different . it be a modest two bedroomed flat , hardly something you could refer to as a mansion . but sometimes advertisement cross the limit of what would still be classify as acceptable . perhaps the most blatant of these be the one employ by the automobile industry . in a recent controversy , one automobile dealer in New Delhi be fine and bar from operate for a year because he have promise a prospective buyer a sedan , which turn out be be a mess of pure lie and thievery . although sheer malpractice be evident in this ` ` enhancement ' ' of product , some people still advocate the validity of these advertisement . a recent survey in the United States of America bring to light a staggering number of people who see nothing wrong in this new trend . it only go to show one thing ; that we have learn to live with it and although unwanted , it have become an integral part of advertising today . so much so , that all you need to do to be sure of it be look into the local newspaper . even though it might not tickle our fancy , if statistic be anything to go by , this practice be here to stay . I have a quite open opinion about the statement that ` ` in twenty yearsthere will be few car in use than there be today ' ' . on the one hand I would totally agree this . each day you can read somewhere in the newspaper , how the price if petroil increase from day to day . Petroil reach his high price and there might be no decrease in the next year . as well as the limited oil reserve which begin to reduce every hour , it will be difficult to drice a car . perhaps people will wake up and use the public transport , like the bus or train . that would lead to a good environment , because pollution and noise would reduce . as we could also see with the transrapid the public transportation development be great . on the other hand we all see that there be no end of new car produce . nearly each inhabitant over @card@ - year have once drive a car . unfortunately for a lot of people , car be a symbol of standard and lifestyle . they like to express their positon in the society . some also dont want to give up drive a car , because it be a comfortable way of get somewhere quick and easily . for a lot of people , especially man , car be more than only a thing to transport them . it be a play thing , which they like to show and compare with other . conclusively , I think there will be few car in twenty year because some people in future have to stop drive their own car . insurance and petroil will become too expensive , when the price will further increase . 	GER
Learning be a very big process , the more we learn much more be leave out to learn , it be an endless process . the adcademic subject be mean to learn many thing that relate our life to the scuience and technology that we be use to lead our life . in school we study common subject like English , mathematics , science , social etc which make us learn the basic relate to the subject . by the end of our schooling we will have some knowledge about what each subject describe and we will be leave out to choose few subject to continue our study . it be good to have knowledge about all the academic subject than to specialize in one subject . it be essential to know about each and every subject as we implement all the subject in our life and we should have some basic knowledge about them . after reach to certain level of learn in all the subject with our own interest we can emphasize on learn one particular subject . this will build self confidence in us and improve our skill as we try to learn thing on self preparation . we can take the theory provide by people who work in the subject which we be interested and study them to give solution to the problem which be not give by them . this will make us learn new thing relate to the subject and improve our skill in a good manner . work in a single field be often say as research work . this need dedication towards the work and patience in do the work . its take much time to present a thesis on a particular topic , even few year . this can be acheived only after pass certain stage of learn so in beg its good to have comprehend knowledge on all the subject and as we move on in our life we can learn and dedicate ourself to a single subject . FRE

I be one of those helpless student because I just arrive from foreign country ; however , they help me improve my English ability . now I participate in the group and teach other student in Math and Chinese . as young people , I think my classmate and my friend all do a good job in help the community . I believe that there be other student group in other school that be do the same job . in summer time , most of my friend would participate to take care of the child or old people . some of those child have no parent , some of them be abandon . once a time I participate in the service , I read storey to them . at first I be think of practice my English reading ability ; however , I cry after I go home because I feel I want to do more for them but I could n't . I ask more of my friend to join this service , and we all learn different thing from it . One of my friend she have once participate in a service in a hospital . she talk to the old people , and then she read the book and newspaper to them . she tell me that , participate in a community service be a really different expericence , and it would lead you to lear more about life , about help other people but not ask the reward of it . young people do participate to help their community without speak of it loudly ; they choose to help the society silently . once they join it , they would continue the service . I do not believe that the give statement be true . indeed , I understand the logic which lie under that assumption but personally , I do n't have the impression that it be a veracity . first of all , it be important to analyse why someone who only meet success be more likely to take risk than somebody else . as a matter of fact , when you succeed a project , you feel satisfy . the more you achieve what you want , the more you become confident . then , it be like a spiral : the more you get , the more you want to get . in fact , when you plan to start a business and it work well , you think about expand your activity . if it work and you be already at the head of a big company , you may diversify your business . that be why big company like Bouygue be in building , mobile phone and so on . Virgin make disc but also develop its own mobile phone program . those company take risk , while enter new market . they believe in their success because they be support by their customer . however , new thing be not always do by successful people . creativity , for instance , have nothing to do with sucess ; it be about personality . so an artist do not always meet success . Nonetheless , his or her desire to create will still go on . that explain why a lot of painter do a lot of breakthrough after many failure . another example be Alain Baraton , a famous gardner in Versailles . he have fail during his school year but then , while he work in Versailles he develop a passion for gardening and create new arrangement around the castle . besides , you can not be successful all the time but it do not mean that you be less willing to do new thing . in addition to that , someone , who really want to be recognise by the society and have never achieve that goal , will probably try everything he or she can . as a conclusion , success be not so closely tie to ` boldness ' as the statement suggest . ITA
me as many other student face the decision either to have a general knowledge about many accademic field or to specialise in one field only in order to be consider an expertise . the decision that will come out will reflect the characteristic of the person . a person with many interest will never renounce to the pleasure of know more and more different thing . on the other hand , people with a passion will tend to specialise in a field that will make them happy and happy . a general education have many positive aspect such as a great flexibility in change preferencies and vision for the future . this kind of preparation give the possibility to the student with no clear idea about the future to postpone this important decision and take time to identify the main desire . furthermore , a general education give much more flexibility in adapt to different job condition . a specific education focus only on a subject give the advantage to the student to be an expertise in a field . this be a great advantage on the job market . in the same time , these student usually be much more rigid , unable to change and to handle with change . these characteristic be not always require by employer . personally , i think that the good choice for a person would be a solution that take into account both its own personality and the inner desire , for this reason i do not think there be only one good education . furthermore i think that the accademic education that must be follow should reflect the requirement of the field that the student be study , we can not compare the specificity require in medicine by the doctor with the general culture require by an teacher . Secondely , it be argue that specify in a certain field do not take the same time as study the basic of many different area . To some limited extend there be some truth in it , but , undoubtely , experience show that no metter what way of study you have choose the time until achieve a degree be the same . nevertheless , do a generalistical degree be in my point of view well than complete a specific degree that take the same time . in other word your possibility be much broad after the study time find a job then they would only be specify . and the time you have spend remain the same . To summarize , student first of all should be aware of the consequence when consider apply after they obtain a degree in a specific subject . furthermore they should mistrust the rumour that study with the objective to get a broad knowledge of many academic subject take the same time then it would achieve a specific degree . some people may believe this be true , but I totally disagree with this statement that young people enjoy life more than old people do . from my point of view , I think that young people do not enjoy their life more than the old people do . first of all , young people have less spare time than the old people , because they be young , they have a lot of work pressure and long work hour . they must strive for their future by hard work therefore , they do not have much spare time on what they be interested about . however , old people have less work responsibility and they have less work hour than the young people do , and many of them be retire form their work . they can spend more time to stay with family and do many hobby that they be intersted about . secondly . old people have more friend than the young people do . as time past , old people have be in society for so many year , so they have meet a lot of people , they can have fun with so many friend . it be really a happy thing to stay with many friend , and there must be a pleasant atmosphere . finally , they old people have less living pressure than the young people do . many old people have already retire from their work . they do n't think much about how to keep their work and how to make more money . they have already do this when they be Yong . now the only thing that they need to think about be that how they sepnd rest of their life to enjoy the wonderful thing in the world . they can travel to many beutiful place in their spare time , moreover they can visit their friend and have fun with them . they do not think much about work , and just play for fun . however , the young people will still face the heavy work and the pressure from the society . so , they can not enjoy themself as much as the old people do . make my father and my grandmother as an example , my father work more than @card@ hour a week to earn money to afford my study fee abroad , and he do not have much time to have fun . however , my grandmother have a lot of spare time and less working pressure , so she can play a lot of funny staff with her friend . therefore , from the reason I list below , I think that old people enjoy their life more than thhen young people do , because they have more spare time , more firends and less working pressure . although the basic concept of advertising be itself to promote a product or a service , I do agree with the statement that most advertisement make product seem much good than they actually be . advertising for product be essentially the process use to convince potential buyer that the product in question be fit and suitable and the good in the market . however most advertisement blow this definition completely out of propotion by market a product which end up be radically different when finally use . the degree of exaggeration use in advertisement to convince the buyer be at time ridiculous . advertisement in the fast move consumer good domain especially strictly adhere to the policy of display a completely wrong image of the product which make them seem much good than they actually be . an example that come to mind be a commercial for a lead shampoo product which claim to not only put hair back on the head of of its balding user but also rejuvenate them to the extent that they will be able to compete with the good driver in the world on a formula one car racing track . advertisement in various other sector also mislead user to believe that the product will offer quality that it be never design to provide in the first place . although one of the sell point of a good advertisement be in some case to provide a tinge of humor to go with the product , certain advertisement and brand use this to the extent that make their product seem too good to be true . various mail order catalog for exercise system be also another a clear example of how the end product differ vastly from the advertised one especially in today ' S wolrd where common opinion have it that medium over power print , people look to advertisement especially on television , to help them make inform choice about which product suit their need well . this dependency may not be large when it come to everyday product , but in case of product which be highly expensive and involve large investment , some advertisement can often mislead people ' S desicions . an example to illustrate this be the advertisement for real estate project or finance and tax saving instrument and more recently even in job search portal . some of the advertisement have cause people to make incorrect decision due to their assured but unrealistic claim . all in all , my belief be that advertisement should help people make informed choice and should make people aware of the product . a certain degree of humor and make believe be alright but the core functionality of the product itself should not be make a fantasy as be the case with many of the advertisement in today world . I therefore ardently agree with the fact that most advertisement make product seem much good than they really be . 	HIN

TEL
Will there be few car in use in twenty year than there be today ? What an important topic ! indeed , the reduction or increase of car , and their effect on the environment , be mainly discuss in our every-day conversation and political program . as far as I be concern , I agree that there will be few car in use in the near future than there be today . let me explain why . on the first hand , the actual trend be that everybody ( the government , household and corporation ) have to take care of his or her environment , and it be go to be a real obligation in the next few year . indeed , we all know that lot of thing go wrong around us such like the global warming for example . do you know that with this frightening global warming glacier disappear and that can lead to the disappearance of the Maldive in less than twenty year for instance ? so the point be that if we do nothing , we be certainly go to lose our planet and we will have to find somewhere else to live ! it be terrible , be n't it ? the pollution contribute to the global warming and what be the primary source of pollution ? these be obviously car and their CO2 . this gaz contribute too to many disease . . . therefore , car have to be reduce . moreover , the other transportation mode be develop in an impressiove manner . Let ' s take the example of Paris . we can notice that have a car be totally wrong with all this traffic in the street ! why do n't we take the bus instead ? at least we definitely know what time exactly we be go to arrive . drive in Paris can take four or five time more time than take the bus , for exemple . finally , question of security become so important in our society . we should reduce the number of car because of the too many accident it occur . it be unacceptable . To conclude , I will just say that there be another solution : change our actual pollute car to ecological car , which deeply consider and respect our environment . they can work with sun or non-pollute oil for example . I really think that this be the good solution since you can not order people to stop use their car . 	FRE

a guide tour be always a preferd tour . a guide tour with a group be more fun , learn and longlasting . for example if you be travel all alone to a historical monument with no background knowledge about the place . its as good as see the monument/place in book . if you be travell alone then thing will be not be of greatet interest . there might be moment that you want to discuss with some one on a specific painting or architecture . this call for a tour in group rather then individual . a monument / painting speak thousand word when you observe them but it can not listen to you . there be some point of the guide tour that make it more intresting . first , the intricacy of the depth of the knowledge of the guide about the importance of the place , which obvioiusly we as a tourist be not aware of . second , there be place that may not be list or publish in the map , magazine , book etc and there might be some local place that might be of intrest which the guide know . the third point be that in a group there be people with differnt ideology and thought . the inquisitiveness of any one in the group to know about some thing might prove to be useful for the entire group to learn more about the place . obviously a guide be the good one to answer such question . thus a good way to travel be a group , lead by a tour guide . there be ofcourse , the other side of this where the guide might try to tell thing differently and might say wrong thing about the place . the guide might be prejudice about some of the historiacl view and opinion . these be factor that depend on the type of guide you choose . if there be good guide with good reputation then it be always advantageous to hire him for a guide tour . if you consider save the guide charge by not hire him then the money spend on come to the place may go in vain since you would have only visit the place but do not know any thing more about the place than what you have see . 	TEL
base on my travel experience , I would say that , indeed , the good way to travel be in a group lead by a tour guide . by travel with an experienced person , you learn from that person ' s knowledge of the place , and you be able to develop a deep and intelligent opinion about what you see and experience while travel . Two year ago , I visit New York with my family , and I be surprise by the great difference between travel on your won or with a tour guide . while we be travel on our own around the city , we realize that we be only wander in the street , look at the tall building , but not learn anything interesting about the city ; besides , without an appropiate knowledge of the city , we have a lot of problem in try to find our hotel after we walk some street . the next day , we decide to pay a tour guide in order to learn more about the city and its most important touristic spot . with the help of the tour guide , we be able to know more about the city ' S storey , important place , good restaurant , and many other useful fact that we would ignore if we have continue our self-guided and ignorant travel . travel with a group lead by a tour guide surely have more benefit than just avoid get lost in the street : you learn more about the fact , the secret and the essence of the place you visit . another example I can mention to reinforce my opinion about tour guide be the trip I make with my family to China last year . as I say before , with the help of a tour guide you can develop a deep and intelligent opinion about the place you visit . when we arrive to this Asian country , I have the idea that we be go to find poor people live under a communist regime ; after we travel some time by ourselves , my opinion about this communist country do n't change . however , when we take our tour around Beijing , the guide begin to explain the current situation of the country from the Chinese perspective . I be surprise by the significant knowledge I acquire about the Chinese culture after hear the tour guide ' s opinion of her country and the information she have regard the situation of Communist China . after learn from this new perspective , which I may not have notice without a tour guide , I be able to change my point of view about China , and to develop a more critical and intellectual opinion about the Chinese culture and current economic , political and social situation . after travel in New York and China in a group lead by a tour guide , I reaffirm my opinion about travel about this kind of trip . I hold my position of complete acceptance for guide travel . if we have not have the help of a tour guide , my family and me would never have be able to visit New York as a true New Yorker or to learn from the Chinese culture from a reliable and original source , an authentic Chinese tour guide . in my opinion it be good to have knowledge of one specific subject extensively , rather than have some knowledge in all the field . there be a few reason namely - accuracy , danger of half knowledge and specialization be only after some general knowledge - that i venture to opine in favour of specialization . firstly if a person be more widely knowledgable in the field of his own interest , he not only perform well but also be able to put in his own effort in the form of information to be use more accurately . for example a doctor , if he be specialize in heart and its related aspect he be capable of help a patient more efficiently than a general physician would . secondly like i say danger of half knowledge be not unknown to us . if we have not master even one subject we can not put in any effort to get something out of our knowledge . we do not have a sense of direction in which to proceed also we have to stop in the middle of an invention or discovery because we do not know what lie ahead . this can also be decisive for the growth of a society on the whole . finally for any specialization to happen on any subject we start with a knowledge of various feilds related or unrelated which might help in the good understand our field of interest so the knowledge of all academic subject be in a way the foundation stone of any specializaion and be therefore a part of the learn process . like i state if it be a cardiologist in question then he would have some knowledge of the whole body functioning as that be evidently relate . thus i can safely say that specialization not only help in develop our skill in our own field of interest , it also be the destination for some knowledge that we acquire in all the subject . eventually help us to mature as an individual , as an adroit in our field and in the growth of society on the whole . some people argue as if it be a general truth that understanding idea and concept be much more important than learn factor . but to be frank , I can not agree with them . there be numerous reason why I hold no confidence on them , and I would explore a few primary one here . To begin with , we can lean the idea and concept during study factor . teacher will be able to teach the student the idea and concept by teach a specific fact . Let ' s take look at a physic class . at the very beginning , the teacher give the class a specific problem , and ask them to solve it . the student might not be able to solve it , so the teacher could tell the some conceptional suggestion that could help to solve this problem and encourage them to think it again . and this time , the student might know how to solve the actual problem and also learn the basic concept . further more , why do we learn the idea and concept ? for practical work , of course . so , why do n't we learn something that be more practical ? Learning fact will lead us to work directly , and it would not waste a lot of time study the boring theory or concept , and this would save much more time . last but not least , study fact will sometimes be more useful than study concept . for example , imagine we be learn how to repair the bike . from the book , we may just know how to solve the general problem . but when we face a special problem , an intergrating problem that noise from all over the bike , for example , what could we do ? we might feel complicated to solve this kind of problem . To sum up , learn fact can help us save a lot of time and because of the purpose of learning be for work , studyng fat might sometimes be more useful when we work than study idea and concept . take into account of all these factor , we may reach the conclusion that it be advisable to learn fact rather than to understand the idea and concept . Companys utelizing material with quality might point out the how good be the material use in manufacturing . another way of fair advertising actitvities , be highlight the effort be require to get some good produce and point out the professional and continuous planning to tachieve this perfection . marketing trend in some culture by attract consumer with utelizing cultural concept ( e.g. cultural and traditional say as a logo ) . another example of fair advertising be study the trend and behaviour of consumer ( e.g. packing childrens ' toy in a bright colored box ) , and we shall not consider this a manner of manepulation whereas no false information be mention about this product . by observe international market , manufatures and good seller all over the world be now try to give glorious and attractive name to their product which be n't a sort of decision maker manepulating . focus also on the customer need and make pruchoures point out the positive side and promise of fulfill their requirement can be consider a way fair promote to some good . I strongly disagree with the statement that the good way to travel be in a group lead by a tour guide . Eventhough organized tour be usually cheap and more convenient , I think travel by your own be a rich experience for several reason . the first reason of my belief be that organized tour bring you to the most touristic site . these place be over-crowded by other tourist , and as a matter of fact , attract also many local merchant that sell small commodity at expensive price on all your way . for example , in my trip to China , the tour guide show us a part of the Great Wall call ` ` Badaling ' ' . the place be full of people , I could hardly walk up the wall , it be very unpleasant ! on a second trip , I go myself to another point of the Great Wall , which be further to the city than Badaling , but there be much few people . also , the scenery be much more spectacular . the second reason why I hate organized trip be that you do n't have the choice of the timetable . every visit be precisely schedule and we should not stay overtime otherwise the bus or tour guide would leave you at the point it drop you . a visit of the Louvre museum in Paris be not worth if you can only appreciate the ` ` Mona Lisa ' ' painting , and not contemplate the other , less famous , painting . last but not least , I strongly believe that the most interesting part in travel be when you make contact with the local people . in my trip to foreign country , I learn a lot through the visit of the country , but I also learn many thing about the culture through conversation with local . it may be disgusting to see Chinese people split in the street . but once you understand that they do that to reject bad element ( such as those come from pollution ) instead of keep them in their body , you may find it smart or at least understandable . communicate with people , that be how you begin to respect their culture . To conclude , as per my experience , I always recommend people to make a trip by their own and not with a guide . this be the good way to discover , understand and respect a culture . 	FRE
when it come to travel in a group some people may say that the good way to do so be lead by a tour guide ; I personally disagree with that oppinion . it ' S true that have a tour guide have its advantage such as be take to all the typical local turist attraction , you will be almost sertain that you wo n't be miss out on any must see place . yet , in the other have , have a tour guide limit your freetime . when travel in a group you want to spend time with your friend , and spend it as you wish ; not have to be tie to a schedule as it be when use a tour guide . it could also be say that when travel in big group , people always want to see different thing , and argument may occur . although have a tour guide could prevent this disagreement by simply follow the itinerary set for that day , theres a good way to solve the problem . the group could just simply seperate , each person go to where they want , and at the end of the day meet again . the advantage of this solution be that when a big number of people be together for a period of time , usually argument happen ; by send each person on their different way it give them time to refresh from the enviroment of the group . most important of all , of why be good to travel without a tour guide , it that have a tour guide babysit you around the city take away a great part of the social and cultural interaction . the experience that you earn when you explore an unknown city on your own be something that can not be show by a tour guide . in conclusion , for all the reason name above , my suggestion when it come to travaling in a group be to not hire a tour guide and explore the city on your own along with your friend . accord to many people , there will be few car in use in the future than today . environmental problem be link with the huge number of car in the world . pollution have become a central problem in our society . in order to respond to this problem , governements focus on many possible solution such as limitation of car in the city . as an example , the mayor of London have introduce a congestion charge in the center of London in order to limit the number of car . as far as I be concern , I think that this solution be very convicing as it have be prove that the number of car have be reduce in the city . moreover , public transport be support by many governements . the cost of undergroud be very cheap in some country such as France . I would rather take the bus or the tube instead of drive my car . on the other hand , the cost of drive licence have considerely increase during the last year . as a result people be more likely to take the bus , or to use the underground than before . however , emergent country such as India or China be not ready to reduce there production of car . most of the economy be base on this production . therefore , environmental issue be not the priority of governements . although these country be aware of car ' pollution they do n't take preventive measure in order to solve this problem . but many measure have be take in order to face with this problem . the Kyoto ' S Protocol illustrate the capacity to deal with the huge problem of pollution in the world . the problem be that many industrial country do n't sign this protocol . To conclude , I think that we can hope that there will be few car in use than there be today , because governements make us aware that car represent a huge scourge for our society . as a consequence , many measure have be take and will be take in order to reduce car ' S activity . however , even though many thing have be do , the number of car will increase because many poor country need of this economy in order to survive . it be often think that young people enjoy life more than old people do , but be it really true ? a young person and an old person differ completely in term of social status , experience , physical ability and other factor which can explain that statement . Let ' s analyze them . first of all , old people can sometimes be limit physically because of their age and it can prevent them from do all they would like to do . simple thing of life can be difficult such as go shopping , drive , or maybe go out with friend . All this difficulty add together can make their life more difficult to enjoy . moreover , old people often have more responsibility in term of family or professional goal . this can create a lot of stress , psychological tension which prevent people from enjoy life at its maximum . however , I have to say that have a family ( child . . . ) be not only a source of stress . . . and can therefore be a great cause of happiness ! on the contrary , young people be often more ` free ' psychologically as they be more unconscious than old people and want to experience life in a fun way and to enjoy it . they often do not have the preoccupation link to a family or a professional situation . consequently , they can be more selfish and have fun in life . we also have to notice that young people often do not have the same problem of money than when they get old . most of the time , the parent supply their chidren with money and all their material requirement . it be thus an important worry which dissapears and allow in one sense young people to enjoy life . finally , we arrive to the conclusion that young people enjoy life more than old people do because in a way , they be sometimes unconscious about some worry or problem which can exist in an old person ' S life . however , some people prefer to make sacrifice during their youth and then enjoy life when they be old whereas other people make the opposite . . . but which be the good solution to enjoy life as much as you can ? Everything be handle by the guide and the tour company . however , travel in a group and a tour guide may also have some disadvantage . in my eye , be in a group mean that you no longer master your time . unless be selfish and impose your idea to other , you can not do what you want . you get to stay within the bound and respect other people ' wish . and listen to someone whine the whole day because the schedule do not please him be indeed extremely annoy . besides this , a tour mean everything be already plan . there be therefore no room for sudden change of schedule or unexpected location to visit . the exitement might be undermine . if the tour company provide poor service or the guide lack knowledge about the location , then your experience may turn out to be very disappointing and frustrating . another very bad habbit of tour company and guide be the fact that they often take you to location , restaurant , museum with which they have a partnership , a deal , so you be invite to purchase item in those location and not other . personally I dislike very much those practice as I have the feeling to be a kind of toy in their hand . my good advice be to choose carefully the tour company . I do not think that in twenty year there will be less car in use than today . it be no likely to happen because automobile represent a huge engine for today ' S economy and some people wo n't let their gold mine to be close . for example , let think about the tire industry and the position of Goodyear or Pirelli about the decrease in the number of car in the near future . I have no doubt they would use as many resource as they have to undermine every idea or project that could result in a contraction of their market . another example be the fuel industry , well say the business of Mobil , BP , Texaco and a few more brand . they have be invest billion of dollar try to avoid the development of alternative source of energy for automobile . their big business be to produce car ' S fuel and they wo n't let it go so easily . if they be contrary to car transformation , logically they will fight fiercely against automobile diminish . another example of how economic issue wo n't let the number of car go small be the fact that public investment in the western country consist mainly in road building . about @card@ % of the public budget all around the western country be use to aloud car circulation . if the number of that kind of vehicle radically go down , it will produce a huge administrative collapse since the traditional political economy would be mennaced . in conclussion , neither the tire industry , nor the fuel producer or the public planner and administrator of the western country will aloud the number of car in use to decrease . in fact , I think in twenty year the economic pressure around the car relate industry and economic field will not only impede the decrease , but will boost the automobile use . for a long time ago , I visit Europe with my family in a group lead by a tour guide . although my family pay a great deal of money , we enjoy the travel since the travel be convenient and helpful for increase our knowledge . like my case , people should notice that the good way to travel be in a group lead by the tour guide . first of all , since the tour guide provide enough knowledge and information to people , it be the good way to travel in a group lead by the tour guide . there be two purpose of travel . one be to have a rest and the other be to earn information related coutries or place that people travel . when people travel to acquire knowledge , they need professional guide as it be hard to get information about certain place by their own power . in contrast , when people travel without the tour guide , they will sightsee without get information and this will not be beneficial for increase their knowledge . safety of the tour guide also make the tour guide more attractive . the foreign country or place that people have not visit can be dangerous to people since they can not know factor that can be harmful . therefore , people who travel alone sometimes get in trouble . for example , I hear news that one traveler who visit the foreign country alone be kidnap . thus , to decrease the risk of travel , people should travel in a group lead by the tour guide that have be guide people for a long time and have bountiful knowledge about the dangerous factor , so the tour guide can make the traveler to travel safely . finally , the traveler do not need to concern about their travel plan , if they travel in a group lead by the tour guide . when people plan to travel alone . they have to consider various factor . they have to arrange hotel that they will stay and they have to purchase airplane ticket . also , they have to plan their schedule and choose where to visit to see . however , people who travel in a group by the tour guide do not need to worry about these factor because tour guide company plan everything . What the traveler have to do be just to pay money . To sum up , the good way to travel be to travel in a group lead by the tour guide because people can earn knowledge properly and travel safely . in addition , people do not have to endeavor to make plan . TEL
the contemporary youth be surround by very different challenge as well as distinctive opportunity to organize their life . the competition at the job market , for instance , have become very hard and education be now consider to be of utmost importance for future prospect . this can lead to the fact that many youth have not the time to help their community due to the time they spend study for school or college . additionally , modern young people have many option to spend their leizure time . there be so many opportunity for youth to spend their free time , that they might forget to think about other . medium like the television , computer or the Internet be just a few opportunity to spend free time . due to this reason , the youth might be overstrain with the diversity of possibilites that surround them . another factor which can keep young people from be concern about their community can be that many of them be just to lazy to offer their help . the generation of so call ` ` couch potato ' ' illustrate this issue . many young people be just hang around either at home or anywhere else . the reason for this might be , on the one hand , that they lack the guidance of their parent which spend often the whole day working . on the other hand , the invention and improvement of computer game and other source can be a reason why young people spend less time outside the four wall of their room . in addition to this point , it seem also reasonable to me that life standard which have considerably be improve in the contemporary society have make student dull and even indifferent . many young people just do not care if other need their help since they be satisfy with what they have and do not see any reason to think of other , especially their community . with reference to these reason I would agree with the statement that young people do not spend enough time help their community in the contemporary society . the youth , in generall , have many interest that have nothing to do with their community , which can be the peer group , the medium , the school and a huge amount of other issue . additionally , they lack some guidance of their parent or other adult who could make the community more attractive to them . there be many way to travel , such as travel with our family , with our friend , as an individual or in a group lead by a tour guide . also the way we choose to travel be highly dependent on a place we choose to go . from my personal experience , I think that travel in a group lead by a tour guide be the good way if we would like to go to a new place or city . there be several reason for this , first and maybe the most important one be that we might choose a country or a city that the local language be not our mother tongue , so the tour guide would be a helpful resource in this case and of course s/he would help us do the procedure such as book a hotel , know the restaurant , etc , while enter the place . also , as we be new in the city and we do not know many thing about its social culture , by have a tour guide with us , we can easily be inform of the useful information about the habit and cultue of the people in that specific country , and we can be well prepare for the travel . the second reason , in my opinion , be the fact that we surely would like to visit many new place in our travel and of course get many new information about the history , art , social life , music , etc of the place . How can we obtain such an information if we travel without a group lead by a professional tour guide have lot of interesting information about the city ? I think it might be possible to do all of these thing if we travel individualy , but really we will waste lot of time on it . third and last , To travel in a group be much more safe than the other way , since there might be some possible danger along out trip , the tour member can be helpful in these case . all in all , if I choose a new place to go , I prefer to travel in a group lead by a skillful tour guide to have a great time and enjoy my trip . in my opinion , young people actually enjoy life more than old people do . I hold this opinion because young people be less weak , less afraid , and less fragile than old people tend to be . first of all , the majority of young people have alot of energy they can disperse without become tired easily . while most age people get tired after just one activity , young people , like student , can do many activity in just one day . even after long hour of work in school , they can easily take part in an afterschool activity , and then come home to do homework and chore . on the other hand , old people get tired quickly even after one activity , such as clean the house . be able to do many activity in one day promote the sense of accomplishment and happiness , and thus young people who have more energy enjoy life more than old people . in addition , young people tend to be more brave than old people , and take more risk . risk , because no outcome can be predict , add excitement to the life of young people . however , most old people prefer be stable and assure , and do not take risk . for example , alot of young people will travel to distant country , and gain more experience . however old people prefer remain where they be . thus in the life of old people thing be monotonuous and predictable , whereas in the life of young people , nothing can be predict and everything be exciting . furthermore , young people be also more mentally capable than old people . as people grow old , they lose their ability to concentrate for long period of time , or to learn new thing . in contrast , young people be full of potential and can learn new thing , like another language or a new recipe . learn new thing be very enjoyable , and young people who have the advantage of good mental capability , enjoy life more than old people . old people be restrain by various factor , such as fragility and inability to continue activity for long period of time . however , because young people be strong physically , mentally , and also have less fear , their life To add spice to life , one must try something new . but this should be do carefully and responsibly so that it do not affect one ' s existing reputation and profession . let us consider one of the giant in global economy , Mr.Dhirubhai Ambani who be the founder and Director of Reliance Industrial group in India . he initially enter the market in the final quarter of the 20th century by start a textile firm which he struggle very hard to develop into a very big company . he be very successful and be financially very secure at that time . yet , he be a true entrepreneur and try out innovative thing and take many risk by enter petroleum industry . now Reliance petroleum be a very big name in Indian economy . in addition to the above mention industry , he also start Reliance telecommunication which be the first CDMA mobile service in India . he reap huge profit through this . Infact , Reliance group have enter Energy and retail sector also . today , Reliance Group stand among the top @card@ company globally . All this would not have be possible if he have not take the risk and enter into these business instead of hold on to the textile business . so I think it be always good to secure your position first both financially and mentally and then try out innovative thing and take risk to develop your business . a successful man do n't rest at any point of time but strive hard to be more successful . successful people try new thing and take risk rather than do what they already know how to do well . some people try to have broad knowledge of many academic subject , while other wish to specialize in one specific subject . I believe it be more preferable to first have vast knowledge . first , knowledge be good for my child . if I have more knowledge , I will be able to educate my child well . my father use to teach me thing that I do not learn at school . for example , my school do not teach why water be form around a glass of cold water . I be always curious about it , and it be my fater who tell me the answer . as my father teach me , I want to do the same thing to my child . in addition , the chance of get a job increase . Let ' s say that I take geometry , biology , and psychology in college . although I do not specialize in one subject , I still have a lot of information in each subject . I can be a math teacher , a worker in biological museum , or a guidance counselor at middle school . What will happen if I specialize only in geometry ? once I can not be a geometry teacher , I will have nothing to do , but just wait . finally , I can pick a subject and specialize in it later . I will experience and evaluate the subject while I learn many subject . after the education , I will have a pretty good idea which subject fit my interest . use the same example as before , let ' s assume that I become very interested in biology . people say there be no end to learn ; I will not hesitate to take biology again and go deep into it . in conclusion , I think learn a variety of subject be important , because it allow me to teach my child , get a job , and specialize in subject that be suitable for me . I agree with the statement for the follow reason , the importance of the capability to think logically , solve problem and to create future vision . the stated reason be describe in more detail in the follow paragraph . first a student need to learn how to think logically in order to understand a problem that need to be solve . especially for study assignment as well as work assignment it be important to determine what be the unknown factor , that need to be find . if the student be not able to do that , the result might not be the factor that be initially ask for . second , if a student just learn fact instead of strategy to solve a proble the student will not be able to apply the already learn knowledge to a similar problem . for instance the student know how to calculate the revenue base on price per product time unit sell but as soon as the unit sell be unknown and the give number be the price for each product and the total revenue , the student will not be able to solve for the unit sell . in order to solve the outline problem it be important that the student learn the strategy to solve a equation for different unknown . third , only if a student understand the concept and idea of for instance a certain product like a car only then will the student be able to create further development of the already existing feature . if the student only focus on learn fact the student will always limit his knowledge and learing to already existing idea . thus , the student will not be able to come up with future vision which be vital in somone ' s accademical and professional carreer . in conclusion , the ability of a student to think logically , solve problem and to create future vision or development of exist knowledge or fact be more important to me than learn the fact . it will enable the student to be sucessful in his or her study as well as professional career . while life can be enjoy by people in all phase of life , I personally believe that young people enjoy life more . main factor in favor of young people be their high energy level . young people be full of life and like to experiment different option . such experimentation build their life experience . exercise different option provide multiple opportunity to enjoy life . young people have high physical strength to endure outdoor activity . for example , while a senior citizen may require a detailed planning and preparation before they could take an adventure camping , young people could combine their youth with sense of adventure to take up such a trip with little or no planning . young people also have time on their side to take risk . unlike , old people who be risk averse , young people can take high risk . young people realize that in case of any negative consequence , they will have time to repair the damage . this risk friendliness allow young people to stretch their limit and enjoy life to the full . while it be true that young people do not have enough time in their schedule as compare to old people . however to enjoy life , time be not the sole requirement . young people have multiple outlet to enjoy life - at work , home or socialize . hence a person need not wait till retirement to enjoy life . most of life ' S enjoyment will require commitment of financial resource also . it be likely that smart old people would have achieve financial success to enjoy life , however it be more probable that young people will have more expendable income to enjoy life . in conclusion , while life can and should be enjoy in every phase of life , young one should capitalize on this opportunity . young people have all support factor in their favor to enjoy life to the full . All these factor suggest that people will look upto public transportation as a permanent solution to their woe . besides be light on purse the statistic suggest that it be much more safe mode of transportation than car . also explode population in metropolitan city be lead to major space crunch on road and parking lot . people be feed up of waste hour in traffic jam and parking queue . they be realize that if most of them use public transportation , it would benefit all in term of drive space and time . Non pollute vehicle like cycle be once again gain popularity among mass for various resons , health be a prominient one . Infact many people in China go to their office daily on bicycle . therefore , it seem that the idea of the ` ` Ford ' ' , the famous car manufacturer , to ensure car for all may not come true . with government strongly promote the benefit of public transportation and increase awareness among public reagarding the disadvantage of own and drive a car we will see a sad but necessary demise of the era of car . I think this be a very complex phenomenon and link to a great number of reason . first of all , it seem that our society and culture put a high value on time , especially spare time . partly because modern life be very demand , partly because the offer of entertainment and outdoor stimulation be so vary , we praise our time as a supreme luxury and feel very frustrated when we can not use it in complete frredom . secondly , I think Western society have develop more and more in a hedonistic direction . in other word , we feel it be our own right to enjoy ourselves , feel free in our choice and simply follow instant gratification . I think this be particularly apparent in young people , as they claim they right to play and have fun , and resent any request of help or support as a form of injustice . in a dominant culture of self-absorption and pleasure , take the time to communicate with people that be different , for background and frame of mind , seem unjustified and this lead to another worrying trend . it seem to me that there be a general detachment between young people and old generation or people in need . these be generally the people that need more time and support within the community , and it would be the duty of the young generation to look after them . in conclusion , I think that value that have become more and more present in our society be now central in young people ' S vision of life . as a consequence , there seem to be a more selfish conception of one ' s use of time and gift , that unfortunately lead to the neglect of part of teh community that might be in need . in my opinon , most advertisement be deceive people by make product seem well . there be two specific case of example of trick to present product much well : change the look of the product by change its color of its cover and change its name to make it look like high quality . first of all , advertisement change the color of the product cover to attract the customer . generally fade color will make the customer think that product be make with an old technology , whereas bright color deceive the consumer that it be make by high technology . for example , bright pencil be generally preferred to faded-colored-pencils in Turkey . that ' S why many advertiser force manufacturer to produce bright look pencil to increase selling . secondly , advertiser force the manufacturer to change product name of a specific product to increase the amount of product sell . in Turkey , that be usually do by give a foreign name to that product instead of a Turkish name to trick the consumer . in this way , consumer may think that the product be a high quality product because some of the good manufacture by Turkish industry lack quality . there be a real case for this in Turkey . A-spagetti-producing-company change its product name a couple of year ago and give an Italian name to its product to deceive the consumer that it be an Italian product . hence , they have increase sell their product . this be the way to present their product much well although it be same quality as before . To sum up , most advertiser make product seem much well accord to some technique list above . unfortunately , this technique be become so widespread that consumer will unlikely encounter a product reveal its real quality . FRE
I strongly believe that most advertisement make product seem much good than they really be . whether the advertisement one see be through a television or a magazine , this particular individual be bind to receive some sort of effect upon the immediate exposure . this exposure can be explain in two interesting way . one be explain via visual effect and the other be through the means of incorporate one ' s psychological effect . as we all know , in order to advertise a certain product , excessive visual lure be to be expect from the viewer . the maker of these advertisement will try in every conceivable way to present their product at its fine . this be where the visual effect come in . there will be many trial and error and thorough , various step will also be require in order to complete one final advertisement before they be present in the buyer ' eye . when that item be then advertise , the viewer will inevitably be trick and allusioned to see beyond the actual practicality and state of that particular item . the second effect , the psychological one derive from the audience ' s point of view . sometimes the product be advertise in the media just look nice , glamorous and even useful simply because they be unattainable . at time that particular item may be too costly that it be one ' s out of budget . this explain our natural human instinct to need and want what we can not have . therefore , the hope to be able to possess a certain product - perhaps in the near future or never at all - will push your desire to purchse that product even more . hence , when a buyer do not conveniently have the item at hand while see the advertisement , it be only natural to make that particular item seem much good than they really be . To conclude , the reason whether they be external or internal , bring the same result to the viewer of these advertisement . they be not necessarily good or bad but the need to control one ' S perception be important in decide if that reason be valid . the viewer , the buyer must therefore reason and fight for what be real and what be not . sometime it be simply our mind that trick us into buying . this be when you realize you ' ve make the wrong decision . in modern capitalist society , advertisement be a natural part of life . in this situation , I believe that it be all but inevitable that most advertisement make product seem much good than they really be . the fundamental reason be that modern consumerism have make it necessary for company to advertise their product simply because there be more good than be necessary . before the advent of mass production and mass consumption , the situation be vice versa : there be probably few good than be necessary . naturally , therefore , producer do not need to advertise at all . but in today ' S society , because of the tremendous advance of technology , it be possible to churn out unnecessary commodity produce mainly , or perhaps only , to gain profit by sell them . as a result , producer be force to make their product look much good than they really be so that they will be able to sell them out . another significant reason why advertiser exaggrate the value of their product be people ' S expectation to have new and ` ` good ' ' thing . in order to keep up with these consumer ' demand , company be compel not only to make new , slightly-upgraded product all the time but also to make the small improvement as impressive . the case in point be the computer industry . PC maker change their model three or four time a year even though the improvement be minor . because people expect this and because all the other competitor do so , a PC maker can not afford to continue to sell a PC first put on the market a year ago . as a result , it be necessary for PC maker to make their product look signficantly good than their previous model by , for example , change their look although the content be not much different . in conclustion , I agree with the statement that most advertisement make product seem much good than they really be for two reason . modern consumerism have make it necessary , and as a result , people be accustom to have ` ` good ' ' product , which force producer to exaggerate minor improvement . it would be impossible to change this situation , and , therefore , consumer need to be wise enough not to be deceive by advertisement . I partially agree with this statement . I think that have a broad and wide knowledge be a really good thing : if you be open mind and can discuss about many topic , you can get many opportunity , and you can also have more immunity to market variation . for instance , in case of macro-economic problem in a certain productive area , you can be able to change your work more freely , and more rapidly respect to the one which be very deeply specialize . otherwise , worker ( and here I refere also to manager , and people who have great responsabilities ) also need to be specialize in a certain field . accord to my opinion and to my knowledge , today the market need people who be specialize , but also need people who can share their knowledge with their colleague , in order to obtain revenue by sinergy and cooperation practice ; for this reason I think that while you be a student you need to widen as much as possible the spectrum of you knowlegde , investigate as many field as possible ; accord to me , it be reasonable to improve a specific tecnical ability just after finish your study ( or during the last year of your academic career ) ; behave in such a way , you could have both the basic wide knowledge to effort change , and also the specialization , which could make you the good worker in a certain field at a certain time and in a certain region . for example , worker with a low istruction level , may have many problem in case of change in the strategy of their company , or ( and this be a more dramatical problem for worker involve in the process ) in case of market revolution , which make a certain product obsolete , or generate the so call ` ` killer application ' ' . so , in order to be an attractive worker for the labour market , you need to specialize your knowledge , but in order to minimize risk , and to avoid market change , you have to widen your knowledge ; you also need to improve your capability and knowledge after you have finish your study : this be the so call ` ` life long learning ' ' , which I believe be the good model in modern society .
