Everest be ? ' ' . though this information may seem useless at that age , after progress through life ' S obstacle , one realize that the knowledge one have gain by study such subject be very precious and valuable . we now remember that Mt . Everest be @card@ metre high and be go higher every year . it give us a sense of superiority and pleasure that we , after so many year , remember such tiny detail . specialize in one specific subject may give the student more time to understand the subject and achieve perfection . specialize may give one an edge over other . but when we emerge into society , ready to make a difference to our life , the life of other , or the world as a whole , we realize that a broad knowledge of subject be good than specialize in one subject . with knowledge come power , and with power come responsibility . it be our responsibility to make this world a good place . 	HIN
the statement assert that understanding idea and concept be more important learning fact . before we move on to judge the merit of the assertion let try to differentiate between ` ` Ideas and concept ' ' and ` ` fact ' ' . idea and concept represent the fundamental ` ` line of thought ' ' or ` ` logical progression ' ' behind any phenomenon . for example different culture use kinship nomenclature e.g. Uncle , father , mother etc. in order to express not just natural relationship , but also social relationship , status , power equation , economic situation etc . on the other hand , ` ` Facts ' ' represent the ` ` hard example ' ' or ` ` expression ' ' which can be immediately place in their context and be self explanatory . for example , Uncle be term use for father ' S or mother ' S brother . but in many culture uncle be also a term use for any significantly old male , even if no biological relationship exist . What it essentially mean be that it be very difficult to understand ` ` idea and concept ' ' as separate from ` ` fact ' ' , and vice versa . the two be interlink in many way . its only thorugh ` ` observation ' ' of similarity between fact that idea and concept emerge . that be if it be observed that in a culture all provider of food and security and term as ` ` Father/Mother ' ' , it mean there be more to nomenclature than the biological relationship . its no conincidence that Hitler be term ` ` Fuherer ' ' i.e. father . on the other hand , once an idea or concept have be ` ` obserevd ' ' and ` ` established ' ' through the study of ` ` fact ' ' , it provide a medium for understanding of all future factual observation . that be whether they support or oppose the idea or concept . hence , observation of ` ` fact ' ' be both the ` ` initiator ' ' and ` ` distiller ' ' of concept . in this light , it will be fool hardy to see idea and concept as oppose to fact . both of them be equally important for real learning . student need to understand a ` ` concept ' ' through assimilation of fact . concurrently a concept or idea provide the medium for assimilation of large number of fact . both be inseparable for complete learning . To start with take the example of cut throat competition all around the world in every field due to technological advancement , where every individual , every firm be strive hard to achieve maximum efficiency and hence maximum benefit out of limited available resource in their hand . right from the point child take admission in the primary school , he have to cater to the expectation of his parent , friend etc . then with population increase and resource decrease , their be limited vacancy in high school , college and good university for the student so there also they have to compete in entrance examination for the limited seat . then even once in , there be not much relief since the academic curriculam be so hectic that one do not have enough time to look after other people who need help . and we alsoo in this situation we can not expect from someone to take out time from his busy schedule and devote it to the community . then come to the time one get job and start work in some business or firm , there also the young man be expect to do hard work , if they want a good and secure future . however despite these point , i will not deny the careless attitude of the youth towards their community . due to globalisation and mix of culture , young people be more attract towards the materialistic pleasure and be not ready to understand the responsibility they have on their shoulder for the society and community , which have give so much to him to make the person , he today be , and now it be his obligation from the ethical consideration , that he give some payback to the same community . TEL
guest at dinner party be appreciate for their ability to have a pleasant and rich conversation with anyone about nearly anything . at this game , people with a broad knowledge of many academic subject and a sense of conversation will have the upper hand . however , once the dinner have end , such a proficiency in so many area might result to be little more than an annoy flaw of character . knowledge be a vital tool to understand ourselves and the world we live in . so , what be wrong with try to know as much as possible in as many academic subject as possible ? One answer to that question could be that the pursuit be self-defeat , indeed , the more we learn , the more we realize we know little . give this state of thing , pursue knowledge for its own sake might seem absurd . the acquisition of knowledge should be motivate by something else than intellectual pleasure . each person have his or her own personnal interest , career objective , ambition , dream , or big unresolved question . these could drive people to want to know more . moreover , these force will often lead someone to look deep in one specific subject than in other . on the other hand , value knowledge for its own sake will lead people to waste their effort in an incoherent way in a vain attempt to know more . finally , a motivated approach to one or few subject , might lead someone to understand thing well , to find answer , or even to achieve something . To conclude , it might be good to specialize in one specific subject than to have a broad knowledge of many academic subject . above all , it be important that this pursuit of knowledge should be motivate by something else than the arrogant goal of just want to know more . To my view , there be three reason why idea and concept prevail . first , idea and concept enable a student to understand not only one fact but also plenty other fact because fact happen once and idea can explain many fact . for example , you can know how to cook a specific cake but if you understand how cake be make in general you will be able to cook every cake . it mean that by understand a fact , a student would be able to anticipate only this precise fact next time he experience it . instead , if a student understand the concept he will be able to anticipate the outcome of many related fact . secondly , idea and concept be the first thing that you learn at school and I think it be efficient . for instance , in mathematics , you always begin by learn the rule before apply them . moreover , theory be something that gather information from the experience of other people . that be exactlwhat the teacher be teach : concentrated experience rather than a fact . last , accord to my personnal experience I think it ' s more important to understand first idea and concept . I create a fashion company but I know only a few thing about this industry . Thank to my knwloedge that I have learn in class I be able to adapt and anticipate thing as I already know this industry . for example , marketing concept can be use for every industry . by use them I be able to cleat the hurdle which be my ignorance of the industry . the word advertisement come from the root ` advert ' , which mean ` to draw attention ' . the central motive of all advertisement , be infact to get considerable attention . and the advertisement , generally go beyond simple enumeration of product feautures . they try to make a product look much good than it really be . I totally agree with the statement . while , advertisement today be much more sophisticated , than they be a few decade ago , the chief theme of an advertisement be always to get more public attention , so that the product could sell well . Initally in 70s or 80s , only the feature of a product and customer testimonial be greatly exaggerate . this make a product look much good , than it really be . inflated customer testimonial help create a sense of a happy consumer . while , such technique be already create a sense of false product perception , it be only in past 1 or 2 decade , have the advertising become so complex and sophisticated . people , child and adult be beguil by the aura ` modern advertisement ' create about a product . this aura be well know as ` the brand ' among the marketing and advertising firm . these modern advertisement basically create implicit association of certain product type with certain behavior , in the consumer mind . association like - if you drive ` Car Z8 ' you be cool . or if you use certain perfume , you will be much more attractive to the opposite sex . these association create illusion in front of consumer , hence ensure that they can not make rational and logical choice about product . moreover , with such advertising it be no longer necessary for a product to be good , in order to be commercially successful . a regular garment line with similar design , could command twice the price with a celebrity endorsement . such , technique ensure that consumer and the manufacturing company ignore what be really important - the product , and not it ' S aura . also , this false image , contribute to what be call the mad consumerism . people get insane to get certain be not good for society . with advertisement and brand people be sometimes unable to seperate wheat from the chaff . What be really important and what be just a fake . I strongly believe , the advertisement make a product look much well use various method . however , such marketing do harm to the society in general , and consumer in particular . 	HIN

I ' m Italian , so I ' m influence by the Italian typical school system base on a big knowledge of many subject . in fact when I be at school I study a lot of subject , include Latin and ancient Greek , and when I be at the university I take twentyfive exames on different aspect of economics . ITA
the issue of whether one should have broad knowledge of many subject or one should specialize in one specific subject have arouse heated debate in the modern era . advocate for the broad knowledge concept say that this approach will help in widen the outlook of the person . Contary to this approcah , some people say that this be the world of specialization and it be very important to be a master in one subject to be successful in life . I personally feel that there should be a balance between the two approches . I would present the pro and con of each of the approach and then illustrate why I emphasize on the balanced approach . in today ' s dynamic world , it be imperative for a person to have a broad knowledge of various academic subject . this will not only help to acquire a broad perspective but also increase the efficiency in decision make of a person . say for example a marketing manager of a fast move Consumer Goods company deicdes to launch a promotional campaign for a product . the knowledge about the financial issue relate to the campaign can be really helpful in the decision making . if he do not have knowlege about finance then he can make an expensive plan which can be finally reject due to the financial constraint of the company . knowledge about other subject such as finance , strategy and human behaviour can help the manager in make good informed decision . this example clearly show the importance of have broad knowledge of many academic subject . on the other hand , there be no denial to the fact that this be a highly competitive world . the most prominent successful people today be the one who be specialist in their respective field . a very obvious example be the successful doctor . not only these doctor have to specialize in field such as dentistry , pathology etc. but also they have to acquire high post graduate degree in the specialist field . very few people today would prefer go to a general doctor for their medical problem . I would support a balanced approach as I feel this can make a person a balanced individual who have enough broad perspective to make effective decision and be specialist in his own field . if the marketing manager in the above example be a person with broad knowledge about many academic subject then he might find it difficult to devise a marketing strategy , which need core and in depth study about market related policy . similarly if he be just a typical marketing specialist , he may ignore other vital information relate to different subject and end up give a poor solution . if he take a balanced approach where he be a specialist in his area but also know about other subject , he will make good decision and will succeed in life . 	HIN
in my opinion in twenty year there will be few car in use than there be today ; although this statement can sound totally unaware of the fact that car ' possessor be quickly grow all over the world , I will now explain the reason for my idea . car ' price have be decrease slightly in the past few decade : originally bear as a super-luxury status symbol back in the end of the nineteenth century , we can therefore clearly state that today car be a commodity affordable by almost anyone in any industrialized country . however , this apparently good change of the situation , have lead to two extremely negative effect : the abrupt rise in oil price , and a tremendous impact on the planet ' S environment . Firts thing first , since car be produce and sell even in big , heavily populate country like China and India ( together comprehend more than one third of the world population altogether ) , market where once they be unavalible to almost the totality of people , their demand quantity have rise to the sky , and so the fuel price : petroleum extract site be use in a more and more savage way , but the lack of offer of this fundamental mineral cause , accord to a very well know economic law , an increase in its price . as of today , even extract site place very far from any valuable market , or very expensive to use , have be approach by excracting company ( e.g. in Alaska , in the North Sea , through oceanic platform . . . ) after the traditional site ' shortage . it be my opinion that the oil price , unfortunately , rise more and more , to the point where car will be once again an item affordable by , and only by , very rich people , therefore decrease significantly their number . the only solution to this inevitable economic disaster would be to find some alternative energy font ; however , research in that field have be grow slowly in the last year , thus our energetic future be not look bright at all . besides , how not to mention the fact that since car ' use spread around every continent ( and it ' s gonna be bad and bad in the short period ) pollution ' S effect on global environment have icreased so much ? car be not what you might call an ecological way of transportation : have more and more of them drinving around all over the world might even lead to the bad solution . some scientist , in fact , even come to think that , if their number be still go to increase over the year , world governmentscould even ban them from use , so to prevent the enivronment , that however , by that day will probably be seriously compromise . To summarize , I think that car ' number will grow in the short period , until it will be too much to afford them ( in economical and ecological mean ) : since that moment on I believe there will be few and few of them , even less than today . To draw a conclusion , student should specialize on one specific subject and apart from that they should learn as much as possible about other subject . Everybody should use his talent to the great extention . 	GER

What do you think of the issue ? as far as I be concern , I will agree with the idea that it be good to specialize in one specific subject than to have broad knowledge of many academic subject . in the follow paragraph , I will add some example and detail to support my point of view . in the first place , specialize in one specific subject have advantage in various way , of which , the most significant be that it will save our time and energy . we have to the point out the essencial fact that we do not have enough time to finish every work well , which mean that we can not do good in many academic subject . if we focus on one subject , we be able to spend enough time on that subject . therefore , we will have more chance to be successful in the subject we concentrate on . for instance , if a student whose major be computer science study art to broaden his eyesight , he will not have much time study his major , which will influence his grade and credit . as a result , there will be bad effect on his study . in consequence , we will make good use of our limited time to study , if we concentrate on one subject . in the second place , what be also worth notice be that it will bring benefit to our future job , if we specialize on one specific subject . as we all know , in the future we will find a job which we be interested in . in that case , we should focus on one subject which attract us a lot . then we will find a good job after graduation because of our professional knowledge . for instance , if we study biology , we be able to learn more in the subject , which mean that we can gain the knowledge relate to biology . therefore , when we have the interview , we will have a lot of academic knowledge to be discuss which will leave a good impression to the manager . we will get the job we want easily . admittedly , if we have broad knowledge of many academic subject , we will become knowledgeable . however , if we have knowledge in a variety of aspect and we do not know much about each subject , it will cause bad influence on our future life , which be not good . therefore I tend to hold the opinion that it be good to specialize on one subject which we have lot of interest and we will get benefit from it . To sum up , take into account of what have be discuss above , I can draw the conclusion that specialize in one specific subject be well than have broad knowledge of many academic subject . I wish that there will be an increase number of people who can get benefit from the one subject they specialize in . 	CHI

in my opinion in order to have a good understanding of idea , concept must be support by fact . first of all it be impossible to understand an idea without a complete evaluation of the fact that be the base structure of the concept . if you understand an idea without know the fact behind it , then you be only learn a ` ` dogma ' ' . an example of dogmatic understanding be the religious one that ignore fact , because be not look for a deep understanding of thing but only to a solution that will bring to its answer . this be why in religious learning , fact be generally avoid : they do prefer interpretation . second of all , to understand something you need to start learn the fact in order to start a critical analisys . the only way to start this process of understanding be start from the knowledge of fact . in order to understand an idea you must know what be the historycal situation in which this idea be create . I ' ll make an example in order to make my opinion clearer : you ca n't understand the basic idea of comunism or Nazism without know the historycal situation and dynamics that bring to these different political , social and economical totalitarisms . at last , I would say that you do n't really understand anything if you ca n't prove it and explain it with fact . be with an empiric analisys of fact that you can prove what you have understand and why you believe so . every scientist need an experiment to clear his point , otherwise he will seem not credible and his idea not effective . these be the three reason why I believe that there be a strong link and connection between understand an idea and learn the fact relate to the concept . I can not image a person can write down all the material the teacher want without any fact . although there may some exam which allow student to take book with them , remember the exact fact benifits the student pretty much , because ttey can save the time spend on refer to the book . third , student should learn fact in order to find a good job in some case . for example , I major in computer science and it involve a lot of programming . the mathematical concept and idea do help me learn theory of computer . however , it be the time when I try to find a job that I realize that fact such as the parameter of the computer do me a big favor to find a job as a programmer . in conclution , while idea and concept be important in learn , fact be of the same weight to student . if it be worth take the risk to try new thing or if instead people should stay with what they already posesse . in my opinion , life be all about take risk , and discover new thing , so that our knowledge do n't stay confine to what we already be good at , but that insted , these limit extand and allow us to learn and to succeed at new thing . for example , if there be n't people willing to try to undertsand the anatomy of the human body , the progress in medecine would not have be so advanced as it be today . this show that even if there be risk involve with gain knowledge and master an area , it be still something that have to be do in order to evolve . however , there be some time when people who take risk end up regret it , wether because they do n't succeed in the other thing they try to learn and lose what they already possess , or because they do n't like what they learn while explore new area . if we take for example a man who own a show company , and he decide to invest his money in a new parfume company , or in another random business that do n't relate to his are of expertise , he may end up lossing money if this business doe n't work well , or he may end up give up because this business be not fit for him . either way , this man would have lose money and this could even affect the business in which he succeed . therefore , take these risk could definitly end up cause these people a lot of harm , if they werent prepare for it . in the end , it be all about beeing lucky and hope for the good , because there be a lot of good thing that can come out of discover new thing , but there be also bad thing . but if i have to choose , i would probably decide to take the risk , because the world would n't be be it be today without our will to discover and travel in a group and be lead by a tour guide have both advantage and disadvantage and the consideration about whether it be a good way of travel or not depend on many factor . suppose you be a busy work man and you want to spend your vacation or annual leave . you have a week or two and you plan to go somewhere . first of all , most people want comfort in such case and they would want go to the major sightseeings . in such case , organized tour lead by a guide be the good option : the tourist company will arrange everything for you - all you have to do be enjoy . the guide will tell you what most traveler would like to know and you do n't have refer to a book to find out about the sightsee you ' re at . you be free of all the uncertainty and risk involve in travel alone and be responsible for yourself . but travel in a group lead by a tour guide have several restriction and they be even frustrate if you be seek adventure or totally personal experience . I feel it personally when I go to a turkic tombstone in rural Mongolia with a group of tourist . the tombstone be awsome at least for me for I be interested in Turkic history . it have inscription on it and I be badly want to try to read it on my own ( I once spend some time try to learn the old letter ) . but the group have only 2 hour to spend there and I have to leave the tombstone with them too because other member of the group do not share the same interest and the schedule say that we should be at the tourist camp by 4 o'clock . I feel so frustrated that I decide then that I will go there alone sometime afterwards . so this example of mine illustrate the bad point of guide travel - you ' re not free to decide where to go or where to stay for how long . you ca n't actually , if I can put it this way , ` ` taste ' ' the activity and the place because the experience be not all yours : it rather turn out to be a group experience and it do not give you that feeling when you find do something , think about something out , experience something on your own without be distract . personally , therefore , I prefer to travel alone if I have enough time but at the same time , I agree that organized travel can be useful and enjoyable experience if you do not have enough time or if you be not really into the destination of your travel . in our study , we often have the choice between learn many academic subject and specialize in one in particular . it can be quite a dillema . in my opinion , specialize , at least in the end of our study , be more interresting . I will explain the advantage and disadvantage of each solution and explicit my feeling . broad knowledge of academic subject be appeal at first . you do n't have to make the choice between the theme you like , and learn from one can improve our understanding of another . for instance , learn the living of specie in biology class can help in ecology class . Swithing between subject often also help on not get bore . on the contrary you do n't have enough time to each class , and that can be really frustrating to learn only basic in the one you enjoy the most . the other choice that be offer to us be specialize . the great thing about it be learn more and more information about a subject you like ( or at least you should like ) and get more and more confident about it . Furtheremore you make less mistake . the major drawback be when you need knowledge ( even basic ) on other academic subject you do n't have them , and probably do n't have the time to learn them , and need to ask for help . this will result in a huge loss of time . an other negative aspect about specialize be that sometimes you be to much concentrate on your subject you ca n't see by yourself the mistake you be do . finally , i prefer to specialize in a topic than to have a broad knowledge of many academic subject . the main reason be that you can be good in a topic only if you practice often , and i do n't mind ask for help if i need knowledge about another subject in order to fullfil my work . moreover , in order to begin in profesional life you need to be good at least one thing . Recent research show than less than @card@ % of the people from my hometown have help the community in the last two year . for the reason state above I agree with the statement that nowadays people do not give enough time to help their community . there be discussion that in the future , there will be few car in use than there be today . although some people think that use the car increase than nowadays . because they think that the car be the most thing to not improve and they do n't have side-effect . but I think that there will be decrease in use the car in the future . there be several reason . first , nowadays , there be problem that oil , gas be reduce because of unplanned excavation . so it cause to lack of oil to move . it mean that although we have a lot of car , we can not drive because there be no oil to move . therefore we need to other substitute oil or alternate method for movement . I think that find alternate method for movement outweigh to find other oil . second , the car cause pollution of air . actually the car produce CO2 , NOx . it increase earth ' S temperature . so , the height of sea be increase . maybe our land will be under the water . imagine that condition you do n't have land to plant and to live in . from these problem , many human be study to find other method to move that it be not cause to pollute the air . third , the car be unconvenient . because it can not only out of order frequently but also ca n't cross the other continent . nowadays , there be global world . so to increase the power of nation , we should invent free-cross continent like ship and plane to trade easily . for these above mention reason , there be no doubt in my mind that there will be few car in use , in the future . because it cause air pollution and gradually the oil be reduce . before attempt to give a definit answer to that question I would like to discuss the pro and con of the group let by a tour guide . I will then conclude summarize the different point make . first of all , let ask ourselves why do people use tour guide to travel . a possible answer to that question might be that people do not necessarily have a lot of time to visit a certain place , and therefore intend to make the most out of their time . in that case , people be show the most popular monument and location for sightseeing by their tour guide , and visit as much as possible in a short amount of time . so I personaly think that in the case of a short trip , it be a good solution in order to see the main thing to see . however , the major drawback of this alternative appear to me to be that as you intend to make the most out of your limited time , every visit be carefully time and schedule . therefore , in the event that you would like to learn more about a certain monument or place , it turn out to be quite difficult as the group might be already leave for the next visit , or you just might not have enough time ahead of you to do so . consequently , if a deep understanding of a certain place or monument be the major concern of the trip , tour appear to me not to be the good alternative , make such a wish difficult to come true . To conclude , I believe that group lead by a tour guide can be both a good or less good alternative depend on the major aim of the journey . in my opinion , if the thourough understanding of a certain monument or place be the objective , then a different alternative should be take . however , if the objective of a short journey be to go around the main sightseeing spot , then I beleive it be the alternative to adopt . ` ` Jack of all trade , master of none ' ' this be a say a lot of us grow up listen to . the question be whether you want to be a Jack of all trade or the ` ` King ' ' of one . personally , I believe , that it be good to specialize in one specific subject rather than to have broad , abstract knowledge about many . when you specialize in one subject , you gain a lot of knowledge and authority on that subject . this can lead to a lot of advantage . firstly , mastery in one subject can help you with your career . if you have complete command over your subject , you can effectively utilize it to further your career goal . for example , in a competitive industry like the Information Technology industry , if you have a good grip on your domain , it will benefit you much more than have incomplete knowledge about a lot of other domain . if you be knowledgable about a subject , not only can you do your own work well , but you can also help your colleague or peer with problem they may be face . specialization in a subject make you an authority on it . this can lead to other people look at you for direction or help if they be stick . so not only do you become more popular , you also gain a lot of respect by help other out . lastly , i would say that if everyone just want to have broad knowledge on a variety of different subject , then no scientific or other development would ever have be possible . take Leonardo Da Vinci for example . have he not develop his skill in painting to such a high degree , we would not today have be able to exclaim at the beauty of the Mona Lisa . or Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart , who with his skill in music , give us so many beautiful composition . or Albest Einstein , whose immense study of scientific phenomenon lead to so many invention . in conclusion , I firmly believe that it be much good to specialize in a subject you feel passionately about than to have a lot of unimportant datum on subject you might be just mildly interested in . Should we learn or should we understand ? this question may have be a debate for age . Everybody wonder if he have good to learn or to understand . but could we really understand without learn ? I agree this the statement , because I really think that it be not always helpful to learn by heart . I think it be more important to understand something and to develop our critical judgement . but both be really important . nevertheless , I think we should learn in order to be able to understand what happen be our life or in our society . Let ' s take an example . if we want to understand a politic debate or we want to vote . we should know and learn what be a republican or a demorcrate , in order to vote right . in our life , we always need to know something to understand it . thus the importance of learn . however , we should be carful of not learn without understanding , which be completly stupid . an example may be when somebody have well learn how to write word . if he do not practice or understand how to make a sentance , it be completly useless to know word . despite the fact that learn by heart something could be very boring , we should be able to do it . because the more we will have learn a subject , the more we will be able to talk about it and to understand it . so if we learn how be the American parliament , we should well understand the role of G. Bush for example . Therfore , I think that we should not decide only to understand or only to learn . these two notion should go together , they be complementary . although nobody really like to learn by heart , we must do it , in order to understant well what happen in our life or in our societz . I do agree that most advertisement make product seem much good than they really be . the people who develope an advertisement usually try to communicate a certain message which be suppose to make the product attractive to the customer . Everything that do not comply with this message be simply leave out . most of the time , the producer do n't care about be truthful in that matter . Let ' s take cigarette as an example . if the producer want to make cigarette attractive to the customer , they will not talk about all the negative side effect , but instead they will focus on the advantage . they simply keep important information to themselves even though it might hurt the person who be go to buy the cigarette . this way , the customer will be blind by the positive attitude of the advertisement and will be lead to believe that it would be good if he buy cigarette . this kind of commercial strategy be actually widely use in the promotion of food . many companys want to make their product look healthy because nowadays many people try to stay slim . the advertisement producer answer to that need by develop the commercial in a way that will make the product seem healthy and good for fitness oriented customer . usually they exaggerate certain ingredient which actually only make up a minor part of the product . some commercial for example promote chocolate bar which include ` ` a great deal of milk ' ' even though there be merely trace of milk find in the product . another way to make customer buy a product be to appeal to certain image they have of themselves . commercial for beer for example usually try to convey a sense of manlyness to the watcher . man usually feel that this kind of beer will make them seem more rough and therefore more attractive to woman even though the brand be not special in any way and do not differ much from other beer brand . All those mean be use by the companys in order to make more profit regardless of the effect it might have on the customer . 	GER

it have be almost a century since the birth of the car . and these specie have make a tremendous impact into the life of human . they have make our life fast , easy and have help to spur the industrial growth . however , the technological advancement , the increase reliance of people on other mode of transport and the more organized lifestyle that this new age be comming up with give me an impression that over the year the number of automobile will reduce . the technology be advance at a rapid pace . in recent year itself we have witness new mode of transport comming up . the howecrafts , the underground rail , the overhead rail , supersonic aircraft be just a few of them . with such novel and efficient mean of transport spriniging up by the minute and with people become increasingly reliable on these novel mean of transport , we can say for sure that the car on road will reduce . we often read in the daily newspaper report that new airline company be open up . the Low-cost Airlines have be a big success in Europe and the same model be be try out in country like India . people have change their preference of travel from one city to another or from a country to the neighbour country due to the new form of airline . this be because these low-cost airline offer cheap rate , especially to the everyday business traveller and these traveller have such a plethora of option in choose the cheap deal . as a result , people have start abondoning car as their mode of transport for short route . with the success of such airline it be definite that in near future we will see many more such business model which will ultimately result in the number of car be reduce . the organization of society be fast change . Two major form establishment be comming up . One , in which the residential and business locality be under one roof and the other in which they will be independent . if such structure be adopt on a world wide basis , then people will have to resort to different mode of travel . in the first case , they will not need to travel and in the second case they will prefer public transport mode such as underground or overhead rail . this be because it will help them reach their workplace faster . this in turn will cause the reliance of people on automobile . thus we see that with the time change , people have come to rely on various other mean of transport which assist them to reach their coveted destination faster and in a much easy manner . these factor give us an indication that over the year car will be replace by many other mean of transport . I only hope that like the dinosaur , these four-wheeled specie do not become extinct . 	HIN

' so if we wish to solve this problem , the first thing to do be to decrease the amount of burden on young people . school should end earlier so that young people can spend more time inside the community . teacher should give their student less work on weekend so they could have adequate time to conduct effective community service . parent should relieve their child of to much activity and they should not force them to go to cramschools . without these correction to our education system , school would end up to actually teach young people not to spend time with the community . of course , one might contend that young people will end up spend the extra time play computer and not do community service at all . that might be the case for some kid , but in my opinion , if people feel they be involve in their community , they would try their good to make it good . this sentiment can be further enhance by government propaganda and social education . it be everyone ' s responsibillity to bring young people back to community service . they should not simply put their blame on laziness manifest by the young generation . in today ' S world , car be the main kind of transportation use for transportation on land . as the city grow and distance get longer , people need way of transportation more and more in everyday life . therefore , nowadays almost every person that can afford it over @card@ and have a lincence own a car . if you consider the number of people live on this planet , that would make quite a number . however , on the other hand , way of public transportation be develop , which reduce the necessity for car . so what will happen in twenty year ? first of all , there be the fact that to get from one place to another , you need to have a way of transportation . for most people , in the large city they live in today , it be impossible to get to work or to go shopping or anywhere within walk distance . so , they need to have a car or a way of public transportation . most people prefer have there own car and it ' S easy to see why : method of public transportation be slow and unreliable . you never know when the bus be go to come and it ' S almost certain that you will be late to wherever you ' re go . also , bus go slow and stop many time for passenger to get on and off . Metro be usually very crowd and it be very uncomfortable to travel squeeze against people that you do n't even know . taxi be usually very expensive . Plus , if you go grocery shopping , there be no way you can carry all your bag unless you have a trunk to put them into . picture yourself in a crowded bus or metro with ten bag full of heavy fruit and vegetable , gallon of milk and juice , meat that be about to get spoiled and ice cream that be melt all over the floor . not very conveniant , nor be it go to work . this be an example of why at least one car be needen for every family . however , there be the grow problem of pollution and traffic . there be so many car that it take you an hour to get home during rush hour when it usually take fifteen minute . plus , when you get to work , or the mall , there be always the problem of parking . Would n't it just be great to go and catch a movie or get a bite to eat in the time you use look for parking space ? that be why shopping mall and work place have start to schedule service bus which will take you directly from home to work or wherever you be go . also , there be the problem of the oil resource run out , and put that aside , car heavily pollute the air . so , instead of twenty people go to a place in separate car , imagine how much it would reduce pollution and traffic if all twenty people use a bus to go there . my opinion be that the number of car will reduce in the next twenty year . government that be aware of the pollution and traffic problem be develop method of public transportation to encourage their people to use those method instead of car . for example , in the United States , carpool lane have be arrange in big city like Los Angeles which you can use only if you have more than one passanger in your car . so , in my opinion , the rise public awareness of pollution , the raise in the cost for fuel for car and the development in public transportation will reduce the number of car in the future . there be a common belief that advertisement make product seem much good than they really be . there be people who do not believe that advertisement do not say the truth but the opponent of the subject do not think so . I also agree that advertisement make the product seem well that they really be . here be three main aspect why advertiements may lie . first to think about advertisement be their purpose of preparation . advertisement be design to convince the consumer to buy or consume that particular product . in order to convince a consumer for a product , one should make him believe that he really need that particular product or make him believe that the product be good at all . for both of the purpose , the product have to be show to be the good . this bring us the possibility that advertisement may reflect non-real fact about a prodct . secondly advertisement be prepare to increase the profit for the specific product . the producer , who would like to profit more and more , would also agree to display a non-realistic advertisement in order to make the product seem good so that increase the sale . when the sale increase , the profit also increase . in short if the product seem good , its sale increase and this lead to a high profit for the company . finally , the third purpose of an advertisement be to help the company to dominate in the market . company have to compete with each other with respect to their product in order to survive in the market . so an advertisement that show a specific product well that that of another company would make that specific company to win the race among the company . this again show that advertisement be not design to describe a product but rahter make it seem well . in short , people believe that advertisement make the product seem good thatn they really be , be right to think so . because advertisment be prepare in the thought of financial profit . a company would not agree to say the truth in the cost of earn less . Everything be organize and put in a way that every little thing be different to the other . the perfect examaple of this be a carreer in College . the program be divide into faculty and the career that a person can pick of , like : Engineering , business , teaching , music , medicine , etc . every single one of the mention before be specialize in a field of studie , and deal with different aspect of knowledge , math , biology , language , politics , etc . a world of possibility . it be not possible to a human be know all about something ; just a little bit of everything . if a person dedicate it ' s entire life to study astronomy ; investigate , make study , ask question , promote project , etc. , surely will get far and will adquire a huge knowledege in this field . that person will go beyond than someone who study a little bit of many academic subject . this take time and effort , and there be not enough time in a human being ' s life to get knowledge in many many different subject and get as far as if there be specialize in one specific subject . in the school , the kid get all the basic knowledge they need to start . then be their decision to go for the subject that they be more interested on . this do not mean that a person have to specialize in one and only one subject and can not know anyhting about anything else . this just mean that that person will be more wise in that specific field and will contribute more to society and the world . specialize in one specific subject be equal to a good and deep understading of it . I agree with the statement that young people nowadays do not give enough time to help their community . I belive that a lack of altruistic and selfless act be directly spur from economic and social reason . in today ' S world , many youth do not see a valid social reason to immerse themselves in community service . although the majority of the world ' s population life in abject poverty , those who be capable of give to their community be often segregate from those who be in need . hence , the lack of awareness prevent today ' s youth from help out . speak from personal experience , I find that there be a gradual decline in my own community of youth that refuse to give or help out their community in any manner . as the president of Key Club , an international community service organization in my high school , I find it more and more difficult every year to recruit new member to replace the one that have depart . I remember when there be about @card@ member in the group - now I find that it be even difficult to gather @card@ member for the meeting . the only sense of give that can be feel in my school ' S atmosphere be purely cause from the need to ` ` look good ' ' on transcript for college . of course , I ' m sure not all of them feel this way , but I truly think it ' s safe to say that the majority feel this way . every year , monetary donation rise in Key Club as the number of member decline . this be an economic reason why I belive that young people nowadays do not give enough time to help their community . inevitably , most of us in the world have be bring up be capitalist - when we give , we expect something back in return . however , when youth help out with their community , they do not receive something tangible as reward . hence , today ' S youth neglect to help their community . due to this fact , those who can help and give find it extremely annoy to invest their time in help other . thus , their only token of help be through monetary mean , which they believe be compensation for not give time to their community . Nonetheless , society ' S greed can even prevent the giving of money . it ' S truly a shame to look around and see that today ' S youth , or tomorrow ' S leader , refuse to invest their time when they be perfectly capable of do so . it be time that society create more awareness in young people to be willing to invest their time for other . once youth overcome their laziness , fear of help out , and learn that the great reward ( as cliched as it may sound ) be the fuzzy feeling they get from give time and help other , it will be the massive stepping stone in get the world ' S youth more involve . I agree with this statement that in twenty year there will be few car in use than there be today . here be my reason : more and more people concern about the polluted problem of environment , and not only government decide to pass bill that can protect our nature environment , but also people reduce the damage to our environment . and car be one of vital damage to these pollution , because they release carbon dioxide . if people reduce to drive car by themselves , instead , use the mass transportation , the amount of carbon dioxide , which be a vital reseason that cause pollutions can be eliminate . so I think car will be few than today . second , city be develop grauatedly , more and more city will have their mass transportation , such as MRT , train , or bus . these useful development can provide a more ecnomical way to transport for citizen . in order to save money and priceless time , people will choose to use mass transportation rather than drive car by themselves . for example , although many teacher of mine have their own car , but they only drive car by themselves in rainy day . because the MRT in our city provide a cheap and comfortable journey for us . and they do n't need to drive . in addition , the expenditure to maintain a car be very big . for example , the expenditure of gasoline , the tax of car , etc . this huge expenditure would effect the willing of people have a car . finally , crow traffic situation would also make people do not want drive car by themselves . and there be still a big problem to driver : find a parking space be extremely hard . To sum up , the idea of environmental protection , more conveinent mass transportation , the expenditure of have a car , to avoid stick in a traffic jam , worry about how to find a parking space on time , all of these consideration would make few and few people to plan to have their own car . nowadays , there be evolve interesting discussion pertain to whether young people do give enough time to help their community or not . in this connection , and base upon my experience as undergraduate and graduate student at the American University in Cairo ( AUC ) , I would state that it be my belief that young people be actually devote enough time to develop and make life good in their small and large community . first , I would provide express example of how AUCians have invest effort to support their small living community , that be AUC . in this regard , it be worth note that prior to start of the new academic year , AUCians usually gather in organized group that tend to make orientation to the new freshman . usually , there be group that cover wide spectrum of service that include orientation to the AUC campus include class , lab , library , and department . also , these group introduce the new student to the university catalogue and related matter such as advise , course registeration , and requirement for join any specific major . moreover , the same group make the new student familiar with the various extra corricular activity that be available on campus . another aspect of devotion of young AUCians be devote to their small community be that they join certain group that target alumnus and other sponsor in order to provide adequate funding for many of the activity that be arrange at AUC . in this way , it be evident that how the young AUCians prove to be effective in serve their small community . on the other hand , and as far as AUCians service for their large community be concern , it will be essential to highlight the role of the different club at AUC . AUC host many club that be fully operate through young student and aim at make life good in Egypt . there be many club that include , inter alia , help club , cancer club , and hand in hand club . the help club be a club that aim at provide the poor people in Egypt with good living condition . this be attain via gather donation from AUC young student and use the same to buy food , clothes , home , and shelter for the poor people . furthermore , the cancer club concentrate its effort on collect donation to support patient of cancer in their tough struggle with this severe disease . along the same line , the hand in hand club aim at visit elder people who be host in various elder house . during these visit member of the hand in hand club tend to provide the say elder with their need and try to draw a smile on their face as a simple reciprocation for the sincere effort in their youth . accordingly , it go beyound doubt that the young student at AUC play a vital role in serve their large community . in light of the above , and base on life example of the young student at AUC , it can be conclude that young student have feel their belong beleonging to their society . thus , they have enthusiasm and dedication to help and serve their community . I would like to disagree with the statement that young people enjoy life more than old people and would present argument against the topic . first of all we need to clearly define the word - ' ' enjoy life ' ' . a lot of us misconstrue the real meaning of these word . true enjoyment mean something do to bring joy and happiness to oneself or love one and not as a public demonstration effect . this be especially true for old people . after have experience life and go through different stage during their life time , old people be much more experienced and mature in their outlook . therefore they would seldom indulge in activity which be popularly see as be part of enjoy life . young people on the other hand , due to a variety of reason which can include peer pressure , need to experiment , energy , enthusiasm etc. be often see indulge in the more demonstrable form of activity which can classify under the broad term - enjoy life . so while old people might not go out as often for travel or adventure trip or movie or party , they have their own set of activity like book reading , gardening , religious activity , community event etc. to complete a happy and enjoyable day . I also believe that while at a young age people often enjoy themselves by indulge in self drive activity , at an old age human being get more happines , satisfaction and enjoyment by do thing for their close and love one . for example a father who invest day and night to build a house so that he and his family can have a secure shelter for a lifetime get an equal amount of satisfaction and happiness as do a young adventure trekker . this gesture should not be miscontrued as evidence of not enjoy life . therefore in conclusion I would like to state that enjoyment be not dependent on one ' S age . it be a state of mind which all human being strive to achieve through various method and activite during the different stage in their life cycle . a world with few car ! sound preposterous now . but I think this be go to be a reality in twenty year from today . there be various reason why I hold this opinion . these include population growth , fuel crisis , and popular consciouness about environment . the population of the world be only grow by the day . naturally , we would expect more car to roll on the road . but , we do not realise that land be not grow in proportion to people . with limited land , there will come a time when we will not be able to find more space for our car . then the recourse be mass rapid transport system , which discourage car-use . this have already be see in Delhi , India ' s capital city where Delhi Metro Rail system have be create to deal with the stress that increase vehicular population be create . now , we see that the number of car have indeed come down on the road because people find it more convenient to take a train to office , at a negligibel price , rather than maintain an own car . another reason why the number of car might go down be the shortage of fuel . oil crisis be here for real . it be become increasingly difficult to satisfy the energy need of the world . very soon , the price of oil be go to increase very highly . early sign can already be see . in such a case , run a car can be very expensive . research on alternative fuel , like biofuels or solar power , be still in nascent stage . thus , it will be very difficult for the common man buy fuel for his car . in India , the price of petrol have be increase steadily and my family now go out in car , only when it be really necessary or when all the four of us have to go out together . otherwise , we use bike or , simply , the public transport system . the last reason why I think that car be go to be few be popular sentiment against environmental pollution . car use fuel which increase environmental pollution . therefore , some country , like those in the Nordic region , encourage their citizen to use bicycle which be more eco-friendly . they be also a healthy option in comparison to car as they keep the rider fit . thus , concious citizen support such idea . this trend seem to be catch up , which make me believe that it will in future become very popular . in that case , the prospect for car look bleak . To conclude , I believe that car be go to become rare in the year to come because of a variety of factor . these include shortage of two resource : land and oil . these be go to be scarce because of grow population , in which case car will not be viable . finally , when people become more eco-friendly , they would look for option other than car , which will affect the prospect of these automobile . Beause in group everybody be contribute in the whole cost which be mostly less then the cost of travel alone . explore a exile place in alone be not a good option because sometime their be few minor prolems regard to security which may encounter by an single traveller . for instance like a person be go to catch a train in a railway station and someone steel his purse , then he feel that he be in critical dillemma . actually , there be few thief who attack on alone and new traveller . but if you be teavelling in group , they can not dare to steel your thing or you can con = mpliant with your group member . basically , travel alone in a new and unknown place be always a risky task , one should have to be very careful about himself as well as his luggage too . on the other hand travel in group secure a person from these minor problem . at conclusion , it be a good and intelligent idea to travell in group with the guide . it make you safe and allow to enjoy journey . there be an ongoing debate whether it be good to travel in a group with a guide or not . some people insist that it be good to take a trip alone because it allow you explore the new environment freely . however , I strongly believe that follow a tour guide with a group of people be the most efficient way to travel because people can enjoy the most beautiful and popular site in short time and also they can learn interpersonal skill by socialize with the team member . first and foremost , with a leader who know about the site people can save their time to enjoy the most renowned place . some people say that this kind of travel do not satisfy every other member in the group . however , as the guide have experience every kind of traveler , he/she surely would be able to schedule the good course for the most member . accord to a survey release by the Korean National Research Center , more than two third of the survey people who have travel abroad respond that they would like to take a trip with a tour guide who know about the place . in this survey , they answer that a tour guide who have already take numerous trip would be able to lead them to the most magneficient and indispensable spot they ca n't miss . also they reply that as they have the good way to drop by all the remarkable place in their head , it would save their time than travel all by themselves with a piece of map . therefore , travel with a tour guide as a member of a group be the most time-saving and efficient way . moreover , by socialize with other in a group , people would be able to have more benefit . in these day , social skill be consider to be important requirement to move up the ladder . and by travel in a group , they can achieve need interpersonal skill . for example , an adult who decide to take a part in a group \ travel india have to deal with troublesome behavior and incomprehensible word from other . in this process , he/she would be able to learn how to remain calm on the face of other ' irresponsible behavior and eventually be on good term with them . travel in a group will finally turn out as a precious memory of not only have be to various kind of spot but also make relationship with many different kind of people . furthermore , he/she would be able to success with the social skill he ' ve get . in this sense , travel in a group do good to eaxh individual by teach them how to harmonize with other . all in all , travel in a group be the most recommended way to take a trip because it be the most efficient method with a guide and people can achieve social skill by it . I agree with the statement that successful people try new thing and take risk rather than only do what they already know how to do well . if one be to analyse the trait of successful people in the area of business , entertainment , sport or even politics , the one common trait to emerge will be their ability to take intelligent and thoughtful risk and keep push the boundary of their area of expertise . human being be loath to change and do not like to get out of their ` ` comfort zone ' ' . the average person would rather continue to do what they know very well because of the overall disruptive nature of ` ` change ' ' . try new thing be generally view as too risky to compromise a steady state of existence and established livelihood . but over time it become necessary to change , adapt and try new thing because there be always other who would be willing to do the same thing in a good , efficient way or for a low price . the only way to combat become redundant and remain successful be to embrace change , experiement with new thing and take calculated risk . as an example , if you look at the traditional telephone company or the medium business , they have not change in their behaviour or in their business process in the past century . the business owner believe in their own perpetual existence and be continue to do what they have be do all along . but , with the advent of new technology and the Internet , their world have be rudely shake . the number of adult who read a newspaper have be steadily fall . most new telephone connection be now of the ` ` wireless ' ' variety . unless these traditional company shake up their business and take a few risk on their own , they be doom . Infact , the cycle of change and innovation have significantly crash over the past few year . even the Internet company and wireless telephone company have to constantly reinvent their business and continually try out new thing to stay relevant in today world . the concept of try new thing and take risk be also important from an overall ` ` evolution ' ' standpoint . imagine if Bill Gates or Michael Dell have not continue to experiment in their garage , or have give up on their dream and idea , we would still have be use the abacus for add number . all successful business and idea be base on the bedrock of ` ` new idea ' ' and ` ` new concept ' ' and it take brave , committed and passionate individual to keep take such risk and expand the boundary of knowledge . while the reward for take risk be typically huge , the reward be not quite obvious till such time a risk be take . in conclusion , the appetite for risk and try new thing be the define trait for successful individual in this world . the argument that successful people be characterize by be people that continuously take risk and enter new venture , and avoid task that they be familiar with be controversial one . on the one hand , more risk mean more return , and great chance of reach and build creative idea and result . on the other hand , work on a task that you know well will promise sure success , as compare to risky avenue that have a tendancy to result in huge failure as much as result in success . personally I believe successful people be the one that stick to the task that they can master , and I support my argument with the follow three reason . first , enter risky avenue without the knowledge and experience in the chosen risky task be similar to a gamble , the chance of win be equal to the chance of lose . it may also be that the chance of lose be high , as any task require the performer to learn and educate himself , and also familiarize himself with the task . take snowboarding as an example , you ca n't successfully snowboard without practice for long hour and take lesson , you will end up injure . second , work on thing that you be familiar with be the beginning of any process of innovation . a number of human resource book state that any process of innovation within any field first require that you have the knowledge and experience within this field . third , a number of loss face by risk taker that enter field they have no knowledge about lead to very severe loss that may very likely impair the person ' s ability to undergo other task in the future . as an example , the market crash in the late @card@ ' s lead to subtantial loss for the naive investor that devote their time and a significant amount of their saving in a venture that they have no knowledge about . many really go bancrupt , lose their family , and their health . all in all , I believe success can be reach if people undertake the task they be familiar with . a the choice of the familiar task lead to a much more positive outcome , compare to an outcome of enter risky avenue that you have no knowledge about . in the past year , we have see a grow conflict between old and young people . in many country , the gap between generation be grow , due to demographic as well as sociological development . unemployment of young people be a hughe problem in many European country . in many case , young people be not able to get a good education because of their immigration-background or their social environment . also , many young people be not able to find proper job although they have good education because after massive job cut in many multinatinal company , no youngster be hire at the moment due to slow economic growth and the consequence of globalisation , which often cause outsorcing and transfer of job from expensive first world country to area , where production be cheap . on the other hand , also old people be affect by these job cut . at the same time , European welfare-states have to raise the retirement age in order to keep their social system function and financeable . of course , this development sometimes cause frustration on both side . when old people who either have the will to work but do n't find a job or who have work for decade and be now retire see young people in the street , hang out , do nothing ( except skateboarding , listen to music , play computer game and shopping ) they might get the impression , that young people enjoy life more than they do or than they do when they be their age . and that impression , in my opinion , be probably correct . when today old generation be young , in the fourties and fifty , there be not a lot of fun stuff to do in Europe . they experience the cruelty of the World War II and the hard work that be necessary to rebuild the country afterwards . young people in Europe be lucky , to grow up in a safe and often wealthy environment . they have the chance to do thing , old people be not able to : they can travel , they can communicate with stranger and friend around the world , they can get to know the world in a totally different way their parent , grand parent and grand grand parent be able to . they have the time and possibility to do sport and ofther fun activity and to enjoy their life - maybe more , or at least in a different way , than many old people do . maybe this way of lifestyle many young people have , contain travel , extreme sport and other way to test their personal limit , be a way to cope with their ` ` Zukunftsangst ' ' , with the scary feeling many youngster have , that they have to be flexible all the time , they often do n't know , what tomorrow bring them and they be not sure themselves ) . I think , young people have all right to enjoy their live as long as they can - sooner or later it will get tough anyway . old people should n't complain about this but rather try to understand the situation , teenager and twens be in . and sometimes they should even talk to their grand child and tell them : ` ` it ' S alright , enjoy your life . go and have some fun ! in order to compare the life of young people and old one , it seem necessay to start off with a brief description of that average young and the average old person . young people enjoy themselves in activity such as meeting friend , go out , do sport or listen to music . on one hand , these activity be fun and help a young person to relax after an exhausting day at school or work . but on the other hand all these activity can not be enjoy without a certain amount of money . because of that , young people can easily get into a rush of work real hard , maybe even have a job while study at a high school or university , and spend the money in the evening and on their weekend . they keep switch directly from the status of make money into spend it and forget to just settle down for a moment and simply sit down and read a book or something like that . sometimes young people even start work almost nonstop so that they can just stop most of their work and have fun later in life , which be the bad of all case . old people be usually the opposite . most of the retire people enjoy a slow day without get in rush or be stress . they have no fear of stick to everyday habit , which provide a basis for a settled and enjoyable life . they do n't feel like they miss out on thing when they go to bed early every once in a while which be a problem a lot of young people share . if people try to compare these two different type of enjoy life , a basic problem show up immediately . if someone put a old person into a young person position , he or she would think its unbelievably stressful . on the other hand , the young person would probably call the old person life enitrely boring . the only difference be that most of the young people enjoy their life at a way high risk of become stress and get in a rush with thing . so after all , a young person doe n't enjoy life more than an old person do , both enjoy life just in totally different way . still one should not forget the fact that we be discuss stereotype here ; there might still be a lot of people at all age that do n't enjoy their life . a community can be define as a society where people can relate themselves into . I do not agree with the statement that young people nowadays do not give enough time to help their community . in fact , I believe that young people nowadays spend more time in help their community than young people before . do Volunteer work be one way for young people to help out with their community . although young people before also do community service , now the urge and the need in do community service increase . there be many factor which cause young people to do volunteer work . first of all , nowadays , young people have more opportunity to do community service . in school , nowadays , teacher encourage student to sign up for community service such as flag day or teaching English at local school . nowadays , it can probably be say that do community service be not optional but be now become compulsory . before , student be not require to do community service , but nowaways , it be compulsory for student to do voulnteer work to participate in various activity . for example , HKAYP be a program where student work on their outdoor experince . in order for student to join the HKAYP program , they have to do specific amount of service hour to enter different level ( bronze , silver , and gold level ) and receive certificate after they complete each level . also , the importance of community service . all student want to be accept by good university . it be now know to student that do volunteer work can give university a good impression to them as the volunteer work they have do can be reflect on their university application . so for example , now , young people in Hong Kong spend alot of time do volunteer work during their spare time ( especially on holiday ) since they receive a certificate provide from the government when they fill up certain amount of service hour . overall , i disapprove the statement that young people nowadays do not give enough time to help out their community . I believe that young people nowdays as a matter of fact , help out more due to the fact that they be more expose to community service ( school encourage student by introduce community service ) , some avticities require student to do volunteer work in order to join , and that student can write their service on their university application . learn mechanism work in different way person to person . some people chose to memorise the fact some people chose to learn how the fact can be produce . learn concept and idea be important because ; you can remember the fact by the brainstorming about the concept and idea , and you can be familiar to learn new fact about a different topic . first of all , it must be accept that , memorise the fact can be a fast way to learn . it can be work in small period of time . you can pass the next examination , for instance . on the other hand , when you forget the fact , it will be very hard to remember if you dont know the idea belong them and concept . if you learn the idea and concept , you can guess how the fact be provide . so , learn the idea and concept can be work on keep in mind the datum for a long time . furthermore , once you get use to learn how a fact can be provide from an idea , you can easily learn an unfamiliar topic . every lecture have fact and the idea ' and the relationship between fact and idea be the same . firstly , you will try to understand the idea . accord to the idea in the concept , you can learn the fact as stable as you provide these fact . you can use exactly the same method on learn the new lecture . as a result , learn the idea be good than memorise the fact even though it need large time to understand . the datas will be more stable and to remember will be easy and learn new topic will be easy than memorise every fact of every lecture . 	TUR
we be live in an age of information , where the human knowledge of its surroundings have boost and continue to accelerate even more rapidly . one can tell that today an average high school student , with an average level of education , know good physic than Newton . with so much information accumulate , the urge for the scientist to specialize in one area to contribute to that area get more and more significant . there be two major point relate with this isue . first of all , as mention above , the accumulation of knowledge in a single area have increase so much that it be impossible to have some discovery on top of it without have the grasp of all prior information . for instance , while most people still have difficulty understand Einstein and his Relativity Theory , scientist be introduce theory that even extend it , have give a lifetime of study in that subject only . specialization in a specific topic seem to be the only way of study science professionally . secondly , one can say that it be require to have a broad knowledge of many field to be able to work on specific topic since scientific field be highly interconnect and interdependent . this be of course true to some extent . there be many general topic to cover until one have the capacity of advance to a specialized topic but that do not stand against the fact that academic subject be now so complex that one can not afford distribute his effort among various subject . in fact , the current education system in most of the country in the world be so : an introductory undergraduate program cover all the require subject as a baseline , and then graduate study specialize in a specific subject with the purpose of academic research . in conclusion , whether to have broad knowledge of many academic subject or to specialize in one specific subject be an important question . while each one have advantage over the other , it seem that specialization be nearly an obligation of modern science regard its depth and complexity . specialization be inevitable and must be pursue by every academician , but also not ignore the background knowledge of the prerequisite subject .
