ITA
in modern society people be confrontated with all kind of advertisement daily . commercial on TV , huge wall paper and other kind of advertisment influence and manipulate people to make them buy product . be these advertisement really truthful though ? or do they promise som thing that do n't even exsist ? I personally think that most advertisement make product seem a lot well than they really be . we just have to look at TV commercial to realize that they often promise more than the product actually offer . Let ' s look at the pharmaceutical industry for example . every day we get to hear about new cosmetic product for beutiful skin or pill that help to lose weight . I try many of these product and I be never please with them . another example for false advertising be food commercial . specific product we see on TV do often seem to be a lot large than they actually be . with help of computer program people be able to make their product look good on TV or on a paper . they use specific technical method to convince their costumer of their item . a third example for the lack of truth on advertisement be the method of politician to get more vote . they often promise great achievement and advertise with big headline on wallpaper that they be go to improve the country ' S situation . I have gain the experience that they usually do n't keep their promisses . I come to the conclusion that we should be really careful about believe what advertisement promise us . many of them do n't tell the truth about their product . One advantage of an young person be the life time they have leave which leave them more option for the future . on the otherhand old people have death come faster than those of young , therefore have limit choice they can do . there be the difference of potential between young and old . although it be arguable that old have the same potential as young , there be more time for young in order to develop their potential . another advantage for young people if the physical ability . although there be exception , young people tend to be more physically fit than those of old . also young people also have the physical potential which they can build up , whereas it be hard for old people to develop physical strength . old people definately do hold an advantage which young one do n't . from the experience and knowledge they have accumulate from the past year , they be able to understand and take appropriate action where as young one be unexperienced which may cause difficulty in life . a point that young people experience great disadvantage be the restriction set by law on certain people under age . an example will be alcohol , driving and other entertainment that youth be prohibit . old people have the right to reach all of that be possible whereas youth be not . whether old people or young people enjoy life be completely up to the individual . both have advantage and disadvantage . if I be to make an opinion it will be that young people enjoy life more , because I only have view or taste of what it be to be young . also people have always be chase a way to stay alive and young for a long period of time . this idea support my idea the young people enjoy life more . some people may not agree with the statement that successful people try new thing and take risk rather than only do what they already know how to do well . but , personally , I think it be really important to try new thing and take risk . therefore , I agree with the statement that successful people try new thing and take risk rather than only do what they already know how to do well . of course , there be some advantage to do only what people already know how to do well . for example , if all we have to do in the whole business life be just one thing , it be effective to focus on that one thing and to learn how to do well , without try new thing and take risk . however , in order to succeed , I find more advantage to try new thing and take risk rather than only do what they already know how to do well . like what , I can expand my experience and diversify my skill . moreover , if I only do what I already know how to do well , my experties will be too focus and limit . first of all , I hope to expand my experience and diversify my skill through tring new thing and take risk . I be a businessman work at an investment bank and be require various skill from my customer in the diffrent sector . thus , I need many kind of experience , skill as well as knowledge to meet the various requrements . I believe that I can enhance my value as an investment banker by obtain the wide range of experience and skill . second of all , if I only do what I already know how to do well , my experties will be too focus and limit . the circumstance in the world change rapidly nowadays . if my skill , that be the only experty for me , become out of date , I will lose the competence in the society and will have a poor life . this situation do not mean my success . in addition to that , I be a person who like change , therefore , do only what I already do might be borering to me . the boring life be not a success for me . my primary consideration with regard to my life be to success by expand my experience and diversifing my skill . thus , I agree with the statement that successful people try new thing and take risk rather than only do what they already know how to do well .
